title: 1 - Lishisheni Ulupenga
content:
1 - Lishisheni Ulupenga

WATCHMAN BLOW YOUR TRUMPET

1. Lishisheni ulupenga, Mucenjeshe na bonse.
Bonse baleumfwe landwe, Babwelela ku mwabo.


CHORUS:
Lishisheni ulupenga. Lishisheni konse fye.
Lesa atupela bonse. Kusose 'landwe Iyakwe.

2. Lishisheni pa mapili, Mumfimfi mumalungu;
Na kabinge pa fimana. "Yesu e Mupusushi."

3. Lishisheni mumisebo. Kuli bonse baluba
Bebeni bonse beshibe, Tata atupembela.

4. Abo bonse bafininwa, Banaka no bulanda;
Yesu ni Katula wabo. Alebelo kutusha.

title: 2 - IMFUMU ILI FYE MUPEPI
content:
2 - IMFUMU ILI FYE MUPEPI

THE COMING KING

1. Mfumu ili fye mupepi, Asendele bubi bwesu;
Nomba abantu basuma Akesa kusenda.


CHORUS:
Mupepi ... mupepi ... mupepi 'ye nomba mupepi
Akesa, akesa ili nomba mupepi.

2. Malangililo yatweba Yesu nomba ‘li mupepi;
Bwangu tukamona fyonse Fya cilambu cesu.

3. Mwitontonkanya fyabipa Fikaleka muno calo;
Katula wesu akesa 'Konaula fyonse.

4. Elyo mu calo icipya Tukekala inshiku pe,
Pantu Lesa 'katupela Mweo wa pe na pe.

title: 3 - LINTU NKAMONA ICINSO
content:
3 - LINTU NKAMONA ICINSO

FACE TO FACE

1. Lintu nkamona ici-nso Ca kwa Yesu Katula,
Nkasekela pakala-mba Kumona Mupusushi.


CHORUS:
Nkamona icinso cakwe ‘ko kumulu kumwakwe;
Nkamumona mululumbi Yesu Kristu Katula.

2. Nomba nshimumona bwino Pamulandu wa bubi,
Lelo munshita yapa-lwa Mpulumushi shikapwa.

3. Tukasekela ici-bi Lintu 'Mfumu ikesa;
Ububi bonse buka-pwa, Fyamfifi fyamoneka

4. Lintu nkamumona Ye-su, No kumwishiba cine;
Lintu nkamona Katu-la Elyo nkasekela pe

title: 4 - ILANDWE LYAWAMA
content:
4 - ILANDWE LYAWAMA

HE’S COMING

1. Ilandwe lyawama twaumfwa nomba, Lintu tuleluba mu mpanga;
Yesu Kristu akesa kuno bwangu Ukututwala ku bufumu.


CHORUS:
Akesa, a-ke-sa bwangu nomba, Akabwela ukuteka,
Na'basambi bakwe baya ku mulu Lintu akabwela kuteka.

2. Nshishi shakale i 'sha- 'ba-su-ma, shikafumya abantu bakwe,
Na'bo bonse basendama tulo twamfwa Bakaba pa calo kabili.

3. Tatwakalekane lintu twafika uko, Tukatote Mfumu Yesu;
Kutali na mupepi baka-longana ukuya pamo kuli Yesu

4. Haleluya amen! Haleluya amen! Basuma bapalamikwa;
Teyanisheni pepeni mwe bantu bakwe, Mukafwala ifitebo

title: 5 - KUTALI SHANI KUMWESU
content:
5 - KUTALI SHANI KUMWESU

HOW FAR FROM HOME?

1. Kutali shani ku mwesu? Naipwishe kwa kalinda,
Amashiwi anjebele, "Kasuba kaisa;
Mwilalila, endesheni, Ntungulushi busumino;
Mukafika ku lubuto Mu calo ca Mfumu."

2. Naipwishe abankondo, Basosele kuli ine,
"Tukakosa ukulwisha, Ifita fyacepa;
Mwilalila, koselesha, kulwisha pano pa calo,
Tukapoka ifitebo lintu bwansho bwapwa."

3. Naipwishe ifibumbwa, fyamoneka ukwasuka,
"Inshita sha mpulumushi, Shikesapwa bwangu;
Mwilalila, mumfwe landwe, Malangililo yatweba,
Fibumbwa fyonse fyalinda ku mpela ya fita."

4. Mupepi nomba ku mwesu, Kutontonkanya kwapalwa,
Ilandwe ili lyawama, kutusekelesha;
Mwilalila, pantu bwangu, macusho yonse yakapwa;
Tukasekela pe na pe Mu Ng'anda mwa Tata.

title: 6 - PEMPULENI IMWE BONSE
content:
6 - PEMPULENI IMWE BONSE

WATCH, YE SAINTS

1. Pempuleni imwe bonse, Nomba macusho yafula;
Wamisheni nyali shenu, Bwino ku-kwisa kwakwe


CHORUS:
Akesa! Yesu akesa! Mululumbi lwacilile;
Yesu akesa no bwansho, Akesa bwangu nomba

2. Moneni bulayo bwakwe, 'Kwelela ububi bwenu;
Sambwa mumulopa wakwe, Mwendeshe mukebe bambi

3. Pa calo ifintu fyonse fya macusho no kulila;
Bebeni cikuku cakwe, Ukuti bonse beshibe.

4. Mwe babi iseni nomba, Yesu amwita no luse;
Mwendeshe 'nshita yacepa, Mwikokola ukwasuka.

title: 7 - ALEISA ALEISA
content:
7 - ALEISA ALEISA

WHEN HE COMETH

1. Aleisa, aleisa Kusenda a-bakwe,
Abo bonse ababuta Abatemwikwa


CHORUS:
Nge ntanda kubeka Mu- ci tebo cakwe,
Bakabeka ku mulu Abantu bakwe.

2. Akasenda, akasenda Kung’anda yakwe,
Abo bonse bamumfwila Abatemwikwa.

3. Bana bonse, bana bonse Bamutemwa Yesu,
E'fisamo ifyawama Abatemwikwa.

title: 8 - APO IPENGA LYA MFUMU LIKAPELELEKESHA
content:
8 - APO IPENGA LYA MFUMU LIKAPELELEKESHA

WHEN THE TRUMPET

1. Apo ipenga lya Mfumu likapelelekesha,
Apo bukaca no lubuto tutu;
Apo abasalwa bakaya longana pe shilya,
Apwe penga likalila nkabako


CHORUS:
Apwe pe 'nga likeli-la, Apwe pe-nga likali-la,
Apwe pe-nga likali-la, Apwe penga likalila nkabako

2. Muli ilya nshita lintu basuma bakabuka
Lintu basuma bonse bakabuka;
Apo abasalwa bakaya longana pe shilya,
Apwe penga likalila nkabako.

3. Aleni tulebombela Shikulwifwe nshiku pe,
Tulelanda ifya kutemwa kwakwe;
Elyo lintu imilimo yesu yonse ikapwa,
Apwe penga likalila nkabako

title: 9 - LISHENI INTANDALA NA MAKA
content:
9 - LISHENI INTANDALA NA MAKA

LIFT UP THE TRUMPET

1. Lisheni inta-ndala namaka; Yesu Mfumu akesa!
Angisheni mwi-mbe imwe beni; Yesu Mfumu akesa


CHORUS:
Yesu akesa, Yesu akesa, Yesu Mfumu akesa!

2. Mwe mpili lete-ni ifiunda; Yesu Mfumu akesa!
Aisa no lu-lumbi ulwakwe, Yesu Mfumu akesa

3. Na iwe cambe-shi ulandishe, Yesu Mfumu akesa!
Ulandishishe ku bantu bonse, Yesu Mfumu akesa!

4. Ifinkukuma filetulanga, Yesu Mfumu akesa!
Ne fipupu na-fyo nefifine, Yesu Mfumu akesa!

5. Twishibila ku-ndupwa bukali, Yesu Mfumu akesa!
Na mano yafu-lisha mu bantu, Yesu Mfumu akesa!

title: 10 - BUSHE TWAYA KUMULONGA?
content:
10 - BUSHE TWAYA KUMULONGA?

SHALL WE GATHER?

1. Bushe twaya ku mulonga, Kulya fyonse fisuma;
Amenshi ayenda pe pe Yafuma kwa Yehofa


CHORUS:
Eya twaya ku mulonga. Menshi yawama yawama-kulya;
Tulongana pa-mo nabo abatemwa-Yehofa

2. Pa mupuma wa mulonga Tukaya no kupepa;
Tukaya tasha Katula Nshiku shonse pe na pe.

3. Lintu tukafika uko, Ifipe tukaposa; Yesu Mfumu ali uko Akatufwika bwino

4. Nomba tulepalamina, Bwangu ulwendo lwapwa;
Elyo imitima yesu Ikasekelela pe.

title: 11 - NDEMUKONKA MWE KATULA
content:
11 - NDEMUKONKA MWE KATULA

I WILL FOLLOW THEE

1. Ndemukonka mwe Katula,
Lintu fye M'ntangilila.
Konse fye muntangilila,
Mwe Mfumu ndemukonka


CHORUS:
Ndemukonka mwe Katula,
Mwamfwilile ine,
Nangu bonse bamufilwa,
Lelo ine nkakonka

2. Nangu nshila yalikosa,
Nangu nshila takuli,
Mwalintangilile kale,
Nomba ndemukonka pe

3. Nangu ndemona macusho,
Kutunkwa na satana;
Ndebukisha mwalitunkwa,
Ndemukonka nshiku pe

4. Nangu mwanjita kuli 'ne,
Kuleko mweo wandi,
Mwapitilile pa ntanshi,
Ndemukonka no kwanga

title: 12 - EKWALl KAFUKAUKA
content:
12 - EKWALl KAFUKAUKA

THERE IS A FOUNTAIN

1. Ekwali kafukauka,
Mulopa wa Yesu;
Na babi basambilwe 'ko
Bale buta tutu

2. Mupupu asekelela
Kumona Katula;
Na ine nga ndi pamo fye
Nasambilwe uko.

3. Mwe Katula umulopa
Tawakapwe iyo,
Na bantu benu bonse fye
Ba pusushiwa 'ko.

4. Mubusumino namona
Mulopa wa Yesu;
Nomba ukutemwa kwakwe
Ndefwaya nshimike.

5. Lintu Katula akesa
Kunsenda ku mwakwe;
Nkalaimba ulwimbo 'lu
Pa luse lwakwe pe

title: 13 - MWE YESU NDEFWAYA UBUTUNTULU
content:
13 - MWE YESU NDEFWAYA UBUTUNTULU

LORD JESUS, I LONG TO BE PERFECTLY WHOLE

1. Mwe, Yesu ndefwaya ubutuntulu;
Kaleni shonse mu mutima wandi;
Tobeni filubi, posa balwani;
Munsambe ine elyo ndebatutu.


CHORUS:
Ndebatutu ye, ndebatutu;
Munsambe ine elyo ndebatutu.

2. Moneni ine Yesu Mfumu yandi;
Mungafwe ine ukupela fyonse;
Ndepela ine, fyonse ndeishiba;
Munsambe ine elyo ndebatutu.

3. Yesu Mfumu kul'ici ndepapata.
Ndepembela Mfumu pankasa shenu,
Mulopa wenu walinsamba ine:
Munsambe ine elyo ndebatutu.

title: 14 - BUPE BWA KWA LESA
content:
14 - BUPE BWA KWA LESA

HEAR THE PENNIES DROPPING

1. Bupe bwa kwa Lesa
Tuleta nomba
Fyonse kuli Yesu
Apoka ifi.


CHORUS:
Leta, leta, leta, leta,
Ubupe nomba:
Fyonse kuli Yesu
Apoka ifi.

2. Ubupe tuleta,
Panono nomba,
Lelo tulepela,
Pantu twam'temwa.

3. Tupela kutemwa,
Mwe Mupusushi,
Yesu Mfumu yesu,
Pokeni uku.

title: 15 - YESU ANTEMWA INE
content:
15 - YESU ANTEMWA INE

JESUS LOVES ME

1. Yesu antemwa ine! Ilandwe lyanjebele;
Bana bonse ebakwe, Yesu atutemwisha.


CHORUS:
Yesu antemwa, Antemwa ine;
Yesu antemwa, Ndimwana wakwe pe.

2. Yesu antemwa ine, Amfwilile ne mubi;
Nomba alenjita 'ne Ukum'temwa pe na pe.

3. Yesu antemwa ine, Lintu ndi no bulanda;
Atontonkanya ine kuti mbe mwana wakwe.

4. Yesu antemwa ine, Akekala mupepi;
Ine nga nam'temwisha, Akansenda ku mwakwe

title: 16 - NASAMBA NDUPI SHANDI
content:
16 - NASAMBA NDUPI SHANDI

I WASHED MY HANDS

1. Nasamba ndupi shandi,
Bwino bwino tutu;
Nashiashima Yesu
Kumubombela pe.


CHORUS:
Imwe tumakasa,
Mulentwala kwi,
Fyonse muli Yesu,
Nkaya cita fye.

2. Ndemweba imwe matwi
Mumfwe amashiwi,
Umulimo usuma
Ndupi shilecita.

3. Na mensa tulemona
Imilimo yonse,
Yanjishibisho bubi
Lelo ne nshiku pe.

title: 17 - TEMWA KUTUSEKESHA
content:
17 - TEMWA KUTUSEKESHA

‘TIS LOVE THAT MAKES US HAPPY

1. Temwa kutusekesha, Yawamisha nshila;
Itwafwa ifwe kutemwa Bambi inshiku pe.


CHORUS:
Atemwa, ifwe twana twakwe;
Atemwa tukonka Yesu;
Temwa kutusekesha, Yawamisha nshila;
Itwafwa ifwe kutemwa bambi inshiku pe.

2. Bucushi bwafulisha, Imfwa ne yabubi;
No kutemwa tukaesha Ukwafwa bambi pe

3. Lintu umweo wapwa, Lesa aletwita,
Lwimbo lwesu nshiku shonse Kutemwa kwa Yesu

title: 18 - MWE MPUKA YA KRISTU
content:
18 - MWE MPUKA YA KRISTU

ONWARD CHRISTIAN SOLDIERS

1. Mwe mpuka ya Kristu mwende ku fita,
Lupanda lwa Yesu lwamulondola
Kristu Mfumu yesu aletangila,
Bulwi na satana alemwanshisha


CHORUS:
Mwe mpuka ya Kristu mwende ku fita
Lupanda lwa Yesu lwamulondola.

2. Napabwishibisho bwa bwansho bwesu,
Fita fya kwa ciwa filebutuka;
Ciwa aletina lintu twaimba,
Bamunyina besu mwimbe na maka.

3. Nge bumba lya maka abakwa Lesa,
Nshila tuleenda iya mushilo;
Ifwe twende pamo tatwalekane
Pamo mulu Yesu Intungulushi

4. Aleni mwe bonse iseni nomba,
Konke Mfumu Yesu, Lesa Kabumba,
Imbeni mwe bonse lwimbo lwanseko
Lulumbi mu cinshi ku Mfumu Kristu.

title: 19 - UMUTIMA WANDI
content:
19 - UMUTIMA WANDI

MY SOUL BE ON THY GUARD

1. Umutima wandi ubibi bwafula,
Ciwa aleesha cibi kunasha ne fibi.

2. Pempula mwipepo wileka kulwisha
Inshiku shonse pe lomba amaka kwa Lesa.

3. Ubwansho ta bwapwa wifumya inkwela;
Mulimo obe pakupwa wapelwa citebo.

title: 20 - SHIBUKA MUTIMA WANDI
content:
20 - SHIBUKA MUTIMA WANDI

AWAKE MY SOUL

1. Shibuka mutima wandi,
Wikokola nomba;
Lintu ukabomba kuno
Kafwikwa citebo.

2. Shiwi lyakwa Lesa wenu
Lyamwita ku mulu;
Akamupela cilambu
Nge milimo yapwa.

3. Makumbi yabunte pe fye,
Bamumona kuno;
Laba ifintu panuma,
Endesha pa ntanshi.

4. Mwe Katula Watemwikwa
Mwatutungulula;
Lintu twafwikwa ubwansho
Tukamilumbanya.

title: 21 - NAISA KULUPANDA
content:
21 - NAISA KULUPANDA

I AM COMING TO THE CROSS

1. Naisa ku Lupanda, ndi mupina nempofu;
Fyonse fyandi ifyafye, Ndefwaya mpusushiwe.


CHORUS:
Ndemusumina mweka, Mwana Lesa wapalwa;
Ku Lupanda mfukama, Untule Yesu nomba,
(Ibeshi lyakupelekesha) Yesu antula ine.

2. Mutima wandi nomba, Ndefwaya kumupela;
Nomba Yesu anjeba, Ndefwaya mpusushiwe.

3. Fyonse fye ndemupela, lfibusa ne fyuma,
Mubili no mutima, fyenu cine pe na pe.

4. Ndesumina malayo Kusambwa mumulopa;
Tekuti njilumbanye, Natanikwe na Yesu

5. Yesu aisa nomba Aingila mum'tima,
Nomba ndebuta tutu, Lulumbi kuli Yesu

title: 22 - MFUMU NAUMFWA MAPALO
content:
22 - MFUMU NAUMFWA MAPALO

LORD, I HEAR

1. Mfumu naumfwa mapalo, Mwapela bantu benu;
Ayaba kubakosesha, Paleni ine nomba.


CHORUS:
Paleni na ine, Paleni ine nomba.

2. Wincila ine Katula nangu ine ndimubi;
lmwe Lesa mukalamba mumpele luse lwenu

3. Mpulumushi nacitile shamulengo bulanda;
Fya calo fyambifya ine, Mumbelele kuli ifi

4. Mwe Mupashi mwincilila, Nangu ine nanaka:
Munjebe luse lwa Yesu ukumpela mutende

title: 23 - MWIKALE NA INE
content:
23 - MWIKALE NA INE

HOVER O’ER ME HOLY SPIRIT

1. Mwikale na ine nomba, Mupashi Wamushilo;
Mwikale muli ine pe, Mwise mube na ine.


CHORUS:
Mwikale, mwikale, Yesu mube na ine;
Mwikale muli ine pe, mwise mube na ine

2. Mwaishiba ukumpala, Nangu ine nanaka;
Ine ndemukabila pe, Mwise mube na ine.

3. Ine ndi muntu wanaka, Ndemulomba uluse;
Pela kuli ine nomba, Amaka yakutemwa.

4. Munsamba nokupususha, Mutima wabutisha;
Wansekesha ine nomba, Mwise mube na ine.

title: 24 - NDEMUKABILA PE
content:
24 - NDEMUKABILA PE

I NEED THEE EVERY HOUR

1. Ndemukabila pe. Mfumu ya luse;
Tapali upela mutende nga Imwe.


CHORUS:
Ndemukabila Mfumu, nshita shonse kuno;
Mumpale ine Yesu Naisa nomba.

2. Ndemukabila pe, Kaleni Mupepi,
Satana 'kafilwa nga muli mupepi.

3. Ndemukabila pe. Bulanda ne nseko;
Nangu tamwikale, Mweo wandi wafwa

4. Ndemukabila pe. Mumfundishe lelo:
Ubufwayo bwenu, Muwamye mutima.

5. Ndemukabila pe, Lesa wamushilo;
Muncite wacine. Mwe mfumu yandi

title: 25 - FYONSE NACIMBILA YESU
content:
25 - FYONSE NACIMBILA YESU

ALL TO JESUS I SURRENDER

1. Fyonse nacimbila Yesu Fyonse ndemupela fye;
Nkamutemwa nshiku shonse, No kwikala nankwe pe.


CHORUS:
Fyonse nacimba, Fyonse nacimba,
Kuli lmwe Mupusushi, nacimba fyonse.

2. Fyonse nacimbila Yesu, Ndefukama ku nkasa:
Naposa fyonse fya calo, Mbula Yesu mbuleni.

3. Fyonse nacimbila Yesu, Ncita mbe wamushilo;
Mupashi mube na ine, Ngumfwe kuti mbe wenu.

4. Fyonse nacimbila Yesu Nomba ningumfwa Wene;
Luseko lwa bupususho! Mulumbanyeni bonse.

title: 26 - NGE FINTU NDI
content:
26 - NGE FINTU NDI

JUST AS I AM

1. Nge fintu ndi, ndi wafibi,
lelo M'lopa wasumine,
Elyo mwanjita kuli Mwe.


CHORUS:
Mwe Mwana Lesa, naisa.

2. Nge fintu ndi, ndi impofu,
Naisa munsambe ine,
Munsambishe no mulopa,

3. Nge fintu ndi, Nacushiwe
namatontonkanyo yabi,
Yakutwishika no mweso,

4. Nge fintu ndi, ndimupina,
Ndefwaya ukuposhiwa;
Nkasanga fyonse kuli Mwe,

5. Nge fintu ndi, mulepoka,
Mulemposha no kunsamba,
Pantu namucetekela

6. Nge fintu ndi, ukutemwa
kula nkula kuli Imwe,
Nomba ndiwenu fye Mweka

title: 27 - TWATASHA  MWE  LESA
content:
27 - TWATASHA MWE LESA

WE PRAISE THEE O GOD

1. Twatasha mwe Le-sa ku Mwana wenu,
Ye-su afwile ukutula ifwe.


CHORUS:
Aleluya! Aleluya! Aleluya! Ameni;
Aleluya! Aleluya! Mutwimye limbi.

2. Twatasha Lesa ku Mupashi wenu,
A-tulangile Mupusushi wesu.

3. Lulumbi lonse kwa Lesa mukulu,
A-tushitile nomba tuli bakwe.

4. Lulumbi lonse ku Mwana wa Mpanga.
A-sendele fya bipa fyesu fyonse.

5. Mutwimye nokwi-sula fye kutemwa,
Ko-sesha mitima yesu kuli iMwe.

title: 28 - BULENI INSHlTA KUKONKA YESU
content:
28 - BULENI INSHlTA KUKONKA YESU

TAKE TIME TO BE HOLY

1. Buleni inshita kukonka Yesu:
Mube nankwe pe pe, temwa mashiwi;
Mube ne cibusa ku bana bakwe;
Mwilaba mu fyonse e kumupala

2. Buleni inshita kukonka Yesu;
'Kaleni mu nkama na Yesu Mfumu;
Kumona Katula tulepalama;
Ku fintu mwacita akamoneka,

3. Buleni inshita kukonka Yesu;
Mwilaya pantanshi ya ntungulushi;
Mu kwanga ne nsoni konkeni Mfumu;
Moneni Katula, Cetekeleni.

4. Buleni inshita kukonka Yesu;
Mweo obe onse pela ku Mfumu;
Mupashi wa Lesa katungulula;
Nokumuwamisha Kwikala nankwe,

title: 29 - UBE NA INE
content:
29 - UBE NA INE

ABIDE WITH ME

1. Ube naine kasuba kawa,
Mfimfi yafula ube naine!
No wakungafwa wine nshikwete,
We kafwa wandi ube na ine!

2. Inshiku shandi shilepwa bwangu
Fintu fyamucalo fili fyafye,
Fyonse fili fyakupitilila,
We ushaluka ube na ine!

3. Ndekufwaya inshiku shonse pe
Uluse lobe lwaansha fyonse,
Ube intungulushi yandi,
Muli fyonsefye ube na ine!

4. Nshatine kuti ube na ine,
Amacusho tekuti yancushe,
Wamfwa ukwansha kobe kulikwi?
Nkansha ne pantu uti na ine!

title: 30 - KASUBA KAWA NOMBA
content:
30 - KASUBA KAWA NOMBA

DAY IS DYING IN THE WEST

1. Kasuba kawa nomba, Twapelwa ukutusha,
Nomba toteni Lesa Ku mapalo twapelwa pa kasuba


CHORUS:
Lesa Wamushilo mukalamba;
Bonse kuno no mulu
Bamutotela nomba Lesa Wesu.

2. Lesa Mfumu ya mweo, lfintu fyonse fyenu;
Mutupale 'fwe bonse, Lintu tulemupepa mube nefwe.

3. Tata mutusunge fwe lintu mfimfi yaisa;
Tulemutasha lelo Ne mitima yacine, Lesa wesu.

4. Lintu fyonse fikapwa, Milimo yonse yapwa,
Lesa wesu wa mulu Mutupele cifulo kuli imwe

title: 31 - MWE KATULA WATEMWIKWA
content:
31 - MWE KATULA WATEMWIKWA

SUN OF MY SOUL

1. Mwe Katula wate-mwikwa
Ulubuto nga mu-lipo;
Mwileka fintu fya calo
Kufisha ku menso yesu.

2. Lintu napo-na mu tulo
Mumpempule no-luse;
Mupele kutontonkanya
Kutemwa kwa Mupu-sushi.

3. Mube na ine 'nshiku pe,
Kwabula Imwe nshi-kala;
Lintu bushiku bwaila
Mube na ine Ka-tula.

4. Mumpale ine lucelo
Lintu nshate-ndeke ncito;
Nga lintu Yesu abwela
Nkekale nankwe ku mulu.

title: 32 - MFUMU E CILIBWE
content:
32 - MFUMU E CILIBWE

THE LORD’S OUR ROCK

1. Mfumu e cilibwe cesu, E Iinga lyesu pe na pe
Mu macusho tulekosa, E linga lyesu pe na pe


CHORUS:
Cilibwe-e cesu ca maka, cintelelwe muciswebebe,
Ntungulu-shi yesu yacine E linga lyesu pe na pe.

2. Cintelelwe pa kasuba, E linga lyesu pe na pe,
Tatwabe no mwenso nomba, E linga lyesu pe na pe.

3. Nga milamba yafulisha, Elinga lyesu pe na pe.
Lesa wesu atusunga, Elinga lyesu pe na pe.

4. Mwe cilibwe catemwikwa, Elinga lyesu pe na pe,
Mube mupepi na ifwe, Elinga lyesu pe na pe.

title: 33 - ANTUNGULULA KONSE FYE
content:
33 - ANTUNGULULA KONSE FYE

HE LEADTH ME

1. Antungulula konse fye! Mashiwi yalenkosesha!
No ko konse kuntu ndeya, A cili alenondola.


CHORUS:
Anondola, anondola! Anondola no kuboko;
Nkaba kakonka wawama Pantu anondola ine.

2. Nshita shimo mu bulanda, Nangu ndesekela bwino:
Mu buseko na macusho, Acili alenondola.

3. Ndefwaya ukwikatisha, Nokushing'wing'wintikila;
Lelo nkekushiwa fyonse, Pantu wene anondola.

4. Umulimo wandi wapwa, Na ine nayansha fyonse;
Nangu kufwa teti ntine, Pantu Lesa anondola.

title: 34 - LINTU MWEO WANDI WAENDA BWINO
content:
34 - LINTU MWEO WANDI WAENDA BWINO

WHEN PEACE LIKE A RIVER

1. Lintu mweo wandi waenda bwino, Nangu malanda yafula;
Muli fyonse 'fi mwalinsambilisha ukuti, Cawama mutima.


CHORUS:
Cawama .... Mutima .... Cawama mutima wandi pe.

2. Nangu Ciwa alencusha kuno pe, Ubulayo bulengafwa,
Yesu aleshiba kunaka kwandi, Afwile kumpela amaka

3. Nasekela nomba kwishiba ici, Ububi nangu bwafula;
Asendele nomba tebwandi iyo, Lulumbi lulumbi ku Mfumu.

4. Mwe Katula wandi mwendeshe kwisa Lintu tukamona fyonse,
Penga likalila apo akesa, Cawama mutima wandi pe.

title: 35 - E BUCIBUSA E BUSEKESHA
content:
35 - E BUCIBUSA E BUSEKESHA

WHAT A FELLOWSHIP

1. E busibusa, e busekesha
Lintu Yesu aletusunga;
Umutende pe aletupela,
Lintu tulemusumina fye.


CHORUS:
Ta-tu-ti-na Pantu Yesu e Katula;
Ta-tu-ti-na Lintu Yesu aletusunga.

2. Cawama nomba, ukukonka pe,
Lintu Yesu aletusunga,
Lubuto lwakwe munshila yesu,
Lintu tulemusumina fye.

3. Tatwakatine, mwenso takuli,
Lintu Yesu aletusunga;
Atupela pe mutende wakwe,
Lintu tulemusumina fye.

title: 36 - NDEMUMONA IMWE
content:
36 - NDEMUMONA IMWE

MY FAITH LOOKS UP TO THEE

1. Ndemumona Imwe, Muli pa Kalfali,
Mwana Lesa; Mumfwe shiwi lyandi. Mufumye ifibi,
Ndefwaya pe na pe. Kuba wenu.

2. Peleni cikuku, Mukosho ‘mutima,
Ukubomba; Pantu mwamfwilile, Ndefwaya kutemwa,
No kubomba 'lelo Ne nshiku pe.

3. Lintu ndi mu calo, Yafula macusho,
Mulensunga; Mfifi 'be kasuba, Mufumye bulanda,
Lelo ne nshiku pe, Ni 'ne wenu

title: 37 - LESA MFUMU Y ANDI
content:
37 - LESA MFUMU Y ANDI

NEARER, MY GOD TO THEE

1. Lesa Mfumu yandi kampalame,
Nangu kulupanda naninikwa;
Elyo, lwimbo lwandi nkamupalamina


CHORUS:
Nkamupalamina Lesa wandi.

2. Nangu ngo mweni fye naililwa,
Bushiku bwafita, ine neka;
Lelo mufiloto nkamupalamina,

3. Mu nshila ya cine ndefwaisha,
Fyonse wantumina ifya luse;
Bangeli bangafwa kumupalamina,


4. Elyo, nashibuka, nkamutasha,
Nangu mubulanda nkamutota;
Elyo mu machusho nkamupalamina

5. Elyo, Imfwa yapwa nkaya kwesu,
Munshila ku mulu nkemba cine;
Ulwimbo lwakale lwakupalamina,

title: 38 - MWE BAKWA LESA
content:
38 - MWE BAKWA LESA

FIRMLY STAND FOR GOD

1. Mwe bakwa Lesa koseni nomba, Nangu amachushyo yafulishya,
Ali libwe amupela maka, Lintu Ciwa apalama.


CHORUS:
Kaleni pa Libwe, kaleni pa Libwe, Yesu Klistu e Libwe.
"Nga twansho bubi ci-ne tukekala, Mubufumu bwa Katula.

2. Koseni mu cine cakwa Lesa. Koseni bucetekelo bwenu;
Ali Libwe amupelo bwansho, Pali bubi pa calo.

3. Konkeni cine akafwa imwe, Nangu yalinda nshita itali;
Cine cikamupela mutende, Mu macusho ya mweo.

title: 39 - BUSUMINO BWANDI
content:
39 - BUSUMINO BWANDI

MY HOPE IS BUILT

1. Busumino bwandi nomba,
Mu mulopa wakwa Yesu;
Mu bantu nshilesumina,
Kano Mfumu Yesu eka.


CHORUS:
Yesu ni Li bwe lya maka,
Ifintu fimbi ifya fye
Ifintu fimbi ifya fye.

2. Lintu mpumi nshilemona,
Ndesumina luse lwakwe
Mu macusho yakalamba,
Yesu ni cibusa wandi.

3. Ubulayo bwakwa Yesu
Bwankosesha umutima;
Nga natendeko kufilwa,
Ni Yesu anjikatila.

4. Ndemufwaya ukunsunga,
No kubutisha mutima;
Kabili lintu mukesa,
Munsende ine ku mulu

title: 40 - NGA TWAYA NE MFUMU
content:
40 - NGA TWAYA NE MFUMU

TRUST AND OBEY

1. Nga twaya ne Mfumu mu mashiwi yakwe
Atupelo lubuto pefye:
Lintu tunakila, Ekala mupepi,
Na kuli bonse banakila


CHORUS:
Mumfwile pe, pantu kuli bonse,
Basumina na Yesu, Abapela kwanga

2. Amacusho yonse yafumiwa bwangu
Lintu Lesa ati, "Mutende."
Te ukutwishika, takuli bulanda,
Lintu tulenakila Yesu

3. Lelo tatwishiba, Ukutemwa kwakwe,
Pantu tatumusuminisha;
Amapalo yakwe, No buseko bonse,
Kuli abo bamusumina.

4. Nomba ne cacine, Tukaba pankasa,
Nelyo tukenda nankwe bwino;
Amashiwi yakwe, Tukacita pe pe.
Muli fyonse tukasumina,

title: 41 - LESA 'BE NEMWE
content:
41 - LESA 'BE NEMWE

GOD BE WITH YOU!

1. Lesa'be nemwe tukumane; Amutungulula bwino,
Amufimba no luse lwakwe; Lesa 'be nemwe tukumane.


CHORUS:
Lintu twakumana, bonse fye kuli Yesu;
Lintu twakumana, Lesa 'be nemwe tukumane.

2. Lesa 'be nemwe tukumane, Amufimba na mapindo,
Amwikushisha na mana; Lesa 'be nemwe tukumane

3. Lesa 'be nemwe tukumane, Lintu muli mumacusho,
Alemukumba nshiku pe, Lesa 'be nemwe tukumane.

4. Lesa 'be nemwe tukumane, Amwisusha no kutemwa,
A-lesha imfwa kuli mwe, Lesa 'be nemwe tukumane.

title: 42 - KULI BAMUNYINANE KUNO
content:
42 - KULI BAMUNYINANE KUNO

WITH FRIENDS ON EARTH

1. Kuli bamunyinane kuno tulesekelela,
Lelo bulanda bwaisa kulekana libili.


CHORUS:
Tatwakalekane uko ku calo ca Lesa,
Mu calo ico cawama tatwakalekane.

2. Icintu cimo tusekesha lintu tulekana,
Kuti tatwakalekane ku calo ca kwa Lesa.

3. Mashiwi yakulekana tayakabe ko kulya,
Lelo nyimbo sha buseko tukemba mu mulu pe.

title: 43 - TULO TWAPALWA
content:
43 - TULO TWAPALWA

ASLEEP IN JESUS

1. Tulo twapalwa, twapalwa,
Ukulila konse kwapwa;
Ukulala utulo fye,
Amacusho yonse yapwa.


CHORUS:
Tulo twapalwa, cawama,
Ukuteyanya kul’ici:
Kutusha mu busumino,
Ukupalwa inshiku pe.

2. Tulo twapalwa, twapalwa,
Kubuka pamo kwapalwa:
Lintu Katula akesa,
Tulo tukapwa munshinshi.

3. Tulo twapalwa. twapalwa,
Yesu, Katula akesa;
Ukonaula imfwa pe
Bakema mucishifwa pe.

title: 44 - LINTU IMILIMO YANDI YAPWA
content:
44 - LINTU IMILIMO YANDI YAPWA

WHEN MY LIFE WORK IS ENDED

1. Lintu imilimo yandi yapwa muno mu calo,
Lintu Lesa ampelo mweo wa pe,
Nkamwishi-ba Katula lintu nkafika uko,
Pantanshi nkamona Yesu Katula.


CHORUS:
Nkamwishiba, nkamwishiba,
Lintu nkafika mu bufumu;

2. Lintu nka-mone mpumi ya Mfumu nkasekela,
Menso yakwe yabengeshima 'luse;
Mutima ukatasha ku luse ne cikuku,
Awamishe ng'anda yandi ku mulu.

3. Ndetonto-nkanya batemwikwa bandi bafwile,
Ndebukisha nomba lintu bafwile,
Mu bufu-mu bwa Lesa tukabamona pe pe,
Lelo Yesu ndetemwisha kumona.

4. M‘fipata fyamusumba fyafwikwa mu lubuto.
Akafumye filambu fyandi ntanshi,
Ulwimbo nkemba pamo na bantu bakwe bonse,
Lelo Yesu ndetemwisha kumona

title: 45 - MPENI CIPINGO
content:
45 - MPENI CIPINGO

GIVE ME THE BIBLE

1. Mpeni Cipingo, ntanda ya lubuto, Eca kukosesha ulebifya;
Takuli ibimbi lingacifisa, Pantu Yesu aishile tula.


CHORUS:
Mpeni Cipingo, lubuto lwa mweo, Lubuto lwenu kuti lwa mbaka;
Kutemwa na malayo fikaba pe, Bu kasuke bushiku bu kapwe.

2. Mpeni Cipingo lyo ndi no bulanda. Lintu mpulumushi shafulila,
Mpeni mashiwi yasoswa na Yesu, Kuti nkabe no kucetekela

3. Mpeni Cipingo cibutisha nshila, Nkamone fibi fya muno calo;
Cikabutisha if yo fya fitisha, E cingapela fye umutende.

4. Mpeni Cipingo lubuto lwa mweo, Ulwa kunkosesha mumfwa yandi;
Nangu ulubuto ulwa ku mulu, Nangu ululumbi lwakwa Lesa,

title: 46 - IMBA KABILI KULI 'NE
content:
46 - IMBA KABILI KULI 'NE

SING THEM OVER AGAIN

1. Imba kabili kuli'ne Mashiwi ya mweo;
Nangu kuwama kwayako, Mashiwi ya mweo,
Mashiwi ya wama, Ya tusambilisha.


CHORUS:
Ayawama, ayawama, Mashiwi ya mweo;
Ayawama, ayawama, Mashiwi ya mweo.

2. Yesu abapele bonse, Mashiwi ya mweo;
We kabifya umfwo bwite, Mashiwi ya mweo,
Yapelwa kul’ifwe, Kututwala ku mulu

3. Tume ciunda ce landwe, Mashiwi ya mweo;
Yaleta bonse mutende, Mashiwi ya mweo,
Yesu e Katula, Atubutishishe.

title: 47 - PA MIPUMA YA YODANI
content:
47 - PA MIPUMA YA YODANI

ON JORDAN’S STORMY BANKS

1. Pa mipuma ya Yodani Ndemona kwishilya,
Eko icalo ca Kenani Fintu fyandi uko.


CHORUS:
Tukatusha mu calo cisuma,
Kwishilya pa mipuma Kulya,
Nokwimba ulwimbo lwa Mpanga pe na pe,
Kwikala pamo na Yesu

2. lcalo ico cawama Bushiku takuli,
Yesu e kasuba uko apela lubuto.

3. Inshita nshi nkafika 'ko kupalwa pe na pe,
Nokumona Tata wandi, Kutusha ku mwakwe?

4. Nomba umutima wandi, Tautemwa muno,
Nangu mabimbi bukali, Ndefwaya kwishilya.

title: 48 - TUKABA NO KWANGA
content:
48 - TUKABA NO KWANGA

O THERE’LL BE JOY

1. Lintu imilimo ikapwa, Elyo tukaba no kwanga;
Lintu baleta mipasa ku musumba wa Lesa.


CHORUS:
Tukaba no kwanga kulya, Tukaba nokwanga pefye
Pantu inshita yapalama kuli bonse kutusha

2. Inyimbo tukemba shawama, Tukatasha ne mitima,
Kulumbanye Mfumu yesu Mu musumba pe na pe.

3. lcawama catusekesha, Masano yafula kulya;
Aya citilwe naYesu Mu musumba wa Lesa.

title: 49 - NDETONTONKANYA ‘NE
content:
49 - NDETONTONKANYA ‘NE

ONE SWEETLY SOLEMN THOUGHT

1. Ndetontonkanya 'ne Libili libili;
Napalama kwesu lelo, Nomba ndi mupepi


CHORUS:
Napalama, napalama, Napalama kwesu
Lelo, Nomba ndi mupepi.

2. Napalama ng'anda, Yakwa Tata wandi;
Ne cipuna eakwa Yesu, Nomba ndi mupepi.

3. Napalama kwesu nkayatula cipe,
No bulanda bwandi bonse, Nkafwala citebo.

title: 50 - CALO TUSUMINA
content:
50 - CALO TUSUMINA

THERE’S A LAND

1. Calo tusumina ciliko, No busumino tucimona
Pantu Tata alepembela, Tukekala mu calo cilya.


CHORUS:
Tukaya kumana Kucalo Yesu ateyanya (teyanya);
Tukaya kumana Na Yesu na bonse basuma.

2. Pa cabu cawama tukemba, Nyimbo sho shawama shapalwa;
E, no bulanda takwakabe, No kulila kwine kukapwa

3. A nakuli Shifwe mu mulu, Tukamulumbanya ne mbila;
Mulandu wa bupe, Kutemwa, Na mapalo ya nshiku shonse

title: 51 - MWE LESA WESU MULUBATISHO
content:
51 - MWE LESA WESU MULUBATISHO

BAPTIZE US A NEW

1. Mwe Lesa wesu mu lubatisho,
Na maka ya mulu Lesa palama


CHORUS:
Twapapata nomba Katula wesu
Kutemwa no M'pashi mulubatisho.

2. Ifintu fyesu e fyafye fyeka,
Tusambe ufumye ububi bwesu.

3. We Mupusushi tupalwe nomba,
Twalomba mapalo, palama ifwe.

4. Mumfwe ishiwi, ishiwi lyakwe
Ube watemwikwa nasekelela.

title: 52 - ISENI NOMBA KATULA
content:
52 - ISENI NOMBA KATULA

COME, THOU FOUNT

1. Iseni nomba Katula, M'wamye mutima wandi;
Mimana ya luse lwa pe, Yatwita ukutasha,
Ndefwaya ukumutasha, pantu luse lwafula;
Busumino bwa mweo pe, Bulempelo buseko.

2. Ndeimika Ebenesar, Mwangafwilile ine;
Ndesumina ukufika ku nganda ya Katula;
Yesu amfwaile ine, Nalubile mu mfifi,
Ampuswishe ku macusho, Ampele umulopa.

3. Luse lwenu lwafulisha, Ndelumone nshiku pe;
Kabili ndefwaya nomba, Mpalame kuli Imwe;
Ine ndi ne mpulumushi, Shonse ndepela Imwe;
O, Yehofa ndemufwaya, Munyingishe ku mulu

title: 53 - MUPASHI WAMUSHILO
content:
53 - MUPASHI WAMUSHILO

HOLY SPIRIT, FAITHFUL GUIDE

1. Mupashi Wamushilo, Mwikale mupepi pe;
Munjikata 'kuboko, Ine mu matololo;
Ndesekela ukumfwa Kwitwa kwa kutemwikwa


CHORUS:
Mutepeta, Munkonka ku mwesu ukutusha

2. Icibusa ca cine, Twacetekela Imwe;
Mwituleka kufilwa, No kuluba mu mfifi;
Fipupu fyaluluma, Imitima yanaka,

3. Mungafwa ine kuno, Ukuposa ububi;
Nshilefwaya fimbi 'yo, Kano kutota Imwe;
Mwe Cibusa ca cine, Lintu fyonse fikapwa

title: 54 - CINTU CIMO NDEFWAISHA
content:
54 - CINTU CIMO NDEFWAISHA

ONE THING I OF THE LORD

1. Cintu cimo ndefwaisha
Pantu nshila shabipa fye,
Munsambe Imwe mwebene,
Ndefwaisha ici nomba


CHORUS:
Munsambe ine konse fye,
Napela fyonse kuli 'Mwe;
Ndemufwaya ukufumya
Mpulumushi muli ine

2. Nkalasekela kumona,
Ifintu fyenu kucila;
Lelo ukuba wabuta,
Ndefwaisha, ndefwaisha

3. Nde esha kuleko bubi,
No kufumya ku mutima;
Lelo maka yandi yafye,
Nshilebuta, nshilebuta.

4. Lintu mutima wabuta,
Menso yandi yakesuka;
Nkamumona Mwe Katula,
Mwe Katula Watemwikwa.

title: 55 - BUSHE WAYA KULI YESU KUSAMBWA?
content:
55 - BUSHE WAYA KULI YESU KUSAMBWA?

HAVE YOU BEEN TO JESUS!

1. Bushe waya kuli Yesu kusambwa. Mum’lopa wa Yesu wamweo?
Wasumina cine cine m'cikuku, Wasambwa mum’lopa wa Yesu?


CHORUS:
Wasambwa ... mum'lopa ... Wabuta wa Mwana wa Mpanga ... ?
Bushe fyakufwala fyenu fyabuta? Kanshi musambwe mu mulopa.

2. Bushe ule enda pe pe ne Mfumu, Mum'lopa wa Mwana wa Mpanga?
Uletusha pa lupanda lwa Mfumu, Wasambwa mum’lopa wa Yesu.

3. Lintu Shibwinga akesa ni shani, Bushe ukaba mutuntulu?
Bushe ukaba waiteyanisha? Sambeni mum‘lopa wa Yesu

4. Fuleni fyakufwala ifyakale, Musambe mum‘lopa wa Mpanga;
Kafukauka kaliko musambe, Sambeni mum’lopa wa Mpanga.

title: 56 - NAENDAWIKE UKUTALI
content:
56 - NAENDAWIKE UKUTALI

I’VE WANDERED FAR AWAY

1. Naendawike kutali, Nomba ndebwela;
Mpulumushi shafulile, Nomba ndebwela.


CHORUS:
Ndebwela ndebwela, Nanako kwenda;
Mumpokelele mwe Mfumu, Nomba ndebwela.

2. Nanaka ne mpulumushi, Nomba Ndebwela;
Kutemwa kobe ndefwaya, Nomba ndebwela

3. Bucetekelo bweka fye, Nomba ndebwela;
Yesu amfwilile ine, Nomba ndebwela.

4. Ndenakila m'lopa wakwe, Nomba Ndebwela;
Munsambe ndebuta tutu, Nomba ndebwela.

title: 57 - BONSE BALEUMFWA AMASHIWI
content:
57 - BONSE BALEUMFWA AMASHIWI

WHOSOEVER HEARETH

1. Bonse baleumfwa amashiwi,
Tumeni ilandwe mu calo conse,
Soseni ilandwe kuli bonse,
"Iseni bonse mwandi


CHORUS:
"Iseni bonse mwe balubile,"
Yesu alefwaya bonse ukwisa;
Tata watemwika atwita nomba,
"Iseni bonse mwandi."

2. Imwe muleisa mwikokola,
Lesa amupela inshita nomba;
Yesu Mupusushi ali nshila,
"Iseni bonse nomba."

3. Amashiwi aya e yacine,
Lesa asosele kuli ‘mwe bonse;
"Ndefwayo kupelo mweo pe na pe,
Iseni bonse nomba."

title: 58 - CHINDIKENI MFUMU BONSE
content:
58 - CHINDIKENI MFUMU BONSE

ALL HAIL THE POWER

1. Cindikeni Mfumu bonse, Bangeli bam'tota;
Leta 'citebo ca Mfumu, Lumbanyeni Yesu.
Leta 'citebo ca Mfumu, Lumbanyeni Yesu

2. Imwe basalwa ba Mfumu, Mwe bantu bacepa,
Lumbeni Katula wenu, Lumbanyeni Yesu.
Lumbeni Katula wenu, Lumbanyeni Yesu.

3. Iseni bonse bam'calo, Toteni Katula;
Yesu ni Katula wesu, M'lumbanyeni nomba.
Yesu ni Katula wesu, M'lumbanyeni nomba.

4. Na ifwe pamo nga bakwe, Tukamutotela;
Tukembo lwimbo lusuma, Kulumbanya Yesu.
Tukembo lwimbo lusuma, Kulumbanya Yesu.

title: 59 - YESU E WAKUTEMWA
content:
59 - YESU E WAKUTEMWA

JESUS LOVER OF MY SOUL

1. Yesu e wakutemwa, Kampalame kuli 'Mwe;
Macusho yafulisha, Yaesha kunasha 'ne;
Mumfishe Mupusushi, Ku macusho ya panshi;
Kupelekesha fyonse, Buleni ‘mupu wandi.

2. Linga limbi nshakwata, Kano imwe Katula;
Windeka ine neka, Mungafwe pano calo;
Fyonse ndepoka nomba, Fyafuma kuli imwe;
Muncinge ine nomba, Napatwa kuli Ciwa.

3. Ndemufwaya mwe Yesu, Imwe Katula wandi;
Muli na maka yonse, Kubaposha balwala;
Shina lyobe mushilo, Ine muntu wabipa;
Bubi bwandi bwafula, Imwe luse lwafula

4. Luse lwenu lwafula, Ukunsamba ne mubi,
Iseni mwe Katula, M'wamye mutima wandi;
Mupela kuli ine, ku mulonga wa mweo;
Mube na ine pe fye, Kuwamya mweo wandi.

title: 60 - YESU MWE KATULA WESU
content:
60 - YESU MWE KATULA WESU

JESUS THOU JOY OF LOVING HEARTS

1. Yesu Mwe Katula wesu, Kafu-ka-u-ka ka mweo;
Kuli fisuma fya calo-, Tulebwela kuli Imwe.

2. Tulemusonda Mukate, Lelo-tu-fwa-ya kulisha;
Tulenwa Imwe Mwe M'longa-, Tulefwaya ukunwa pe.

3. Myeo yesu yamufwaya, Ise-ni-no-kwikala pe;
Tulesekela icibi-, Kumona cimwemwe cenu.

4. Mwe Katula mwituleka, Pale-ni-i-nshita-shesu;
Fumyeni ububi bwesu-; Paleni lubuto lwenu.

title: 61 - NJISHIBE FINGI FYAMFUMU
content:
61 - NJISHIBE FINGI FYAMFUMU

MORE ABOUT JESUS

1. Njishibe fingi fya Mfumu; Nkatungulule banandi;
Monemo 'lupusukilo, Ndetemwa pantu afwile.


CHORUS:
E, fimbi fya Yesu, E, fimbi fya Yesu,
Monemo ‘lupusukilo, Ndetemwa pantu afwile.

2. Nsambilile ifya Mfumu, Ne fya mushilo fya Mfumu;
Unsambilishe Mupashi, Nange fintu fya kwa Yesu.

3. Njishibe fimbi fya Mfumu, No kwikala na Wene pe.
No kumfwila muli fyonse, Ukuti mbe uwa cine.

4. Njishibe po fya cipuna, Fyuma, lulumbi e fyakwe;
Ng’ongesesha ukwishiba, 'Fya kwisa kwa Mfumu Yandi.

title: 62 - YESU NDEMUTEMWA KATULA WANDI
content:
62 - YESU NDEMUTEMWA KATULA WANDI

MY JESUS, I LOVE THEE

1. Yesu ndemutemwa katula wandi,
Pamulandu obe ndeleko bubi;
Katula waluse Cibusa candi,
Nga nakutemenwe nomba kwacila.

2. Ndekutemwa pantu, wantemwa kale;
Kuli ine wamfwile pa Kalfali;
Citebo ca myunga, pa mutwe obe,
Nga nakutemenwe, nomba kwacila.

3. Mweo wandi onse ndi wakutemwa,
Nkalamutotela, Mu bumi bwandi
Mweo wandi onse Ndepela nomba,
Nga nakutemenwe nomba kwacila

4. Mu masano uko Ayalulumbi,
Lintu mukansenda 'Kwikala uko,
Nkalamutotela katula wandi,
Nga nakutemenwe elyo kwacila.

title: 63 - CINSHI CINGASAMBA INE?
content:
63 - CINSHI CINGASAMBA INE?

WHAT CAN WASH AWAY MY SIN?

1. Cinshi cingasamba 'ne?
Umulopa wakwa Yesu
Mutima wasambwa nshi?
Umulopa wakwa Yesu.


CHORUS:
Mulopa usuma, Ukasamba ine;
Nshikwete nacimbi, Umulopa wakwe weka,

2. Ukusamba ndemona,
Umulopa wakwa Yesu;
Ukumbelela ine,
Umulopa wakwa Yesu.

3. Ukumfumya mu fibi,
Umulopa wakwa Yesu;
Fintu fyandi fifyafye,
Ndefwaya mulopa wakwe.

4. Ndesumina muli'yu,
Umulopa wakwa Yesu;
Busuma bwandi ubu,
Umulopa wakwa Yesu.

5. Lumbeni mulu uyu,
Wangafwa mulopa wakwe;
Natasha kuli uyu,
Umulopa wakwa Yesu.

title: 64 - BUSHE MULENAKA NO BULANDA
content:
64 - BUSHE MULENAKA NO BULANDA

ARE YOU WEARY

1. Bushe mulenaka no bulanda? Mwebeni Yesu;
Mwebeni Yesu; Bushe ubuseko bwenu bwaya?
Mwebeni Yesu eka


CHORUS:
Mwebeni Yesu, mwebeni Yesu, E cibusa mupepi;
Tapali umbi pamo nga Yesu, Mwebeni Yesu eka

2. Bushe minsoshi ilepona pe? Mwebeni Yesu,
Mwebeni Yesu; Imitima yenu muli bubi?
Mwebeni Yesu eka.

3. Bushe muli nomwenso ukufwa? Mwebeni Yesu,
Mwebeni Yesu; Mulepembela 'kwisa kwa Kristu?
Mwebeni Yesu eka.

4. Bushe muletina amalanda? Mwebeni Yesu,
Mwebeni Yesu; Mulelangulukila mailo?
Mwebeni Yesu eka

title: 65 - ECAWAMA KUSUMINA MULI YESU KATULA
content:
65 - ECAWAMA KUSUMINA MULI YESU KATULA

TIS SO SWEET TO TRUST

1. Ecawama kusumina, Muli Yesu Katula;
Ukusumina mashiwi, Yakwe ayamweo pe.


CHORUS:
Yesu! Yesu! ndesumina.
Namweseshe kale fye
Yesu! Yesu! Mfumu yandi
Ndefwayo kumutota.

2. Ecawama kusumina, Mu mulopa wakwe pe;
Mu busumino kusamba, Mum'lopa wa kwa Yesu.

3. Ecawama kusumina, No kuposa ifibi;
Kuli Yesu tukapoka, Mweo, kwanga, mutende.

4. Nasekela nomba line, Pantu Yesu antula;
Nomba naishiba cine, Mukaba na ine pe.

title: 66 - WE KASUBA KATEMWIKWA
content:
66 - WE KASUBA KATEMWIKWA

O HAPPY DAY

1. We kasuba katemwikwa, Lintu nasalile Yesu;
Nomba umutima wandi, Ukalanda luse lwakwe,


CHORUS:
Kasuba kasuba, Lintu Yesu ansambile;
Ansambilishe 'kupepa, Nokusekela konse pe;
Kasuba kasuba, Lintu Yesu ansambila.

2. Nomba umulandu wapwa, ali wandi ine wakwe;
Atangile ndemukonka, Pantu ali Mupusushi.

3. We mutima wandi tusha, Pantu wasalile Yesu;
Wipilibuka kabili, Akakupela fisuma.

title: 67 - MWE BANTU BA MFUMU
content:
67 - MWE BANTU BA MFUMU

COME, WE THAT LOVE THE LORD

1. Mwe bantu ba Mfumu nomba tusekela;
Twimbe ulwimbo lusuma, Twimbe ulwimbo lusuma,
No kwisa ku Mfumu, No kwisa ku Mfumu.


CHORUS:
Tuleya ku Zion, Yawama Zion yawama;
Tuleya nomba kwi sano, Mu musumba wakwa Lesa.

2. Bakana ukwimba, Tabeshiba Lesa;
Lelo bana bakwa Lesa, Lelo bana bakwa Lesa;
Basekela pe fye, Basekela pe fye.

3. Kuno bantu bakwe bapelwa mapalo;
Nangu tatulafikako, Nangu tatulafikako,
Kwenda mu misebo, Kwenda mu misebo.

4. Tukemba pe na pe, Tatuli ne nsoni;
Twapalama ku Kenani, Twapalama ku Kenani,
Icalo ca Mfumu, Icalo ca Mfumu

title: 68 - YESU AMPUSUSHA NATEMWA
content:
68 - YESU AMPUSUSHA NATEMWA

REDEEMED! HOW I LOVE TO PROCLAIM IT

1. Nalipusushiwa, nasosa, Mu mulopa wa Mwana Lesa;
Ampususha no luse lwa-kwe, Nomba ndi mwana wakwe pe


CHORUS:
Yesu Yesu, Yesu ni Katula wandi;
Yesu, Yesu, Nomba ndi mwana wakwe pe.

2. Nalipusushiwa na temwa, Nasekelela pali'ici;
Naishiba nshili no mwenso, Imfumu ili mupepi.

3. Katula wapalwa natemwa, Ndemutontonkanya lyonse;
Ndeimba lulumbi lwamfumu, Ndeimba uluse lwakwe.

4. Naishiba nkalamumona, Mfumu mu lulumbi lwakwe;
Mafunde yakwe naya temwa, Yapelwa ku bantu bonse.

5. Naishiba kuli citebo, Mu masano ya kumulu;
Bwangu pamo na bapusuka, Tukekala kumwakwe pe.

title: 69 - AMENSHI YA MWEO YALIKO
content:
69 - AMENSHI YA MWEO YALIKO

WE’LL TARRY BY THE LIVING WATERS

1. Amenshi ya mweo yaliko, Mukafukauka;
Kwena Yesu aletulinda, Ukutuposhako


CHORUS:
Amenshi ya mweo yaliko,
Menshi ya mweo yaliko;
Menshi ya mweo yaliko.
Muli kafukauka.

2. Ilintu twanaka no lwendo, Catuwamina 'fwe;
Ukutusha kuli amenshi, Yantu yakesuka.

3. Isa kuli Kristu e Menshi, Akakukosesha;
Isa sonda Yesu musuma, Cilaka cikapwa

title: 70 - LINTU YESU AKESA
content:
70 - LINTU YESU AKESA

WHEN JESUS SHALL GATHER

1. Lintu Yesu akesa pa calo kupingula bantu bonse,
Na ifwe tukeminina shani ilyo mashina yaketwa


CHORUS:
Akatutile ngano mubutala. Lelo misungu akaposa;
Na ifwe tukeminina shani, pa bupingulo bukulu.

2. Bushe tukomfwa umupusushi, Amashiwi yapalwa ya,
Wacitile bwino mwana wandi, Ingila mung'anda yandi

3. Nangu tukekala kubabipa, Nokumfwa ishiwi Iya nsoni,
Tamwacitile bwino pa calo, Fumeni imwe uko ndi.

4. Akasekela pa bantu bakwe, Lintu akabamona uko,
Akabafwika lubuto tutu, Lintu bafika ku mwakwe.

5. Pempuleni nomba no kupepa, Nyali shenu shibekeshe,
Kabili lintu shibwinga akesa, Twaya ku cimuno cakwe.

title: 71 - BUSHE ISHINA LYANDI LYALILEMBWA UKO?
content:
71 - BUSHE ISHINA LYANDI LYALILEMBWA UKO?

IS MY NAME WRITTEN THERE?

1. Mfumu nshisakamana na fyuma kuno,
Ndeiteyanishisha kwingila ku mulu;
Muli buku lya mweo lyalembwa ku mulu,
Njeba nomba Katula 'shina lyandi uko.


CHORUS:
Bushe shina lyandi lyalilembwa uko?
Bushe ishina lyandi mwi buku lya mweo?

2. Mwe Mupusushi wandi ububi bwafula,
Lelo mulopa wenu wabutishe tutu;
Ubulayo bwapalwa kuli ifwe babi,
"Nangu bubi bwafula ndemusamba."

3. Umusumba wawama mayanda yabuta,
Na bantu bamushilo bafwikwa fisuma,
Mpulumushi takuli mu bufumu ubo;
Njeba nomba Katula 'shina lyandi uko.

title: 72 - INSHITA SHEPINGULO SHATENDEKA
content:
72 - INSHITA SHEPINGULO SHATENDEKA

THE JUDGEMENT HAS SET

1. Inshita shepingulo shatendeka, Elyo tukekala shani,
Lintu matontonkanyo na fyonse Fikapingulwa na Lesa?


CHORUS:
Elyo tukekala shani, Mu bupingulo bwa Lesa;
Nangu Lesa akatukana, Nangu bubi bwafutilwe

2. Ubupingulo bwatendeke na bafwa, Abomi bashala beka;
Fintu fyonse ifyalembelwe Mu mabuku ya kwa Lesa.

3. Elyo naifwe tukekala shani Lintu mabuku yesulwe,
Lintwi milandu yonse ikapwa Mu bupingulo bwa Lesa?

title: 73 - TWITWA KU CIMUNO
content:
73 - TWITWA KU CIMUNO

CALLED TO THE FEAST

1. Twitwa ku cimuno ca Mfumu, Nangu tuli pamo nga bakwe,
Tukacita nshi munyina Lintu ikesa?


CHORUS:
Lintu ikesa mwandi, Lintu ikesa;
Tukacitanshi munyina Lintu ikesa?

2. Lintu Yesu Mfumu akesa, Akesa mu Lulumbi lwakwe;
Tukacitanshi munyina Lintu ikesa?

3. Fintu fyamunkama fyakale ifi fyonse fikamoneka;
Mitima yesu kamoneka Lintu ikesa.

4. Na bonse bafwikwa mushilo Bakamusekelesha cine;
We munyinane tukaba nshi Lintu ikesa?

5. Bulanda icibi ku babi, Lintu Mfumu Yesu ikesa;
Ikesa kubapela bonse, Filambu fyabo.

6. Mwe Lesa mutupe cikuku, Kuwamishe mitima yesu;
Elyo tekuti tumutine, Lintu mukesa.

title: 74 - TANDA KU LUCELO
content:
74 - TANDA KU LUCELO

SOWING IN THE MORNING

1. Tanda kulucelo, Mbuto shabusuma,
Tuletanda nomba, Mbuto sha Mfumu;
Tulolela nshita, Yakusepa mbuto,
Tukabwela bonse No kusekela.


CHORUS:
Tukasekela, tukasekela,
Lintu tukabwela tukasekela;
Tukasekela, tukasekela,
Lintu tukabwela tukasekela

2. Tanda pa kasuba, Nelyo mumiloke,
E milimo yesu tukacita pe,
Lintu imilimo Yakusepa yapwa,
Tukabwela bonse Nokusekela.

3. Uyo alelila Lintu aletanda,
Mbuto sha kwa Yesu muno mu calo;
Lintu imilimo, Pano calo yapwa,
Tukabwela bonse nokusekela.

title: 75 - UMFWE MASHIWI YA YESU
content:
75 - UMFWE MASHIWI YA YESU

HARK! TIS THE SHEPHERD’S VOICE

1. Umfwe mashiwi ya Yesu, Uyu mu mpanga yamfimfi,
Aita abo baluba, Balekele ng'anda yakwe.


CHORUS:
Leteni leteni bwesheni bampulumushi;
Leteni leteni bwesheni kuli Yesu

2. Nani akafwa Katula, kwafwa kufwaya baluba,
Nani ababwesha nomba, Ku ng'anda ya wishi wabo

3. Mu mpanga umfwa balila, Pa lupili lwa ku mfimfi;
Nomba Yesu amuita "Fwayeni abantu bandi."

title: 76 - MWAFWE ABALUBA
content:
76 - MWAFWE ABALUBA

RESCUE THE PERISHING

1. Mwafwe abaluba, 'sunge balefwa,
Cita no luse kufumya kumfwa,
Bebeni baluba kuli Katula,
Alifwilile ku bubi bwabo.


CHORUS:
Mwafwe abaluba, 'sunge balefwa,
Yesu abatemwa abafwila.

2. Nangu bam'sulile alebalinda,
Alebafwaya kuleka bubi;
Mubapapatile, pepeni nabo,
Alebelela lintu babwela

3. Kutemwa kwa Yesu kuli na maka,
Kulebaposha nga basumina;
Nangu Balenaka Yeswa batemwa,
Bomba no luse ulebabwesha

4. Mwafwe abaluba e umulimo,
Maka akamupela kucita; Bwesheni baluba ube mufuke;
Bebeni Yesu alebafwila.

title: 77 - NATEMWA UKUSOSA ‘FYA FINTU FYA LESA
content:
77 - NATEMWA UKUSOSA ‘FYA FINTU FYA LESA

I LOVE TO THE STORY

1. Natemwa ukusosa, Fya fintu fya Lesa;
Fya lulumbi lwa Yesu, No kutemwa kwakwe;
Natemwa ukusosa, Ilandwe lisuma,
Lisansamusha ine ukucila fyonse


CHORUS:
Natemwa ukusosa ilandwe lyakwa Yesu,
Ilandwe lya kutemwa, Kutemwa kwa Yesu.

2. Lyawama e lyawama, Ilyakupapisha;
Kucila ifiloto, Landwe lya kutemwa;
Natemwa kulisosa pantu lilengafwa,
Na pa mulandu uyu, Naleba kuli Mwe.

3. Lyawama e lyawama kusosa libili;
Lintu nalibwekesha, Lyawama kucila;
Natemwa kulisosa, Pantu bengi kuno,
Tabomfwile ilandwe, Lya kutemwa kwakwe,

4. Lyawama e lyawama, Ku balishibisha;
Nga Iintu tuli kuno, Tulefwaisha pe,
Lintu twaya ku mulu, Kwimbo lwimbo lupya;
Lukaba ulwa kale. Lwa kutemwa kwakwe.

title: 78 - FWAYENI BALUBA
content:
78 - FWAYENI BALUBA

SEEKING THE LOST

1. Fwayeni ba-lu-ba no kute-mwa,
Abaluba mu calo conse;
Basosheni fye ilandwe lya-kwe,
Bebeni bo-mfwe shiwi lyakwe


CHORUS:
Kabiyeni ... mu calo, mu mpi-li;
Leteni a ... balubi-lile; Mwi cinka lya ... kwa Mu-pusu-shi,
Yes'aipa .. .ililwe- 'babi.

2. Abaluba mu balange Ye-su,
Abanaka na balecula,
Batungulu-le pe Mupusu-shi;
Mubalange nshi-la ya mweo.

3. Ndemuciti-la Yesu na i-ci,
Ndemukonka nshi-ku ne nshiku,
Nkabafwa bawa nabo bale-fwa;
No kubala-nga kuli Yesu.

title: 79 - KONSE FYE MABALA YAPYA
content:
79 - KONSE FYE MABALA YAPYA

FAR AND NEAR THE FIELDS

1. Konse fye mabala yapya. Yapemba ukusepwa;
Konse fye ngano nashipya, Shibengeshima bwino


CHORUS:
Mwe Lesa tuma babomfi mutumfwe Lesa nomba;
Mubatuma ukusepa Pantu 'nshita yacepa.

2. Mubatuma ulucelo, Kubomba mwibala;
Bebeni kubafwaisha, konse fye muno calo.

3. Na iwe Lesa natuma, Sepa mwi bala lyakwe;
Nge lintu milimo yapwa, Mukasekela cine.

title: 80 - TULEYA KUBOMBA
content:
80 - TULEYA KUBOMBA

TO THE WORK

1. Tuleya kubomba tuli bamilimo,
Konkeni mu nshila Yesu aendele;
Na mashiwi aletupela amaka,
Tukacita maka 'ncito atupela


CHORUS:
Tuleya Kubomba Tuleya ... kubomba
Sumina pempula Bomba milimo ya Mfumu.

2. Tuleya kubomba kulisha bansala,
Sendeni banaka kuminwe ya mweo,
Ululumbi lwesu pa lupanda lwakwe,
Bebeni bonse bupususho apela.

3. Tuleya kubomba, mu nakila nomba;
Pantu inshita ikesa ukusepa;
Katula wesu ateyanye cifulo,
Lwimbo lwesu lwape ku ubupususho

title: 81 - MWE BANTU BAKWA LESA
content:
81 - MWE BANTU BAKWA LESA

WORK FOR THE NIGHT IS COMING

1. Mwe bantu bakwa Lesa mwapelwa milimo;
Bomb ni pa kasuba nelyo cungulo;
Nomba nshita kubomba kucili lubuto;
Ubushiku bwaila milimo yapwa,

2. Mwe bantu bakwa Lesa mwikokola mwise;
Lesa apele nshita kubomba nomba;
Lintu milimo yapwa atupa kutusha,
Lelo ili inshita iya milimo.

3. Mwe bantu bakwa Lesa nshita yapalama,
Kuleka imilimo kubapususha;
Bomba na maka yenu kupwishe milimo
Pantu bushiku bwisa tamwakabombe.

title: 82 - INFUMU MULUCELO PE
content:
82 - INFUMU MULUCELO PE

LORD IN THE MORNING

1. Imfumu mu lucelo pe,
Mukang'ufwe shiwi;
Mu kupepa kuli Imwe,
Lesa wa ku mulu.

2. Ndefwayo Mupashi wenu,
Wakuntungulula;
Unange mulimo wandi,
Ni lufyanishiwa.

3. Abantu abamutemwa,
Babe na mapalo;
Lesa akabafwa bonse,
Inshiku shonse pe.

title: 83 - NDEFWAYA UKWIMBA ISHI NYIMBO
content:
83 - NDEFWAYA UKWIMBA ISHI NYIMBO

BLESSED BE THE NAME

1. Ndefwaisha kwimbe-shi nyimbo, Lyashuka ishina lyenu:
Mfumu yandi iya lulumbi, Lyashuka ishina lyenu.


CHORUS:
Lyashuke shina, Lyashuke shina,
Lyashuka ishina lyenu;
Lyashuke shina, Lyashuke shina,
Lyashuka ishina lyenu.

2. Ni Yesu, e-shina lisuma; Lyashuka ishina lyenu;
Ku bantu a-babi-pa bonse, Lyashuka ishina Iyenu.

3. Wafumya ma-ka ya Satana; Lyashuka ishina lyenu;
Umulopa wakwe wawamya, Lyashuka ishina lyenu.

title: 84 - LUMBENI LESA WAPALWA
content:
84 - LUMBENI LESA WAPALWA

PRAISE GOD FROM WHOM

1. Lumbeni Lesa wapalwa
Mulumbanyeni mwe bonse;
Na 'bangeli ba kumulu;
Lumbanyeni Lesa wesu.

title: 85 - NDEIMBA MAKA YA MFUMU
content:
85 - NDEIMBA MAKA YA MFUMU

I SING THE MIGHTY POWER

1. Ndeimba maka ya Mfumu, Yapangile mpili:
Yapangile na mabemba, No lwelele pamo:
Ndeimba mano ye funde, Kasuba ukuteka;
Ku mweshi apele funde, Kabili ku ntanda.

2. Ndetota busuma bwakwe, Kupele cakulya;
Apangile nama shonse, Ku mashiwi yakwe;
Konse fye Mfumu ndemona, Ifintu mwachitile;
Nangu ndemona panshi fye, Nelyo mulwelele.

3. Maluba yonse yatweba lulumbi lwa Mfumu;
Amakumbi ne fipupu, Fyatumwa na Lesa;
Bonse bapoka umweo, Baletekwa na Imwe;
Takuli cifulo kuno, Kufisa ku mulu.

title: 86 - MUTOTE MFUMU
content:
86 - MUTOTE MFUMU

O WORSHIP THE KING

1. Mutote Mfumu pelo muchinshi,
No kwimba lelo kutemwa kwakwe;
Kabumba kachinga no Mupusushi,
Alumbaniwe kuno na ku mulu,

2. Bunte namaka ku Mfumu yesu,
Mingila yakwe yalibutisha;
Fipupu ne nkuba fyacitwa nankwe,
Lesa mukalamba ni Lesa wesu.

3. Kusunga kwakwe kwalikulisha;
Apelo mwela, lubuto pamo;
Amenshi tulenwa yapelwa nankwe;
Imfula, kusepa, mapalo yakwe.

4. Ni'Mwe wa maka, Ni Mwe kutemwa;
Pa fintu fyonse tulemutota;
Bangeli mu mulu batota imwe;
Imitima yesu tupela nomba.

title: 87 - KULI IMWE TATA TWAISA ILELO
content:
87 - KULI IMWE TATA TWAISA ILELO

FATHER WE COME TO THEE

1. Kuli Imwe Tata twaisa ilelo,
Mwe ilinga lyesu twapapata;
Mu calo camfimfi, takuli lubuto,
Mutusansamusha Tata wesu.


CHORUS:
Kuli Imwe Tata tuleisa
Ku mapepo yesu mumfwe nomba.

2. Mupusushe ifwe ku bupulumushi,
Ube linga lyesu insiku pe;
Tunaka no mwenso na balwani besu,
Tulemufwaisha kutukosha.

3. Mutupale lelo mucikuku cenu,
Mututangilile ku mweo pe,
Na mu nshita shesu shonse mwituleka,
Pela icifulo ku mobe pe.

title: 88 - MWINCILA INE KATULA
content:
88 - MWINCILA INE KATULA

PASS ME NOT

1. Mwinchila ine Katula,
Mumfwe kuli 'ne;
Apo mulemona bambi,
Mwinchila ine.


CHORUS:
Yesu, Yesu, mumfwe kuli 'ne;
Apo mulemona bambi, Mwinchila ine.

2. Ku ci puna ca kwa Lesa,
Ndefwayo kwafwa;
Ndefukama mu bulanda,
Mungafwe ine.

3. Mu kutemwa kwakwa Yesu,
Ndesumina 'ne;
Mutima wandi 'kalipa,
Muntule ine.

4. Mu ntulo ya nsansamusho,
No mweo wandi;
N'ani umbi pano calo,
N’ani ku mulu

title: 89 - YAWAMA E YAWAMA PE
content:
89 - YAWAMA E YAWAMA PE

SWEET HOUR OF PRAYER

1. Yawama e yawama pe, Inshita kupepa Lesa;
Na ku cipuna ca Tata, Ukwabo bufwayo bwandi;
Mu nshita sha ubulanda, Mutima wandi wafwile
Napusuka ku fiteyo, Pantu 'nshita yakupepa.

2. Yawama e yawama pe, Inshita kupepa Lesa;
Naishiba cine lelo, Katula akapalama;
Anjebele kumufwaya, Kusumina mu cikuku;
Nkapela malanda yonse, No kusekela kupepa.

3. Yawama e yawama pe, Inshita kupepa Lesa;
Lintu napwishe milimo, Yesu takalabe ine;
Akampelo mweo wa pe, Na ku mulu icifulo;
Nge nshita lintu yafika, Nkamone mpumi yakwe pe.

title: 90 - UMBI UMULUNGU WAPWA
content:
90 - UMBI UMULUNGU WAPWA

ANOTHER SIX DAYS’ WORK

1. Umbi umulungu wapwa;
Isabata lyafikila;
Buli bushiku busuma,
Bwakucila nshiku shonse.

2. Mwise toteni Yehofa
Amupela ukutemwa;
Cimonwa capelwa ifwe,
Pali Sabata kucila.

3. Tuletontonkanya lelo,
Kuli Katula wapalwa;
Akatupela kwanga pe,
Na kuli bonse bam'temwa.

4. Tondolo wa kwa Yehofa,
Atupela pano calo;
Lelo lintu fyonse fyapwa,
Tukatusha ku mwakwe pe.

title: 91 - PEMPULENI
content:
91 - PEMPULENI

WATCH FOR THE TIME IS SHORT

1. Pempuleni lintwi nshita ilya pepi;
Mwe bena Kristu, pempuleni mupepe;
Tengeleleni umulwani nakosa;
Pempuleni Shibwinga aisa bwangu.


CHORUS:
Pempuleni no kupepa,
Pempuleni akasuba no bushiku,
No kupepa pe.

2. Tamfyeni mwenso no kushipula konse;
Mwalailo kutusha ku mulu kwakwe;
Pempuleni mwe baKristu no kupepa,
Mupusushi wenu aIemupempwila.

3. Cetekeleni fye Yesu Kafwa wenu,
Ikatisheni akasuke akese;
Lintu m'cili no mweo ikatisheni,
Muli ino nshita pempula upepe

title: 92 - MWILABA SABATA
content:
92 - MWILABA SABATA

DON’T FORGET THE SABBATH

1. Mwilaba Sabata Mfumu yapalile,
Ilya palwa kucila Lya mulungu onse;
Liletuletelo butusho no buseko,
Bwisa pe mu bulesa ilyo tulemona.


CHORUS:
Isa, isa nomba isa Kasuba ka Mfumu,
Isa, isa, nomba isa kasuba ka Mfumu.

2. Sunga iSabata no kumutotela,
Mfumu ya ba nang'anga
Ishila ya bumi;
Nga twakonke Mfumu, muli cino calo,
Akatupa Kafukauka ka pe na pe.

3. Kasuba ka Mfumu ka kumutotela,
Twimbile Yesu nyimbo,
Cibusa wa bana,
Mufuke wa kutemwa musuma icibi,
Malayo yobe yale tusekelesesha.

title: 93 - KASUBA KAKUTUSHA
content:
93 - KASUBA KAKUTUSHA

O DAY OF REST AND GLADNESS

1. Kasuba kakutusha. Kasuba kabuta;
Kafumye nsoni shonse, Kalubuto lweka;
Bamulu bamu calo, Balefukamina;
No kwimba wafya, wafya, Wene wa pe na pe.

2. Wene Cibumba cesu, Cashinguluka 'fwe;
Ibala lyakutemwa, Menshi ya Padiso;
Wene Kafukauka, ku bantu banaka;
Ifwe tuli pa mulu, Tumona 'patali.

3. Kasuba ka lubuto, Nikakwangamo fye,
Kakutemwa 'fwe Mfumu, Fya muJu ne calo;
Tupokele cikuku, Mubushiku ubu,
Kwashala fye kutusha, Mu mulu ne Mfumu.

title: 94 - SKULU YESU YE SABATA
content:
94 - SKULU YESU YE SABATA

SWEET SABBATH SCHOOL

1. Skulu yesu ye Sabata,
Yatemwikwa nefwe;
M'tima wandi uitemwa;
Skulu ye Saba



CHORUS:
Skulu ye ... Sabata,
Skulu ye ... Sabata;
M'tima wandi uitemwa
Skulu ye Sabata.

2. Muno mwine natendeka,
Kutemwa mafunde;
No kufwaisha cawama.
Nasango mutende.

3. Pano Yesu eminine,
Alenjita ine;
Kuti nsale Yesu eka,
No kwikala nankwe.

title: 95 - LESA ATUPALILE MUMULUNGU WAPITA
content:
95 - LESA ATUPALILE MUMULUNGU WAPITA

SAFELY THROUGH ANOTHER WEEK

1. Lesa atupalile mu mulungu wapita;
Nomba tulefwaisha kutupala ilelo;
Kasuba kapashanya ka kutusha ku mulu;
Kasuba kapashanya kakutusha ku mulu.

2. Kwi shina lya kwa Yesu tulepushe cikuku;
Nomba mwe Tata wesu fumyeni bubi bwesu;
Mutwelele ububi no kupalama ifwe;
Mutwelele ububi no kupalama ifwe.

3. Twaisa kumutota mumfwe mapepo yesu;
Mu ng’anda ya mushilo mwise 'kala na ifwe;
Peleni kuli lelo cakulya ca mitima;
Peleni kuli lelo cakulya ca mitima.

4. Leka mashiwi yesu yabombe umulimo;
Ukwansha mpulumushi no kubafwa basuma;
Peleni muli fyonse lintu tuli pa calo;
Peleni muli fyonse lintu tuli pa calo,

title: 96 - SABATA LYA TEMWIKWA
content:
96 - SABATA LYA TEMWIKWA

WELCOME, WELCOME, DAY OF REST

1. Sabata lyatemwikwa,
Lyatupelwe mu luse;
Isa nomba kuli 'fwe,
Kasuba ka kwa Lesa.

2. Kasuba kakutusha,
No kutasha Yehofa;
Kapelwa kutupala;
No kubwesha kwa Lesa

3. Kasuba kamushilo,
No kutota Katula;
Sabata lyatemwikwa;
Mapalo yafulisha.

title: 97 - TWAUMFWILE ILANDWE
content:
97 - TWAUMFWILE ILANDWE

WE HAVE HEARD

1. Twaumfwile ilandwe, Yesu ni Katula;
Eya! Atupususha, Yesu ni Katula;
Tume nkombe konse fye, Mu mpili mu malungu;
Bebeni bonse uko, Yesu ni Katula.

2. Imbeni imwe fita, Yesu ni Katula;
Bebeni babi bonse, Yesu ni Katula;
Baleimba panono, Lintu bali no mwenso;
Pantu abafwilile, Yesu ni Katula

3. Na maka sosa nomba, Yesu ni Katula;
Mumfwa no mweo wakwe, Yesu ni Katula;
Mwe bantu sekeleni, Kumo ne calo conse;
Ulwimbo ulwa bwansho, Yesu ni Katula.

title: 98 - NDEFWAYO KWENDA NA YESU
content:
98 - NDEFWAYO KWENDA NA YESU

I MUST HAVE TH SAVIOUR WITH ME

1. Ndefwayo kwenda na yesu, Tekuti nyende neka;
Ndekabile cinso cakwe, Na maboko yambake;


CHORUS:
Elyo nsha katine i,
Nga anta ... ngililako;
Nkaya nsha kang'wing'wintike.
Nkamukonka pe na pe.

2. Ndefwayo kwenda na Yesu, Pantu ndi wa kunaka;
Akantepelesha ine, No kulankoselesha.

3. Ndefwayo kwenda na Yesu.Mu Mweo wandi onse;
Nangu nkacula icibi, Mu nkondo ya macusho.

4. Ndefwayo kwenda na Yesu, Antungulula ine;
Nsuke nkafike ku mulu, Nkekale nankwe pe fye.

title: 99 - LINTU NAMONA LUPANDA
content:
99 - LINTU NAMONA LUPANDA

WHEN I SURVEY THE WONDEROUS

1. Lintu namona ‘lupanda,
Mfumu yandi yafwile 'ko;
Fyuma fyandi fyonse fyafye;
Ndesula cilumba candi.

2. Mona ifintu acita,
Pantu atutemwishisha;
Nomba fibi fyandi fyonse,
Ndeposa mu m'lopa wakwe.

3. Ine nalubile kale,
Nomba naelelwa cine;
Nshili ne cintu kuilumba,
Kano mu lupanda lwakwe.

4. Nangu calo conse candi,
lci cacepa kupelwa;
Kuli ukutemwa kwakwe,
Alefwayo mweo weka.

title: 100 - YESU NICIBUSA CINE
content:
100 - YESU NICIBUSA CINE

WHAT A FRIEND WE HAVE IN JESUS!

1. Yesu ni Cibusa cine, Atufwilile ifwe!
Nomba tungasenda fyonse, Kuli Lesa mwipepo:
Lintu tulecule cibi, Mutende tuleposa,
Ifi fyonse pa mulandu, Twafilwa ukupepa!

2. Bushe tuletunkwa cibi, Satana atucusha?
Tatwanashiwe kul ' ifi, Tutwale kwa Katula;
Tapali umbi nga Yesu, Atwafwa kuli fyonse,
Alishiba tulenaka, Akatupela maka.

3. Mwe Katula watemwikwa. Umfwa ipepo lyesu;
Fintu fyonse fyatucusha. Tuleta kuli Imwe:
Bantu besu batulabe, Yesu takatulabe;
Mumaboko atwikata, Tusanga umutende.

title: 101 - YESU WA CIKUKU ALEKWTA
content:
101 - YESU WA CIKUKU ALEKWTA

JESUS IS CALLING

1. Yesu wa cikuku alekwita, Alekwita, Alekwita,
Cinshi 'we wingafumino kwali, No kuye ciyeyeye?


CHORUS:
A ... lekwita, A ... lekwita,
Wa-cikuku, Wa luse Yesu alekwita.

2. We wanaka Yesu alekwita, Alekwita iso tushe;
Isa ne cisendo cobe 'kwali, Ena tet' akutamfye

3. 'Sa kuli Yesu alekulinda, 'Lekulinda, 'lekulinda,
Leta ububi pa nkasa shakwe, Endesha walacelwa.

4. Yesu 'lepapata Umfwe shiwi, Mumfwe lelo, mumfwe lelo;
Abasumina pe shina lyakwe, Mwandi bakasekela.

title: 102 - MWISWILE ENGILE
content:
102 - MWISWILE ENGILE

LET HIM IN

1. Mweni ali pa mwinshi E ... ngile
(mwiswile ngile, mwiswile ngile);
Eshilepofye kale E ... ngile
(mwiswile 'ngile, mwiswile 'ngile);
Mwiswile Iyo talaya, Mwiswile wa mushilo,
Yesu mwana wa Mfumu E ... ngile
(Mwiswile 'ngile, Mwiswile 'ngile).

2. Shi mwiswile mutima E ... ngile
(mwiswile 'ngile, mwiswile 'ngile);
Nga wakokola leya E ... ngile
(mwiswile 'ngile, Mwiswile 'ngile);
Mwiswile e Cibusa, Mwiswile wa mushilo;
No kufika ku mpela E ... ngile
(mwiswile 'ngile, mwiswile 'ngile).

3. Umfwa alepapata E ... ngile
(Mwiswile 'ngile, Mwiswile 'ngile);
Nomba iwe mwiswile E ... ngile
(mwiswile 'ngile, mwiswile 'ngile).
Eminine pa mwinshi, Uleba wa kutemwa;
No kucindika Ena E ... ngile
(Mwiswile 'ngile, mwiswile 'ngile).

title: 103 - MULEFY ALWA LIBILI
content:
103 - MULEFY ALWA LIBILI

YE MUST BE BORN AGAIN

1. Chilolo aishi-le kuli Yesu,
Kumwipusha ifya lupusukilo,
Mfumu nayo yamwaswike bwino,
"Mufya-lwe libili."


CHORUS:
"Mufya-lwe libili. Mufya-lwe libili,
Ndemweba ine ifya cine cine, mufyalwe libili."

2. Mwe bana baba-ntu kutikeni,
Mashiwi ayafuma kuli Yesu,
Mwiya mona yamashiwi nga yafye,
"Mufya-lwe libili."

3. Mwe bakwingila-mo mubutusho,
Nokwimbo lwimbo ulwabapusuka,
Nga mulefwaya ukusango mweo,
"Mufya-lwe libili."

title: 104 - KALUBULA ISA
content:
104 - KALUBULA ISA

COME GREAT DELIVERY, COME

1. Ngumfwe Mfumu, umbelelyo luse kalubula isa;
Mweo wandi ule mufuluka, kalubula isa;


CHORUS:
Naile kumpili kwa talala,
kutalyu kufuma kumwesu.
Shi mbuleni mbikeni mwicinka
kalubula isa;

2. Nshi kwete cifulo, nelye nganda kalubula isa;
Mweo lubuto fyaba kuli mwe. kalubula isa.

3. Nshila yana-sha makasa yandi, Kalubula isa:
Cimwemwe cobe condekabila, kalubula isa.

4. Nangu waka-na ukwesha kwandi, kalubula isa;
Sakamano kupapata kwandi, kalubula isa.

title: 105 - WENA ALl NA MAKA
content:
105 - WENA ALl NA MAKA

ABLE TO DELIVER

1. We-na li na maka E-nga pususha,
Uku-pokolo-lo Yo wasumina:
Kufuma mumulilo kubonaushi;
Yesu apususha uwasumina.


CHORUS:
Kut‘ akupusu-sha ku-poko-lola,
we we munyi-na nga wasu-mina.

2. Busho'li namaka! nga Mpokolola?
Bushe ku-lya maka yampokolola?
Njebekeshe cine ngalipa iwe;
Nga a mpokolola kuli Satana?

3. E-na Ii na maka witutuma fye!
We bombela Yesu-le kupususha;
Wi tina Satana, mwikate Yesu,
Iwe witwishika mu-cetekele.

title: 106 - KULENI PALIBWE
content:
106 - KULENI PALIBWE

BUILDING ON THE ROCK

1. Fwe tu-le kula. Pe bwe lyesu,
Libwe lya bumi ni Ye-su;
Emo tukoba fya bu-kali,
Ilyo kukabo bubi.


CHORUS:
Kuleni ... Palibwe .. ,
Kuleni ... palibwe,
Tukule pa mwalala wakosa,
Palibwe ni-Yesu.

2. Bamo bakula pamisenga.
Pakutemwishe fya ca-lo;
Na pa mabimbi ya macusho,
Pakutemwishe calo

3. O! we kula palya pe na pe,
Ilya kosesha lya ci-ne;
Lyena likeka-lilila pe,
E bupususho bwesu.

title: 107 - NJEBO MULUMBE WA YESU
content:
107 - NJEBO MULUMBE WA YESU

TELL ME THE STORY OF JESUS

1. Njeba mulumbe wa Yesu, Ulembe pa mutima:
Njeba mulumbe usuma. Ndeutemwisha kumfwa
Njeba ifyo baimbile, ilyo Yesu afyelwe,
Ululumbi kuli Lesa, No mutende ku bantu.


CHORUS:
Njeba mulumbe wa Yesu, Ulembe pa mutima;
Njeba mulumbe usuma, Ndeutemwisha kumfwa.

2. Talile mu ciswebebe, Njeba fya nshita ilya;
Atunkwa ku bubi bwesu, lelo alianshishe:
Njeba conse acitile, Njeba bulanda bwakwe,
Asalwilwe, acushiwe; Ushakwete ing'anda.

3. Njeba ine fya lupanda, Apo Yesu' aculile;
Njeba munshinshi alele, Nefyo atutubwike;
Umulumbe wa kutemwa, Ndemona nomba bwino,
Webe kuli ine nomba, Kutemwa kwandubwile.

title: 108 - NO KUTEMWA YESU
content:
108 - NO KUTEMWA YESU

LOVINGLY TENDERLY CALLING

1. Yesu ni Kakumba, alekwitila
Mukati ke cinka emofili fifulo;
Iseni mwe-bakulu, na baice bonse;
Mwingile mubutusho, mwingile mu cine.


CHORUS:
Nokutemwa Yesu alekwita,
We waluba Yesu alekwita,
Naiminina lekulindila;
Yesu Kakumba wandi.

2. Yesu Kakumba wine, afwilile iwe;
Alekwita no luse, we waluba isa;
Butuka ubusanso, isa alekwita,
Ingila mu mutende, ingila utushe.

3. Wipembelela Panse Mimbulu yafula;
Ilefwaya impanga, shalubila panse,
Kakumba wakutemwa; Alekwita iwe,
Mwicinka mubucingo, Isa emo tushe.

title: 109 - WAPIMWA WAPELUKA
content:
109 - WAPIMWA WAPELUKA

WEIGHED AND WANTING

1. Lintu Kapingula 'ka-tu-pima fya mu mutima,
Bushe tukaba baci-ne, Nangula ifinangwa?



CHORUS:
Wabika 'we pa cipimo, Na-upelu-ka;
Nupimwa ne shiwi lyakwe, Na-upelu-ka,

2. Tukomfwe shiwi lyaku-ti, "Wacita bwino iwe,"
Nangu bushe tukomfwa-’ti, "Iwe naupeluka."

3. Natumumfwile Mupa-shi, IIy' aletupapata,
Nga twacelwa tukomfwa-’ti, "Inshita nomba yapwa."

title: 110 - BALISHUKA ABAYACITA
content:
110 - BALISHUKA ABAYACITA

BLESSED ARE THEY THAT DO

1. Amashiwi ya Mupusushi,Umfwa yali aya mweo,
Uyasakamane umfwa Yes' ati, "Balishu-ka basu-nge funde."


CHORUS:
Balishu-ka bo bacite funde, Balishuka-, balishuka;
Balishu-ka bo bacite funde, Bali-shuka, balishuka.

2. Ukulau-mfwa amafunde, Pamo na ma-layo yakwe,
Kuyomfwa, kutina, tacili kantu, Balishu-ka abo bacita.

3. Bena bakengila mu m’sumba, Tabakasa-ngwe no bubi;
Bakashi-lishiwa ukwape na pe, Bakalya ku muti wa mweo.

title: 111 - TAKULI NAKALYA
content:
111 - TAKULI NAKALYA

NO, NOT ONE

1. Tatwaba na chibusa nga Yesu takuli nakalya,
Uinga tuposhe mitima yesu takuli nakalya.


CHORUS:
Alishibo kuchula kwesu twakula sungwa suke se,
Takwaba na chibusa nga Yesu takuli nakalya

2. Chibusa weswena wa mushilo, takwabo linga Yesu,
Uwaicefya uwafukisha, takwabo linga Yesu.

3. Takwaba nshite lyabo kutali, Alaba apepi;
Takwaba bushikwi lya shibapo, Alaba mupepi.

4. Takwaba chibuso yo atamfya, Takwaba we nakalya,
Nangu mubi uyo ashingafwaya, T'akwaba we nakalya.

5. Tatwakwate chabupe nga Yesu takwaba nakalya;
Bushe akatila nshi mwishibe Awe ta-kwakabe

title: 112 - KUPUSUKA LOLESHA
content:
112 - KUPUSUKA LOLESHA

LIFE IN A LOOK

1. Pa lupanda pa-liba umweo. Yes' ati, "Lolesha Ine;"
Ifyuma fya mu calo fibi, Kano ifyuma fya pa lupanda.


CHORUS:
Kupusu ka lolesha, lolesha pa Kalvari
Tupelwa kupusuka Kumona pa Kalvari.

2. l-lyo nalole-sha Mupusushi, Namona cimwemwe cakwe;
Nga naponena mu matunko, Ndasanga amaka pa lupanda.

3. Na-ku-lacetekelo lupanda, Pamo na malayo yakwe;
Pa-ntu takawe mu matunko, Wacetekela maka ya mulu.

title: 113 - ALE ITA
content:
113 - ALE ITA

CALLING

1. Ne cikuku Yesu aleita 'we, Kwita iwe na ine;
A-Ii pa mwinshi alekulolela, Kulolela na ine.


CHORUS:
Isa ... Isa ... We waluba we bwela-;
No kutemwa Yesu alepapata.: ati, "We mubi isa."

2. Ci-nshi wakokwele lya le papata Kuli iwe na ine;
Walashima shime lyo alekwita, Kwita iwe na ine.

3. I-nshita ifyo ileyo lubilo, Kuli iwe na ine;
Bu-shiku bwa mfwa nabupalamina, Pali iwe na ine.

4. To-ntonkanya ubulayo alaya, Kuli iwe na ine;
Na-ngu twabipa kuti atwelela, 'lelo iwe na ine.

title: 114 - ICIPATA NA CISULWA
content:
114 - ICIPATA NA CISULWA

THE GATE OPEN FOR ME

1. Icipata nacisulwa, Mukati mulebeka;
Kubeka kwa pa lupanda, Kutemwa kwamoneka.


CHORUS:
Yangu luse lukalamba, Cipata canjiswililwe;
Ukwi-swilwa ine.

2. Naciswililwa fye bonse bafwayo kupusuka,
Bapina na bakankala, Mishobo ne mitundu.

3. Kabiyeni fye ku ntanshi, Cipata na cisulwa;
Pokeleleni 'lupanda, Mukapelwe citebo.

4. Kwishilya i-lya mumana, Tukatula ‘lupanda:
No kupelwa icitebo, No ku mutemwa kulya.

title: 115 - SHING' ANGA ALl MUPEPI
content:
115 - SHING' ANGA ALl MUPEPI

THE GREAT PHYSICIAN

1. Shing’anga ali mupepi, Uwa luse ni Yesu;
Lisansamusho mutima, Ishina lya kwa Yesu.


CHORUS:
I-mba lwimbo lusuma, Lwe-shina lya kwa Yesu;
'Shina ili lyacila, Yesu uwapalwa.

2. Lulumbi lube ku Mfumu. Ndemusumina Yesu,
Nalilitemwa Ishina, Ishina lya kwa Yesu.

3. Lifumya fibi no mwenso, Ishina lya kwa Yesu;
Ndatemwa ‘lyo ng'ufwe shina Lisuma lya kwa Yesu.

4. Lint' a-kalete citebo, Ca mweo no lulumbi;
Tukekala 'kalatweba, Ifyalupusukilo.

title: 116 - NANGU KAMO KULI YESU
content:
116 - NANGU KAMO KULI YESU

NOTHING FOR JESUS

1. Ngo muti-ma wa cula, Bushe tet' e-kale-mo?
Ku-sendwa ne fya calo, Bushe tet' e-kale-mo?
Mo-na 'le-kunta pa cibi, Aleko-nkosha fye lyonse;
U-mfwa a-lepa-pata, Bushe tet' e-kale-mo.

2. Wa-pose nshita shobe, Kwabule nci-to ya-kwe?
Wa-ona-ula maka, Kwabule nci-to ya-kwe?
Kwa-bula 'kwesho kucimfya, Na-ngu ku-letapo umo;
Na-ngu fye uwa-luba, Taubombe-le Yesu.

3. Wa-temwa fyamu calo, Yes' ena 'le-ti sha-ni?
Wa-kane ncito yakwe, Yes' ena ‘le-ti-sha-ni?
Wa-temwa fye ukwangala, Ne fyuma ifya mu calo;
No-kui-seke-sha fye, Yes' ena 'leti sha-ni?

4. Fi-mabu-la fye-ka fye, Ukwabule fitwa-lo?
U-Ii fye minwe-nkutwa, Ukwabule fitwa-lo?
Na-ngu ka-me taukwete, Na-ngu ni ncito ya maka;
Ta-ukwe-te bu-seko, Bwakukuma-nya Yesu.

title: 117 - NDEISA MFUMU
content:
117 - NDEISA MFUMU

I AM COMING LORD

1. l-shi-wi ndeumfwa, Lyanji-ta kuli 'We;
U-ku-sambwa mu mulopa, Ulya wasumine.


CHORUS:
Nde-isa Mfumu, Nji-se kuli 'We;
U-nsambe mu mulopa, Ulya wasumine.

2. Na-ngu-la ndi mubi, Yesu alintemwa;
A-lemfumye mpulumushi, A-le mpela maka.

3. Ye-su alenjita, No ku-temwa kwakwe;
Bu-su-mino alempela, Lu-se no mutende.

4. Lu-lu-mbi ku mfumu, Pa mu-lopa wakwe,
Na pa bupe bwa kwa Kristu, Bolo-loke bwesu.

title: 118 - APELE FYONSE
content:
118 - APELE FYONSE

JESUS PAID IT ALL

1. Ye-su anjeba 'ti, "Maka taukwete;
Pe-mpula upepe, Le-ta fyonse 'ko ndi.'


CHORUS:
A-pele fyonse, I-ne ndi wakwe,
Bu-bi e bwafitishe, Nde-bu-ta nge mpemba.

2. Ni-we weka mfumu, U-wa-kwata maka,
Ku-po-sha malwele, Ku-na-sho mutima.

3. Na-ngula nshakwata, Ica-kumupela;
Sa-mfye fyakufwala, Mu mu-lopa obe.

4. Ku-ci-puna cobe, E-ko nkeminina;
Nka-tu-le citebo, Pa-ma-kasa yobe.

title: 119 - IBIMBI LYA KUBUTISHA
content:
119 - IBIMBI LYA KUBUTISHA

THE CLEANSING WAVE

1. l-bimbi i-lya kashika Ku Kafukauka;
Ye-su Mfumu walashilwe, A-le tupususha.


CHORUS:
U-mumana naumona, 'Wa kunsangu-lula ine;
Na-mutasha Mfumu yandi, Pakubutisho mutima.

2. Na-ba ici-lengo cipya, Mulopa wanjita;
U-bubi bonse nabufwa, Bwa-shikwa mu m'lopa,

3. Na-laenda mu lubuto, pa mulu wa calo;
Ni-nsambwa ndi u-wabuta, Yesu muli ine.

4. We cikuku ca kulisha, Nsambe mu mulopa;
Ni Yesu fye 'waishiba, Yesu 'watanikwe,

title: 120 - NDESUMINA
content:
120 - NDESUMINA

I DO BELIEVE

1. Tata nomba naisa fye, Mwe Katula wandi;
Nga mulefuma kuli ‘ne Tata one nkaya kwi?


CHORUS:
Ndesumina shakalabe. Yesu amfwilile;
Asumishe umulopa, Kupususha ine.

2. Muli Yesu ndesumina, Peleni amaka;
No Bufwayo bonse bwandi, Mupele kuli 'ne.

3. Nalolesha menso yandi, Kuli Imwe Mfumu;
Ukuti ndepokelela, Bupe bwa Mupashi.

title: 121 - KUTEMWA KWA KWA YESU
content:
121 - KUTEMWA KWA KWA YESU

I WILL SING OF JESUS’ LOVE

1. Kutemwa kwakwa Yesu, Eko na ... kulaimba;
Pantu a- ntemwa kale, No kufwa pa Kalvari.


CHORUS:
Nakula ... i-mba lyonse, Kutemwa ... kwa-kwa Yesu;
Ukuti mbe no mweo, Wene e wamfwilile.

2. Nalila ne minsoshi, Na Yesu ... andilila;
Kupepa kwandi kwafye, Kano u-kwa kwa Yesu.

3. Kutemwa .. , kwa kwa Yesu, Kwacilo ... mulu, calo;
No bubi bwafitisha, Bukabu-ta nge mpemba.

4. Nshakuci tile kantu, Pakuti ... 'We untemwe:
Nakupa ... umutima. Ngafwa ku-ti nkutemwe.

title: 122 - KUCILI AFWAAFWI
content:
122 - KUCILI AFWAAFWI

NEARER STILL NEARER

1. Pe-pi pepi fye ku-li Imwe,
Mpa-lamike-ni 'Mwe Mu-pusushi;
Ku-li Imwe 'ko mpa-lamikwe,
Ntu-she muli 'Mwe Mfumu Mfisame.

2. Pe-pi pepi fye Mfu-mu yandi,
Ii, takuli cisuma naleta;
Ka-no imili-mo yabipa,
I-sambeni no mulo-pa wenu;
l-sambeni no mulo-pa wenu.

3. Pe-pi pepi fye mbe uwenu,
l-mpulumu-shi nshile-shifwaya;
l-filumba ne fya mu calo,
Mfu-mu mpeni Yesu wa-tanikwe;
Mfu-mu mpeni Yesu wa-Tanikwe.

4. Pe-pi naku-la-ba na Imwe,
Ku-suka nka-be ne Mwe ku mulu;
Nka-be na Imwe muyayaya,
Pe-pi pepi Mupusu-shi wandi;
Pe-pi pepi Mupusu-shi wandi.

title: 123 - INSHINA LYA MUSHILO
content:
123 - INSHINA LYA MUSHILO

THE HOLIEST NAME

1. Ishina ilya temwikwa Pa-calo na mu mulu;
Lyapelwe na Lesa Tata, U-mwana watemwikwa.


CHORUS:
Lyena Iya mushilo 'Shina lya kwa Yesu,
Ilyapelwe na Tata pa calo,
Lyaletelwe na bangeli ubushiku,
'Shina lya kwa Yesu Mfumu.

2. Lisansa-musho mutima, E-lwimbo 'ne ndeimba,
Nasumi-ne Shina lyakwe, Na-kula-lisosa pe.

3. Mutima wakulaimba U-kute-mwa kwa Mfumu;
Nakula-lilumbanya pe, I-shina lya kwa Yesu.

title: 124 - TE'NE KANO KRISTU
content:
124 - TE'NE KANO KRISTU

NOT I BUT CHRIST

1. Kano fye Ye-su eka acindikwe
Te 'ne iyo, Omfwike. 'moneke
Te 'ne kano Yesu ew' amoneke,
Mu mashiwi muli fyonse ncita.

2. Kano Kristu e wingapwa bulanda,
Kristu enga-kumune filamba;
Kano Kristu, engantule cisendo,
Kano Kristu, engamfumyo mwenso.

3. Kristu eka, Mashiwi yambi ya fye,
Kristu eka, Fyonse fingomfwika;
Kristu eka, Ine nshilipo kantu,
Kristu eka, Teti njilumbanye.

4. Te 'ne ni Kristu, E umpela fyonse,
Kristu eka, e maka e bumi;
E mubili, umweo na Mupashi;
Pano calo pamo na ku mulu,

title: 125 - AKASUBA PA LUPILI
content:
125 - AKASUBA PA LUPILI

THERE IS SUNLIGHT IN THE HEART

1. Akasuba pa lupili. Pamo na pa cimana;
Ulubuto lwa kasuba, Lulapwa lulaleka,
Lelo lubuto lwa cine. Lwaisulo mutima;
Pantu umwikala Yesu, Mulabuta fye lyonse.


CHORUS:
Ulubuto ulwawamisha. Lwamu mutima wandi,
Cimwemwe ica kwa Yesu, Lubuto ku mutima.

2. Naposa bulanda bwandi. Nge nsalu yabipisha,
Nabumfwika ubuseko, Mutima wandi wanga;
Na mu mushi wa lulumbi, Untu anteyanisha,
Mutima wandi ulanga, Nakulamukonka pe.

3. Mfumu yandi, walinshita, Na fyonse fyandi fyobe;
Lubuto ulwa kutemwa, Lubuto pali ine.
Namu mushi wa lulumbi, Untu anteyanisha;
Mutima wandi ulanga, Nakulamukonka pe.

title: 126 - NDI NO LWIMBO ULO NATEMWA
content:
126 - NDI NO LWIMBO ULO NATEMWA

SINCE I HAVE BEEN REDEEMED

1. Ndi nolwimbo ulo natemwa, Ilyo nalubwilwe;
Kwimbile Mfumu Katula, Ilyo nalubwilwe.


CHORUS:
Ilyo nalubwilwe, Ndelumbanya Katula,
Nakulalumbe Shina Pantu andubwile,
Nakulalumbo Mupusushi.

2. Kristu alansansamusha, Pantu andubwile;
Kucito bufwayo bwakwe, E cilambu candi.

3. Naliba no wa cishinka, pantu andubwile;
Alafwayo mweo wandi, Pantu andubwile.

4. Alinteyanishe ng'anda, Pantu andubwile;
'Ko nkekala muyayaya, Pantu andubwile.

title: 127 - ALINTEMWA
content:
127 - ALINTEMWA

HE LOVES ME TOO

1. Lesa amona ifyuni, Ena ‘lafitemwa;
Nga alitemwa ifyuni, Alintemwa ine.


CHORUS:
Alintemwa Alintemwa, Alintemwa ine:
Pantu alitemwa fyonse, Alintemwa ine.

2. Lesa abyala maluba, Ilyena Lisuma;
Nga alitemwa tuluba, Alintemwa ine.

3. Lesa apangile ifyuni, Fintu fyonse kuno;
Takalabe kana kakwe, Alitemwa bonse.

title: 128 - INSHITA YA KUPEPA
content:
128 - INSHITA YA KUPEPA

BLESSED HOUR OF PRAYER

1. Inshita ya kupepa ni ‘lyo twafininwa;
'Lyo tuya kuli Yesu cibusa wesu;
Nga twamucetekela, ena katulama,
Emuti ku-banaka, cisumo kuyo kwali.


CHORUS:
Nshita yapalwa, nshita ya kupepa,
Emuti kubanaka, cisumo kuyo kwali.

2. Inshita ya kupepa ni ‘lyo Yesu ‘lipo,
Ena wa luse kuli 'Iwe bana bakwe;
Masakamano yonse tubike pa nkasa,
Emuti kubanaka, cisumo kuyo kwali.

3. Inshita ya kupepa ni ‘lyo tuletunkwa,
Tuye ku mupusushi uwatutemwa;
No mutima wa luse alefumya fyonse,
E muti kabanaka, cisumo kuyo kwali.

4. Pa nshita ya kupepa tumucetekela,
Ukuti fyo tufwaya aletupela;
Nga twamucetekela akatukakula,
E muti kubanaka, cisumo kuyo kwali.

title: 129 - YESU ISENI MUTUPALE
content:
129 - YESU ISENI MUTUPALE

JESUS COME AND BLESS US

1. Yesu mwalilaya, Ko mwalongana,
Babili, batatu, mwishina lyandi,
Ndi pakati kenu, ici ca cine;
Twafukama Mfumu isa tupale.


CHORUS:
'Seni mutupale twamulolela
Yesu mutupale twamulo-lela.

2. Yesu mwali nefwe nshita yapita,
Tulemufwaisha kufike mpela;
'Sa Mfumu! Wapalwa wise tupale,
Tumfwe tubuleni, 'lyo tulebomba.

3. 'Lyo tulemwimbila, Yesu twafweni;
Kupapa-ta kwesu, Tumfweni Mfumu;
Twasumina imwe, Bucetekelo;
Mubengeshimishe munshila yesu.

title: 130 - NDIWENU MFUMU
content:
130 - NDIWENU MFUMU

I AM THINE O LORD

1. Ndi wenu Mfumu. naumfwe shiwi. lyanjeba kumutemwa;
Lelo ndefwaya kupalamina. Pepi pepi mwe Mfumu.


CHORUS:
Mpalamine pepi mwe Mfumu.
palya 'po mwamfwilile.
Mpalamine pepi mwe Mfumu.
Palya 'po mwandashilwe.

2. Kanjipe cipya kumubombela, Mpelwe maka cikuku;
Mpunamine ko mubusumino, Ndoshe ‘mo mufwaila.

3. Eyawame nshita napepamo, Ilyo mifukamina;
Na ine nsoshanye nemwe Lesa, Fyo nsosa ne cibusa.

4. Kwabako kutemwa nshingeshiba, Kanwe Iyo nkaye shilya;
Kwabakwe nseko nshingakumamo, kano ntushe muli 'Mwe.

title: 131 - KUTI NABA NGA YESU
content:
131 - KUTI NABA NGA YESU

MORE LIKE JESUS

1. Kuti naba nga Yesu; Ngaikala muli 'ne,
Mutende no kutemwa, Fyaisa-nge ci-pele
Mbe nga Yesu 'lyo nyenda, Ngo mulendo pa caIo
Mupina ku mupashi, Ikala-muli ine.

2. Nga koni kalelila, Alakabele nkumbu,
Nga lasunga tuseba, Akomfwa kwita kwandi,
Akamfunda kwikaIa, Nokunjelelo bubi,
Ndebo wa buta tutu, Ikala-muli ine.

3. Nga Yesu ilyo mpepa, Nga Yesu nshiku shonse
Ntusha pepi naiwe, Amenshi-yalipita,
Ukuti mfyalwe cipya, Ncite kufwaya kwenu,
Ndeba no busumino, Ikala-muli Ine.

title: 132 - MBE PEPI NOLUPANDA
content:
132 - MBE PEPI NOLUPANDA

NEAR THE CROSS

1. Mbe pepi no lupanda, Ekafukauka,
Ukundapwa kwa bonse, Kufuma ku Mfumu.


CHORUS:
M’lupanda M‘lupanda, Elulumbi lwandi,
Kufiko mweo wandi, Ukatushe kulya.

2. Uluse no kutemwa Pepi no lupanda,
No lubuto pali'ne, Nalunshinguluka.

3. Palupanda ndemona Umwana wa mpanga,
Ungafwa kuba pepi, Pepi fye na Iwe.

4. Apepi no lupanda nakulalolela,
Nsuke mfike kwishilya, 'Shilya lya mumana.

title: 133 - MUNSUMINISHE NYENDE NEMWE
content:
133 - MUNSUMINISHE NYENDE NEMWE

O LET ME WALK

1. Munsuminishe nyende nemwe, Pamo nga Enoki wakale.
Njikate ku maboko yenu, Mu nsuminishe nande nemwe,
Nangwi nshila nshileimona, Katula 'ne nyende nemwe.

2. Teti njesho kwenda neka, Makumbi yafisha kumulu,
Masanso nayo yafula, Ama cusho, nayo bwingi,
Cimana naco capunga, Shikulu 'ne nyende nemwe.

3. Mbike amaboko palimwe Ndekakulwa ndesekela,
Inkoseshe namu nshila, Pakusenda ulupanda,
Ku Zion nsuke mfike katula 'ne nyende nemwe.

title: 134 - UKUTEMWA KWA KUPAPA KWAKWA YESU
content:
134 - UKUTEMWA KWA KUPAPA KWAKWA YESU

WONDERFUL LOVE OF JESUS

1. Mucifulo ca mushilo, Mutima wandi waanga,
Bushe n' ani ungalanda, Ukutemwa kwakwa Yesu


CHORUS:
Ukutemwa, kwakupapa; Kutemwa kwakwa Yesu;
Ukutemwa, Kwakupapa; Kutemwa kwakwa Yesu.

2. Emutende akasuba, Elubuto namu mfifi;
Kula posha abalwele, Ukuteemwa kwakwa Yesu.

3. Alanjelela ububi, alanjimya ne nga nawa;
Mu mweo. nangu nimumfwa, Ukuteemwa kwakwa Yesu.

title: 135 - NALIKUTEMWA
content:
135 - NALIKUTEMWA

I LOVE THEE BETTER LORD

1. Nalikutemwa we Mfumu, Ukucila fyonse,
Pamutendyo yo wampela, Ushingonaulwa.


CHORUS:
Tatulati twebwe fyonse, Fyakutemwa kobe
Tatulati twebwe fyonse, Fyamulopa obe

2. Ninjishiboli mupepi, Nokucila fyonse;
Nelintu ntontonkanyeci, Mutima 'sekela.

3. Wambikila mo buseko, Eco ndesekela;
Kwabulo kutemwa kwenu, nga teti nsekele.

4. We mfumu yandi Katula! Ngacabefi nomba,
Tacakacilyo busuma, 'Lyo tukamonana?

title: 136 - KONSE 'KANTWALA
content:
136 - KONSE 'KANTWALA

I REMEMBER CALVARY

1. Konse kantwala 'ne nkaya.
Pantu namu cetekela;
Ndeibukisha pa lwandi;
Afwilile pa kalfali.


CHORUS:
Yes' akula ntangilila, Akasuba no bushiku
Cibusa wandi wacine, Amfwilile pa kalufali.

2. O ndetemwe funde lyakwe,
Nokutungululwa nankwe:
Bufwayo bwakwe nde temwa,
Bwashishiwe pa kalufali.

3. Kuntanshi 'ne nshakatine,
Yesu akaba naine;
Bushiku bumo nsubila,
Nkamumona mupusushi.

title: 137 - BULE CALO UMPE YESU
content:
137 - BULE CALO UMPE YESU

GIVE ME JESUS

1. Bule calo umpe Yesu,
Pantwi calo 'ci cafye;
Pantu ukutemwa kwakwe,
Kwabafyo kwa penape;


CHORUS:
Yangu ukutemwa kwakwe,
No luse lwafulisha;
Ubupususho kuli ‘fwe,
No mweo wape na pe.

2. Bule calo umpe Yesu,
Pant' eunsansamusha;
Nga ninga pempulwa nakwe,
Kuti na ansha bubi.

3. Bule calo umpe Yesu,
Mone cimwemwe cakwe;
Lubuto munshila yandi,
Lunsansamushe ine.

4. Bule calo umpe Yesu,
Lupanda ncetekele;
Bwino bwino Mfumu yandi,
Nkasuke nkamumone.

title: 138 - BULENI UMWEO WANDI
content:
138 - BULENI UMWEO WANDI

ENTIRE CONSECRATION

1. Bulen'umweo wandi. Mfumu yand'ube wenu,
Pamo ne minwe yandi. Icite fyo mwatemwa.


CHORUS:
Nsambeni mbute mumulopa, (mumulopa)
Nsambeni mbute mumulopa. (mumulopa)
Mfumu napela. Umweo nafyonse, Kube ukwa penape.

2. Bula makasa yandi, Yacite co lefwaya.
Shiwi nalyo limbile, Limbile Mfumu yandi.

3. Bule milomo yandi, Isose shiwi lyobe;
Ne mpiya shandi shonse. Ninsha po fye nakalya.

4. Bula inshiku shandi, Ne nshita yandi yonse;
Na mano yandi yonse, Fibomfye Mfumu yandi.

5. Bula bufwayo bwandi, Bucite bube bobe;
Bulo mutima wandi, Ube cipuna cobe,

6. Bula kutemwa kwandi, Kube pankasa shobe:
Naine wine pano, Ukuti mbe obe pe.

title: 139 - NINSANGA CIBUSA
content:
139 - NINSANGA CIBUSA

I’VE FOUND A FRIEND

1. Ninsanga cibusa uwacila. Uwantemenwe,
Ankula no mwa-ndo wakutemwa, Ndikuntu ali,
Mutima walikakwa no mwando uwakutemwa,
Yesu wandi na ine ndiwakwe ukwa penape.

2. Ninsanga cibusa uwacila, Ewamfwilile,
Te mweo weka untu ampele, No mwine pamo,
Conse ndi naco tecandi iyo, Ndemupela fye,
Mweo wandi wa-kwe nshita shonse, Ukwa penape.

3. Ninsanga cibusa uwacila, Apelwa maka,
Maka yakunsu-nga ilyo nyenda, Kuya kumulu,
Ululumbi ulubengeshima, Lumpela maka,
Nakulapempu-la noku bomba, Elyo nkatushe,

4. Ninsanga cibusa uwacila, Aba no luse,
Cilolo wama-no, Wa maka yonse nikacinga,
Kufumo kwali uwantemenwe, Ndasanga maka,
Nangu mweo i-mfwa nelyo kumbo, 'Nendifye wenu.

title: 140 - NAUMFWILE YESU ANJITA
content:
140 - NAUMFWILE YESU ANJITA

THE VOICE OF JESUS

1. Naumfwile Yesu anjita 'Leti iso tushe,
We wanaka biko mutwe, Pa cifuba candi,
Ilyo nai-le kuntwali, Nali wa bulanda,
Nshasangile mo kutusha, Nomba ndesekela.

2. Naumfwile Yesu anjita, Aleti ndekupa,
Amenshi ya mweo sonwe, Kut'ube no mweo,
Naishile kuli Yesu, Mulonga wa mweo,
Nomba nshili necilaka, Ndyu mumi muntwali.

3. Naumfwile Yesu ati; Ndi nyali ya calo,
Lolesha kuli ne iwe, Elyo kukabuta,
Ilyo nalo-leshe Wene, Naba ngo lutanda,
Nakulaya mulubuto, Nkasuke nkafike.

title: 141 - NABO WENU
content:
141 - NABO WENU

WHOLLY THINE

1. Ine mbe wenu Mupusushi,
Mfundisha we Mfumu;
Ine ncite kufwaya kwenu,
Ngafweni Mfumu


CHORUS:
Mbe wenu (Mfumu). Mbe wenu (Mfumu).
Uku kulaya kwandi Mbe wenu (Mfumu).
Mbe wenu (Mfumu),
Wenu nomba mwe Mfumu.

2. Cuma ca calo cili cafye, Ukwabu-la Imwe;
Pe shina Lyenu ndefisula, Mwe cuma candi.

3. Naposa fyoonse fya mu calo,
Mpalame ku Mfumu
Nasansamuke lyo mulipo
Mbe wenu Mfumu

title: 142 - BWALI WAMA
content:
142 - BWALI WAMA

HOW SWEET

1. Bushiku bwa mushilo bwali cile nshiku shonse,
Twitontonkanyapo fibi, Kano Lesa wesu.

2. Cisumo kumfwa ipepo, Ku-ule pepelela;
Kuti babi bala-pile, Kulola ku mulu.

3. Nga tufwaya kutamfyo bubi Ekw'ali umona;
Amona mu kati kesu, Kuti atwelela.

title: 143 - MUTUFUMYE NO BUPALO
content:
143 - MUTUFUMYE NO BUPALO

LORD DISMISS

1. Mutufumye no bupalo, Mu mitima yesu pe;
Tube no kutemwa kwenu, Twange no luse lwenu;
Mutukoshe, mutukoshe, Lyonse tuli pano nse.

2. No mucinshi twatotela, Pa fyebo ifisuma;
Cibe cakulya ca myeo, Cikale mu mitima;
Imwe bene, Imwe bene. Muleba ne fwe lyonse.

3. Nshiku shonse shesu Mfumu, Twashipela kuli ‘mwe;
Tusansamusheni lyonse, Tuketaba ne nseko;
Tukekala, tukekala, Na Yesu Inshiku pe.

title: 144 - MPIMPILA UKUYA KU MULU
content:
144 - MPIMPILA UKUYA KU MULU

HIGHER GROUND

1. Mpimpilo kuya ku mulu,
Ndanina inshiku shonse;
Ndalomba ilyo nde enda,
Ntila Mfumu nje ku mulu.


CHORUS:
Mfumu njimya njiminine.
Busumino bwa ku mulu;
Icifulo cacile ci,
Mfumu ndefwaya ku mulu.

2. Nshifwayo kwikala muno,
Mwaba macusho no mwenso;
Nangu bambi balefwaya,
Ine ndefwaya ku mulu.

3. Mfwayo kwikala ku mulu,
Nangu Satana ‘lencusha;
No busumino ndeumfwa
nyimbo sha bashila kulya.

4. Ndefwayo kuya ku mulu,
Ukuyaba no lulumbi;
Nanomba ncili ndepepa.
Muntungulule ku mulu.

title: 145 - IWE WILAKANA
content:
145 - IWE WILAKANA

ASK NOT TO BE EXCUSED

1. Iwe wilakana, eko ili ncito
'yo Lesa 'Iefwaya iwe kuyabomba;
Umfwa bwite bwakwe kuli 'we 'lekwita,
Cisumo kubomba, kubombelo mulu.


CHORUS:
Iseni (seni) mwikana kubomba,
Iteya (teya) nisheni kubomba,
Mwikana kubomba mukomfwa 'katila,
Kukana kubomba, mwakana no mulu.

2. Iwe wilakana Shikul' alekwita;
Walekana kale, Shi mumfwile lelo;
Mabala na yapya babomfi bacepa,
Sumina kubomba, Shi bombele Mfumu.

3. Mu kukane ncito no kucelwa celwa,
Mukano kutemwa kulya kwa ku mulu;
Ilyo luse lwakwe lulepapatila,
No kulango mulu, Isa 'sa welelwe.

title: 146 - IKALA MU M'TIMA
content:
146 - IKALA MU M'TIMA

THY LIFE WITHIN ME

1. Ikala mu m'tima wandi, O Yesu Mfumu,
Ngasukila fyonse, Ifyaba mu mutima,
Ikala muli 'ne u-ntungulule nshila,
Ukuti fye ndumone ululumbi lwenu.

2. Mubili waipela na usanguluka,
Ululumbi lwenu nalubekamuli 'ne,
No mubili wandi ube nomba uwenu,
Inshiku fye shonse, Ndecite fyo mufwaya .

3. Ifilundwa fya uko fyonse fimumfwile,
Ukuti mufibomfye monse mufwaila,
Ukuipela u-kwabula ukushako,
Ukuba wacincila ku mulimo wenu.

4. Ukutusha kwa cine kukaba muli 'ne,
Nkalamulolela ilyo fye mukamfwaya,
Ikala muli 'ne, 0 Yesu Mfumu yandi,
Ungasukileko ifyaba mu mutima.

title: 147 - MPALAMIKWE MUPEPI
content:
147 - MPALAMIKWE MUPEPI

DRAW ME CLOSER TO THEE

1. Tata mumpalamike, Ndefwaya mfukatilwe ;
Mbe fye mu maboko yenu, Kuti nsange kutusha.


CHORUS:
Mpa-lamikwe mupepi,
Mpa-lamikwe kuli Imwe,
Mpa-lamine pepi na 'Mwe

2. Mupusushi 'ne mbe pepi, Nimfuma kuli Iwe,,
Ng’ufwe naumfukatila, Ndi mu maboko yenu.

3. Mupashi mpalamikile Kuti mbe fye na Iwe,
Mbutisheni umutima, Munsambe mbute tutu.

title: 148 - KONSE KONSE NA YESU
content:
148 - KONSE KONSE NA YESU

ANYWHERE WITH JESUS

1. Konse konse na Yesu kuti naya.
Konse ngantungulula mu calo 'ci,
Nga Yesu talipo tekuti ntemwe,
Konse konse nge pwali kuti naya.


CHORUS:
Konse fye. konse fye. tekuti ntine;
Konse nga Yesu alipo kuti naya.

2. Konse konse na Yesu nshili neka.
Nangu nkanwe ne fibusa fya calo;
Nangu inshila ibe yabipisha,
Nga Yesu alike kutifye naya.

3. Konse kuli Yesu ningasendama.
Nangu ningashingulukwa ne mfifi,
