Ninjishiba 'kanjimya 'kwapenape,
Konse kukaba Yesu ni kumwesu

title: 149 - ENDA MU LUBUTO
content:
149 - ENDA MU LUBUTO

WALK IN THE LIGHT

1. E-nda mu lubuto wape-lwa lukutungulule,
'Mupa-shi kufuma ku mulu, Winga fumye mfifi


CHORUS:
E-nda mu lubuto, E-nda mu lubuto,
E-nda mu lubuto, Mu lubuto ulwa Mfumu.

2. Enda mu lubuto lwe landwe, shiwi lya kwa Lesa,
Lula batungulula bonse, 'Ba cine 'ba Mfumu.

3. Na-ngu mwabe mfifi ‘mo leya, Enda mu lubuto,
Mfifi ‘letina ulubuto, Ku kwisa kwa Mfumu.

4. E-nda mu lubuto ulwakwe, Elyo 'kamutemwa.
Kumu-temwa pano pa ca-lo, Cikacila kulya

title: 150 - ABASEPA BALI KWI?
content:
150 - ABASEPA BALI KWI?

WHERE ARE THE REAPERS?

1. Yangu bakusepa nga bali kwi,
Abengalobolola mu fibi,
Ukulobolola ukwa cine,
Kukana 'tusha basuke bapwe.


CHORUS:
Abakusepa nga bali kwi,
Bakwisa bomba bulobololo?
Abakutwafwa ukusepa,
Kufumya bantu mu fyabipa.

2. Kabiyeni mu tushila tonse,
Kafwayeni ngano mu fisoso;
Fwayeni na mu misebo monse,
No kwisabengisha mu bufumu.

3. Mabala nayapya konse konse,
Yalelindililo kusombolwa:
Yakulisha, babomfi bacepa;
Yal'onaika nga twakokola.

4. Eco ishileni ne fikwakwa,
Mwe bana mukolonganye ngano,
Bombeni isuke Mfumu ise,
Ikapwishe bulimi ne nseko.

title: 151 - BUSHE NKABA NE NTANDA KULYA?
content:
151 - BUSHE NKABA NE NTANDA KULYA?

WILL THERE BE ANY STARS

1. Ndetontonkanya le-Io calo cisuma,
Nkafika-ko bushi-ku bumo,
Mu luse lwa Mupusushi nkeminina,
Mukabe ntanda mu citebo.


CHORUS:
Bushe mukaba ne ntanda mu citebo,
Ilyo a kasuba kakawa?
Ilyo nkashibuka muma sano yakwe,
Bushe nkaba ne ntanda kulya?

2. Mombe no kupepa mumaka ya Mfumu,
Mbe nga kalinda uwa mweo,
Kuti nkabe ne ntanda bulya bushiku,
Lintu Yesu 'Kalumbaniwa,

3. Bushe cikaba shani 'lyonkamumona.
Ilyo nkamupele fya bupe,
Nkasekela ilyo nkaba mumusumba,
No kufwi-kwe cite-bo kulya.

title: 152 - LANDA KULI INE
content:
152 - LANDA KULI INE

YESU SPEAK TO MY SOUL

1. Landa kuli- ‘ne Yesu, Ne shiwi lya luse,
Ne shiwi lya kutemwa; "Taushele weka."
Njiswila umuti-ma, Umfwe shiwi lyobe,
Muti wa-ndi wange no kutasha Imwe.


CHORUS:
Landeni kuli ine, Shiwi lya mutembo,
"Ukaba wa kucimfya, Ukaba muntungwa."
Landa kuli 'ne Mfumu, Shiwi lya kutemwa,
Landa kuli 'ne lyonse, Ng'ufwe shiwi lyobe.

2. Landa ku bana bobe, Batungululeni,
Besulemo ukwanga, Besule kupepa,
Baipele kuli 'we ne mitima yonse,
Bwise bufumu bwenu, Tumumone,

3. Landa pamo nga kale, Njishibe fyo fwaya,
Njishibe ncito yandi, Njisushishe funde,
Lekeni mucindike noku mulumbanya,
Ncite kufwaya kobe, Nshiku shandi shonse.

title: 153 - LELO LYEKA
content:
153 - LELO LYEKA

JUST FOR TODAY

1. Mfu-mu fya mailo tefyo, Nshi-lelomba;
Nda-meni mfume ku bubi, Lelo line;
Ni-sosa mashiwi yabi, Ya-shelelwe,
Su-ngeni milomo yandi tela line.

2. Ni-ngabombe ncito yenu no kupepa;
Mu-mashiwi mube 'luse, Lelo line:
Nci-te ubufwayo bwenu, Ne cumfwilo;
No-kuipela nemwine, Lelo line.

3. Nga umweo wandi lelo, Ine nafwa;
Le-keni bulayo bwenu, Bube bwandi;
Nshi-lelomba fya mailo, kano lelo;
Mfu-mu munjikatilile, Lelo line.

title: 154 - KALINDA NJEBA WATCHMAN TELL ME
content:
154 - KALINDA NJEBA WATCHMAN TELL ME

1. Kalinda, njeba bushe u-bushiku buli shani?
Bushe amalangililo ya kwisa yali 'pepi?
We mulendo ima bwaca! Mona kasuba katula;
Ima fwalila bwala ca; Lucelo na lufika.

2. Kalinda, mona lubuto lule butishe nshila;
Malangililo pa calo, Yatwebo kwisa kwakwe;
Lint' ipenga likalila, Kwimya bonse 'basendama,
'Bashila bali mutulo, Kufwalo muyayaya.

3. Mona bwafika bushiku Bukulu bwe Sabata;
Bonse natubilikishe, Bufumu bwapalama;
Yangu! Namona pe shilya, Lulumbi lwenu Kenani;
No musumba wa wamisha, Yerusalemu mupya.

4. Njeba fya musumba ulya, Wakulwa na Sahabu,
Umusumba wa kwa Lesa, Wa cine wa mutende;
Kwabe mpili shabekesha, Ukubeka nga Sahabu;
Imimana ya wamisha, Yafimbwa na maluba.

5. Mone mpanga ilyapepi, Fitwalo tafikuba,
Kulya kwaliba fyo kwanga! Mu mpanga yawamisha;
Umfwe ciunda ca nyimbo, Icilesendwa no mwela;
Minshipendwa ileimba, Twalaba nabo kulya.

title: 155 - NKAYA KONSE 'KO LEFWAYA
content:
155 - NKAYA KONSE 'KO LEFWAYA

I’LL GO WHERE YOU WANT ME TO GO

1. Limbi teti cibe pa mpili, nangula ni kwishilya;
Nangu tekubulwi ‘lemfwaya, Ukuti ine njeko;
Lelo nga nau-mfwa i-shiwi kuntu-ma uko nshishibe,
Nkayasuke Mfumu yandi nkatila, Ntuma konse fye 'ne ndeya.


CHORUS:
Nkaya, konse 'ko lefwaya Mfumu.
Mu mpili, mu fimana monse;
Nkalanda ico ulefwaya nande,
No kuba ifyo u-fwaya.

2. Limbi Yes'ali na mashiwi, Yant' alefwaya nsose;
Limbi ni ku muntu waluba uwalufya inshila:
O Mupusushi--ntungulula, Nangu nshila 'yi yafita;
Shiwi lyandi liketabile lyenu, Nkasosa ico ufwaya.

3. Eko fili pano fisabo, Fili no kusombolwa;
Kuli ncito 'yo ningabomba, Yesu uwatanikwe,
Nabika fyonse fye pali 'Mwe, Awe 'Mwe mwalintemwa;
Nakulacita ubufwayo bwenu, No kuba ifyo mufwaya.

title: 156 - AMASHIWI Y ABUKALI
content:
156 - AMASHIWI Y ABUKALI

ANGRY WORDS LET THEM NEVER

1. Amashiwi yabukali, Yeba mutunwa twenu,
Eyabifya umutima Nokukowesha milomo


CHORUS:
"Temwaneni" -- efyasose Mfumu,
Bana umfwileni funde lyakwe,
"Temwaneni" -- efyasose Mfumu.
Bana umfwileni funde.

2. Citemwiko calibuta, Kabili camushilo.
Lekeni mwiconaula. Namashiwi yashawama.

3. Amashiwi yabukali, Yasoswa mulubilo,
Eyabifya umutima, Yonaula bucibusa

title: 157 - ULYA UYA ILYO ALILA
content:
157 - ULYA UYA ILYO ALILA

HARVEST TIME

1. Ulya uya ilya lila, Nokutanda imbuto-o,
Ukwabula ukunaka, Akabelelwo luse.


CHORUS:
Shilolesha! We mulimi, Imbuto nomba shapya;
Mona amabala yapya yapembwa Ukusepwa

2. Kalabalika kasuba, Ne mfula ilaloka-a,
Ifitwalo filakula namaka yakumulu.

3. Tande mbuto wilanaka, witina winashiwa-a,
Nangu kube amacusho, Ukaba mubuseko.

title: 158 - KUSOMBOLE CALO NAKUPALAMA
content:
158 - KUSOMBOLE CALO NAKUPALAMA

HASTEN ON GLAD DAY

1. Kusombole calo nakupalama,
Imfumu leita bakusombola,
Ingano nashipya kutal’apepi,
Shilongelwe nombe 'ilyo talaisa.


CHORUS:
'Sa we bu-shiku, Ubwaku-sekela,
Sendeni mipo, Ku-mu-shi.

2. Ulucelo lulya luli fya pepi,
Umo mo tatwakaponye filamba;
Nangu bubi bwali bifishe ngano,
Shikalonganikwa kufike mpela.

3. Cawa-mo kubomba ukwa kutemwa!
Pantu kwaba nga kukafukauka,
Kutwita nokutulango kubomba;
Ala kutemwa kubombe milimo.

title: 159 - MFUMU ‘NE NDAMUFWAISHA
content:
159 - MFUMU ‘NE NDAMUFWAISHA

HOW MUCH I NEED THEE

1. Mfumu 'ne, Ndamufwaisha! Nangu ndi mubi mpofu;
Mundame, muntungulule, ukuti mbe na maka.


CHORUS:
We mfumu nshita sho-nse
Ndakufwa-isha lyo-nse
Undame, Mfumu yandi,
Unsunge nshita shonse.

2. Mfwikeni mwingila wenu, uwandi walibipa;
Nangeni bunake bwandi, Ekuti nsange amaka.

3. Ndi bwino nga mwe mwandama, Nekafye kuti nawa!
Twende nemwe munshileyi, Uli lubuto lwandi

4. Ifili kuntanshi yandi; Buseko nangu bubi,
Nshakafume fye kuli we, Niwe fye wakungafwa.

title: 160 - NINDAMINWA FYE YESU
content:
160 - NINDAMINWA FYE YESU

KEPT FOR JESUS

1. Nindaminwa fye Yesu! mpe-lwa maka yakwe;
Nokufuma kubu-bi, Kwendo mwaendele


CHORUS:
Nalaminwa fye Yesu! Ndi pankasa shakwe;
Nshilipwe cintu, Ndifyo wafye, kano Yesu eka.

2. 'Kulaminwa fye Ye-su! Kucitefya fwaya,
Neite bufwayo bwa-kwe, Mubombele ine.

3. Yesu munsunge bwino, Ntaluke fya calo,
Uwaitwa-la panshi, Wabuto mu-tima.

4. 'Kulaminwa fye Ye-su kuba wakwe lyonse,
Ukubafye uwa-kwe, ukwamuya-yaya.

title: 161 - NALIBA NO WANTEMWA
content:
161 - NALIBA NO WANTEMWA

MY LORD AND I

1. Naliba nowantemwa, Cibusa wacine;
Alintemwisha kwacine, Ecibusa wandi;
Teti mfume uko ali, Kano fye apepi,
Nokwikala fye pamo, Ine na-nkwe.

2. Naliba uwanaka Mfumu yalishiba,
Ndashintilila ukwali, Alangafwa ine;
Alantungulula ine, Lubuto munshila,
Tulendelafye pamo, Ine na-nkwe.

3. Ubulanda ‘bo mweba, Nobuseko bwandi,
Ndamweba ifinsekesha, Pamo nefimbifya,
Alanjeba fyakucita. Alanjebo kwansha,
Tulalandila pamo lne na-nkwe.

4. Alishiba ndafwaya, Kupususha bambi,
Alanjeba kuya ine kuya mulandila,
Kuya sose ilandwelyo. Neco afwilile,
Tula bombela pamo, Ine na-nkwe.

title: 162 - YESU ALENTUNGULULA
content:
162 - YESU ALENTUNGULULA

ALL THE WAY

1. Yesu alentungulula; Bushe mfwaye na cimo?
Ntwishike uluse lwakwe, Untungulula lyonse?
Umutende waku mulu, M'busumino ndi nao
Conse ii-cinga mponena, Kut'a ncitila bwino,
Conse ii-cinga mponena, Kut'a ncitila bwino.

2. Yesu alantungulula, Mo nyenda lansekesha;
Alangafwa mumatunko, Nokumpele cakulya,
Nangu nanaka ukwenda, Nomutima wauma,
Kuntanshi yandi namona, Amenshi yakungafwa,
Kuntanshi yandi narnona, Amenshi yakungafwa.

3. Yesu alantungulula, Nokutemwa kwa cine
Alandaya icifulo, Mung'anda yakwa Tata;
Ilyo nkemina ku mweo, Nkapupuka kumulu,
Lukabe lwimbo penape, Yesale ntungulula,
Lukabe lwimbo penape, Yesale ntungulula.

title: 163 - EPO NDI NTUMENI
content:
163 - EPO NDI NTUMENI

HERE AM I SEND ME

1. Umfwa Yesu aleita, "Nani 'leya kubomba?"
Mabala nayapya kale, "Nani ‘leya sombola?"
Shikulu abilikisha, Cilambu kapelwafye;
Nan'engasuka no kwanga, Epo ndi tuma Mfumu

2. Nga tekuti iwe uye, Kwishilya lya fimana;
Kuti wabasanga bantu, Abalya pepi nobe,
Tetyu lande ngo mungeli, Nangufye nga Paulo,
Landa kutemwa kwa Yesu, Bebyatya limufwila.

3. Nga teti ube kalinda, pa mulu wa Zioni,
Kulange nshita yamulu, Nomutende kubantu,
Ukupepelela bambi Kucite ncito yakwe,
Kuti waba nga Aroni, Uwa afwile Mose.

4. Lintu abantu balefwa, Shikulu alekwita;
Leko munt'eumfwo leti, 'Ne teti ncite kantu;
Kabombe ncito 'kupela, temwa kumubombela,
Asuka ily'alekwita, Tila ndi pano ntuma.

title: 164 - PAMAKASA YAKWA YESU
content:
164 - PAMAKASA YAKWA YESU

AT THE FEET OF JESUS

1. Pa-makasa yakwa Yesu, ndomfwa mashiwi yakwe!
Mucifulo ica wa-ma nsangwe mwenshiku shonse,
Pa-makasa yakwa Yesu, ndamone fya kunuma,
Kutemwa kwakwo kwacila, kuwamyo mweo wandi.

2. Ni-kwi ninga sange shuko? Kano pa nkasa shakwe,
Nshe-po bubi no bulanda, elyo nsange kutusha;
Pa-makasa yakwa Yesu, ntule bulanda bwandi.
Nda-sange cikuku ca-kwe noku nsansamusha pe.

3. Mpa-leni ne mupusushi, lyondi pa nkasa shenu
Umbeleleko uluse, mone icinso cobe;
Nkwate ulya umutima. uwaba muli Yesu,
Nshininkishe ndi na Yesu, ubololoke bwandi.

title: 165 - NATEMWA
content:
165 - NATEMWA

I LOVE THEE

1. Natemwa, natemwa. na-temwe Mfumu;
Natemwo m'pusushi, na-temwa Lesa,
Nalikutemwisha, we walishiba;
Nga nali-kutemwa, mu-lifyo ncita.

2. Ndeanga, ndeanga, ndeanga nganshi;
Ukucankwa kwandi, ukushakapwe;
Ndefuluka kulya, kwabo bulayo;
Ukuka-ba Yesu 'lyo na bangeli.

3. Mupusu-shi wandi, Nshuka ngepoli,
Niwe mweo wandi, kwanga butusho;
Ukute-mwa kobe, Elwimbo lwandi;
Nda sansamushiwa, no luse lobe.

4. Nani wa-ba ngo mupu-sushi wandi?
Alinte-mwa ine, ‘langafwa lyonse;
Nakula mutasha, Nokumwimbila;
Nokutemwa lyonse, mu-tima wandi.

title: 166 - MWE CILIBWE CA KALE
content:
166 - MWE CILIBWE CA KALE

ROCK OF AGES

1. Mwecilibwe ca kale, Kamfisame muli Mwe,
Umulopa na menshi, Fyafumine muli Mwe
Ekundapwa kwa fibi, Nsangululwe kububi.

2. Milimo ya maboko, Tetici-te mafunde,
Maka yandi nemwine, Nokuponya filamba,
Tekuti fi fintule, Kanofye Imwe Yesu.

3. Takuli co naleta, Njikate ku lupanda;
Mumfwike ndi no bwamba, Ngafwa, nimbulwa maka;
Naisa kuli Imwe, Munsambe ninkesa fwa.

4. Ilyo nkaleko mweo, Yakashibata menso;
Nokwikala mu mfifi, Ndolele bupingulo;
Mwe cili-bwe cakale, Kamfisame muli mwe.

title: 167 - CITENDEKELO ICI
content:
167 - CITENDEKELO ICI

FIRM FOUNDATION

1. Cite-ndekelwe ci mwebashila ba Mfumu,
Bucetekelo bwenu mwishiwi lyakwe,
Cinshi cimbi cacila ci casosele;
Iseni kumupusushi mwe mwise mufisame,
Iseni mwe ku mupusushi mufisame.

2. Nangu nkakwitila mumenshi yatali,
Mimana yamacusho tayakasende
Amacusho yobe yakaba mapalo,
Pantu nkaba naimwe mumacusho fye yonse,
Nokukushilisha mumacusho fye yonse.

3. Namgu ukende mumacusho yamulilo,
Cikuku candi cikalaba fye nobe;
Nangu mucilunga camulilo mo kaba,
'Kasungululwa bwino pamo fye nga Golide;
Mulilo ukafumya fyonse fyabipa.

4. Mutima ushintilila fye kuli Yesu,
Nshakatale ngusha weka kubalwani;
Nangu fya kashingulukwa nama cusho,
Nshamulekeleshe Nshakafume kuntwali;
Nshakatale ne Mfumu fye ukuntwali.

title: 168 - JEHOVA MUCEMI  WANDI
content:
168 - JEHOVA MUCEMI WANDI

THE LORD IS MY SHEPHERD

1. Yehova muceni wandi nshakakabile kantu,
Andi-sha na mumulemfwe uteku ine ntushe,
Ala-ntungulula 'ne ku menshi yasuma,
Ambwesha mu nshila Antungulula mumacusho.


2. Kabili lyo nyenda mu mupokapoka uwa-mfwa,
Mwandi niwe kafwa wandi, nshiletina bubi;
Nkonto yobe no mutambu fyakulansunga:
Teku-ti ububi bwise kuli-ne ngoli 'pepi.

3. Wang'anshikile cintamba candi ilyo ndecula;
Nama-palo yengi luko-mbo lwandi lwaisula;
Amafuta yawamisha mwansu-bo mutwe.
Cinshi ningepusha ukucilo kusungwa ngo ku

4. Mfumu lekeni busuma bwenu 'bo bufulishe,
Lyonse nakula mukonka nsuke mfike ku mwenu;
Ndefwa-ye nshila ya kale umo baendele;
Nokwe-nda munshila yabo kufika naku mulu

title: 169 - WE MPYANI YA BUFUMU
content:
169 - WE MPYANI YA BUFUMU

HEIRS OF THE KINGDOM

1. We mpyani ya bufumu walalila nshi?
Wa-lalila nshi pepi no mushi?
Ala endesha imo fwale nkwela,
We mpyani ya bufumu wa celwa.

2. Ku shumfwana pakati ka mishobo,
Nabatina mwenso wabekata,
Umfwa uku-luluma kwe celeta,
We mpyani yabufumu endesha.

3. Leko kukonko lunkumbwa lwa calo!
Muno lulumbi lwaluko lwapwa;
Fuma mufikakilo fya mu calo,
We mpyani ya bufumu fumako.

4. Sansula menso lolesha pantanshi;
Ululumbi lwa mfumu lwaisa,
Ala-alifye pepi nokufika;
We mpyani ya bufum' anga wimbe.

title: 170 - MFUMU NA KABUMBA
content:
170 - MFUMU NA KABUMBA

MY MAKER AND MY KING

1. Mfumu nakabumba, E-ko mfumya fyonse;
Ukupa kobe cishima ko mfumya mapalo;
Ukupa kobe cishima ko mfu-mya mapalo.

2. Ndi cibumbwa cobe, E-konsango mweo;
Mfumu nendafilwa kutasha mapalo yobe:
Mfumu nendafilwa kutasha ma-palo yobe.

3. Cinshi ninga kupa, Mfu-mu fyonse fyobe;
Ukutemwa kobe kuli ifwe kutashiwe;
Ukutemwa kobe kuli ifwe kutashiwe.

4. Icukuku cobe ci-nkosho mutima;
Leke shiwi no bufwayo fibe fyobe pefye.
Leke shiwi no bufwayo fibe fyobe pefye.

title: 171 - WE KALINDA WA ZION
content:
171 - WE KALINDA WA ZION

WHAT OF THE NIGHT?

1. We kalinda wa Zion, Bushiku buli shani?
Ngo lutanda lwa lucelo, Bushe nomba lwatula?
Bushe nomba kwabe mibengelele?
Bushe nomba kwabe mibengelele?

2. Twebeni filangililo, Filepita fileya?
Twapalamina ku cabu, Kuti twamone mpanga?
Bushe cine bufumu bwapalama?
Bushe cine bufumu bwapalama?

3. Kwabengeshima bwalaca! Natwimbe tuweleshe!
Twalumona ulutanda, Lwabengeshima bwino!
Sekeleni bupususho nabwisa
Sekeleni bupususho nabwisa,

4. Natusange cishibilo, lmpanga ilya pepi
Endesheni natuleya, Icabu cilya pepi!
Auleni mutile wa mushilo,
Auleni mutile wa mushilo

title: 172 - SHIKULU MUKESA LILALI?
content:
172 - SHIKULU MUKESA LILALI?

HOW LONG?

1. Shikulu, caba shani, mukesa tilali?
Imitima yanaka pantu tamwishile;
Bushe bulya bushiku bukaba lilali?
Ubukabengeshimisha pa bantu bobe.

2. Ni lilali shikulu 'kashe ng'anda yobe?
Pantu wakokola, banana basumina;
Abengi bantu bobe, nabawa mufibi,
Banono balelindo kwisa kusengela

3. Shibukeni mutulo, shimikeni landwe,
Soseni mutile'ti, Mfumu yalaisa,
Natwashe nyali shesu, tube ba cincila,
Nokufwaisha ukumone cinso cenu.

title: 173 - NDEFWAYO UBUCETEKELO
content:
173 - NDEFWAYO UBUCETEKELO

O FOR A FAITH

1. Ndefwayo bucetekelo, Mushingabo mwenso;
Bushinga tino bupina. Nangu kucula konse,
Nangu nimu malanda.

2. Umushilyu kwi lishanya, Nangu mumacusho,
Munshita iya macusho, Kucetekela Lesa;
Nangula ncule nganshi.

3. Ulubengeshima bwino, Nangu mumasanso;
Nangu kube amasanso tatutina akantu,
Nangu kufite shani

4. Lusenda macusho yonse, Nangu musebanya;
Mabimbi aya cimana tekuti yalushike,
Mabi mbi yaca mbeshi.

5. Mpeni ulu lucetekelo; kuti ncimfye fyonse,
Nangu fye nipano calo, ndomfwa cena cisuma.
Kumushi wa pe na pe.

title: 174 - KWA BUSEKO
content:
174 - KWA BUSEKO

HOW CHEERING!

1. Kwa bu-seko ku-su-bila ‘lyo twa-cula-pano;
Kulatwafwa mu macusho 'lyo tuli pano nse,
Kulatwafwa mu macusho 'lyo tuli pano nse.

2. Kwatu-langa 'ko-tu-tushe, tuka-teka-nankwe;
'Ko tukamonana bonse tatwakalekane,
'Ko tukamonana bonse tatwakalekane.

3. Mu mpa-nge yi ta-ba-bifya, taba-tunkwa-iyo;
Ubuseko tabwakapwe bukekalila pe,
Ubuseko tabwakapwe bukekalila pe.

4. Mu ca-lo‘mo ta-ba-losha, ne mfwa-tamwa-kabe;
'Bakaba mu calo cilya kuba nga bangeli,
'Bakaba mu calo cilya kuba nga bangeli.

5. We nshita we bu-tu-kisha, mupu--sushi--isa;
Twafuluko kukumona tufike ku mwesu
Twafuluko kukumona tulike ku mwesu.

title: 175 - WE MUPUSUSHI KAKUMBA
content:
175 - WE MUPUSUSHI KAKUMBA

SAVIOUR LIKE A SHEPHERD

1. We mupusushi, kakumba wesu, shi tusunge bwino:
Tulisheni ifisu-ma, tube mwicinka lyobe ‘li ;
Yesu Mfumu, we wapalwa, bonse tuli fye bobe;
Yesu Mfumu, we wapalwa, twashitilwe fye nobe.

2. Tuli bobe fye Cibu-sa wesu tungulule nshila:
Tutalushe fye kubu-bi bonse, bwesha nga twaluba;
Yesu Mfumu, we wapalwa, umfwo kupepa kwesu,
Yesu Mfumu, we wapalwa, umfwo kupepa kwesu

3. Walitulayo kutu-poka, nangu fye tuli babi;
Waliba no luse 'la-twafwa, icikuku na maka,
Yesu Mfumu, we wapalwa, tuleisa kuli iwe,
Yesu Mfumu, we wapalwa, tuleisa kuli iwe.

title: 176 - UBUCHETEKELO BWAPALWA
content:
176 - UBUCHETEKELO BWAPALWA

BLESSED HOPE

1. Ubu-cete-kelo bwapa-lwa bwa-buta
Kuci-la no kuse-kela calo cinga-pela.

2. 'Ko lu-li lu-tanda lwinga-tamfye mfimfi,
Lule-to bu-cete-kelo, Bufu-mya no mwenso

3. Shiwi lya bu-seko lila-sansa-musha,
Lila-fumya 'kutwi-shika, Lila-ndo ku-temwa.

4. Shiwi pa Kal-vari "Iwe nawe-lelwa!"
Luta-nda lu-soko-lola Kusu-bilo mulu.

title: 177 - MU MPANGA YA KUMULU
content:
177 - MU MPANGA YA KUMULU

NO NIGHT THERE

1. Mu mpanga ya kumulu, Mwalibo "Musumba,"
Ukekalilila pe, "Bushiku takwaba."


CHORUS:
Akafute filamba, Mu "musumba ulya;"
Tabaka lepende myaka, "Bushiku takwaba."

2. Fipata fyabekesha, Mu "musumba ulya;"
Misebo ya Sahabu, "Bushiku takwaba."

3. Fipata tafisalwa, Ku "musumba ulya,"
Mumana upita pe, "Bushiku takwaba."

4. Tabafwaya kasuba, Mu "musumba ulya,"
Pantu Yeswe lubuto, "Bushiku takwaba,"

title: 178 - ALEISA
content:
178 - ALEISA

CHRIST RETURNETH

1. Limbi lucelo, lyakasuba katula.
Lye mfimfi yaya, nakasuba katula,
Kuti aisa mululumbi ulwakwe.
Kwisa senda abantu bakwe.


CHORUS:
Nililali Mfumu ilyo tukembo lwimbolu?
Aleisa Aleluya, Aleluya Ameni, Aleluya Ameni.

2. Limbi cungulo, Limbi ilyo bwaila,
Engesa lyonse, ilyo tatwibukile,
Nokumona ulubuto lwa lulumbi,
Lwakwisa senda-a bakwe,

3. Abakumulu bakatila Hosana,
Abashila bakwe, Nabangeli pamo;
Elyo tukamona ululumbi lwakwe,
Lukabengeshima konse.

4. Tukala cankwa pantu takwakabe mfwa,
Kulila noku lwala takwakabe ko;
Tukasumbulwa ne Mfumu Yesu ilyo aisa,
Kwisa senda bantu bakwe,

title: 179 - MONA SHIBWINGA
content:
179 - MONA SHIBWINGA

BEHOLD THE BRIDEGROOM

1. Bushe wate-yanishisha shibwinga ngaisa?
Bushe iwe wamuteyanishisha iwe;
Moneni Aisa isa fwalila umukumanye, shibwinga Aisa.



CHORUS:
Mona shibwinga Aisa Aisa! Mona fwalila Aisa Aisa!
Mona shibwinga Aisa Aisa! Iteyanishishe shibwinga Aisa.

2. Butisheni inyaIi shenu shibeke lyaisa;
Butisheni inyaIi shenu shibeke shibeke;
Alaisa fye bwangu, Iteya-nyeni! Alaisa fye nombaline

3. Bonse tuka-yo kumusengela 'lyaisa!
Bonse tuka-yo kumusengela 'lyaisa!
Cacine akesa akesa! Bonse tukaya kuya kumanya shibwinga.

4. Tukemba pamofye aleluya ‘lyaisa!
Tukemba pamofye aleluya ‘lyaisa!
Mone'na isa isa natwimbe bonse moneni shibwinga isa.

title: 180 - INSHITA TATWISHIBE
content:
180 - INSHITA TATWISHIBE

WE KNOW NOT THE HOUR

1. Mfumwi leisa; Inshita tatwishibe;
Malangililo yaleti Alaisa,
Lintwa kabwela, Bulayo bu bwacine,
Nshita ta-twishibe.


CHORUS:
Akesa (Akesa), Pempuleni teyanyeni;
Akesa (Akesa), Haleluya! Haleluya!
'Kesa mu makumbi, Mululumbi lwakwa Wishi.
Nshita ta twishibe.

2. Kulyu lubuto kuli balya bamano;
Mwi buku lyakwe emo fili fishinka;
Ifile sonta kuli bulya bushiku,
Nshita ta-twishibe.

3. Kulalolela, Nenyali shileyaka,
Twakulabomba, Twakula mulolela
, Kwanga nokwimba, Bonse balya bamano,
Nshita ta-twishibe.

title: 181 - TATWAISHIBA ILYA KESA
content:
181 - TATWAISHIBA ILYA KESA

WAITING AND WATCHING

1. Tatwaishiba ilya kesa, Cungulo nelyo lucelo,
Limbi kuti fye ubushiku, Limbi kuti ni kumaca,
Aleti kanshi pempuleni, Mwileka nyali shishime,
Ilya kabwela katusange, Abaiteyanishisha.


CHORUS:
Li-nda pempu-la, Li-nda pempu-la;
Li-nda pempu-la, Uku mulolela Yesu.

2. Ndetontonkanyo luse lwake, Mutengo nashitwa nao,
Ashilyo mulu uwashila, No Kwisa fwila baluba,
Nao cika lamusekesha, Pa kumona balubulwa.
Twange na ubucetekelo, Tulole no kupempula.

3. Yesu we mupusushi wa-ndi, Nalikutemwisha nganshi,
Ndecetekela nkakumo-na, 'Ne mwine nkakusengela,
Kuli bambi nga kapingu-la, Abakala kubutuka,
Lelo ine nga icibusa, Nakulakulolela fye.

title: 182 - BUSHIKU BULYA
content:
182 - BUSHIKU BULYA

GLEAMS OF THE GOLDEN MORNING

1. Bushiku bulya nabupalama; Yesu alaisa.
Ukwisa senda babusumino, Ukuya kumushi.


CHORUS:
Yangu twamona mibengelele kutandule mfifi yonse!
Mibengelele yakwisa kwakwe, Nshishi shikesuka.

2. Ilandwe ili lyalaya nomba konse mucalwe ci
Shibwinga nao tale kokola, Penga lyalalila.

3. Bangeli bakwe akesa nabo, Mulu ukabeka,
Akesa senda abantu bakwe, Kuyo kushabe mfwa.

4. Tuka kumana nabatemwika. Abailya kale.
Akala bakumune filamba abo balelila.

title: 183 - IKATISHENI NSUKE NJISE
content:
183 - IKATISHENI NSUKE NJISE

HOLD FAST TILL I COME

1. Bulayo bwakwe kubasumina
"mona naisa ukwisa basenda,
Ikatisha we kufika njise,
Wilala we buka, ndeisa bwangu."


CHORUS:
"Ikatisheni insuke njise,"
Bufumu bukapelwa kulimwe,
Ingila mubuseko bwa Mfumu,
Kafwikwa fitebo filye fya yemba.

2. "Twakulalinda" nyali lyoshaka;
Engesa ubushiku ngo mupupu,
Kwena lyapepi, Lelo kasuba,
Aka kwishilapo tatwaishiba.

3. Bucetekelo, bweshiwi lyakwe,
Yeswa laisa, bwangu icacine,
Malayo yakwe Yena yacine,
"mona naisa bwa-ngu ikatisha."

title: 184 - ANGENI MFUMUYAISA
content:
184 - ANGENI MFUMUYAISA

JOY TO THE WORLD

1. Angeni Mfumu yaisa! Natu isengele,
Tute ya-ni she ci fulo,
Bapanonse bembe, bapanonse bembe,
Bapa bapa-nonse-bembe.

2. Angeni Mfumu yateka! Bantu bonse bembe,
Menshi-ma-bwe-mpili sha-nge
Nafimbisho lwimbo, nafimbisho lwimbo
Nafi Nafi-mbisho lwimbo.

3. Nomba line aleteka cine, necikuku,
Abe-na fya-lo be-shi-be
Ubukata bwakwe, Bololoke bwakwe
Uku uku-temwa kwakwe.

title: 185 - UKUBA KULYA
content:
185 - UKUBA KULYA

WE SPEAK OF THE REALMS TO BE THERE

1. Tulanda ifya mpanga i-lya, icalo cawamisha
Icalo cilya icisuma nishani kuba kulya!
Ne misebo iya ngolide fibumbe fya bekesha,
Wene mwandi wakupapi-sha nishani kuba kulya!

2. Kulya ububi bwena takwa-ba, matunko no bulanda,
Nangu mesho yonse takwa-ba nishani kuba kulya!
Nemilimo yakutemwa, ne mingile yabashila,
Icilonganino canta-nshi nishani kuba kulya!

3. Mulafwo mutima wa-ndi pantu ndefwaya mulu,
Nomba line nakulau-mfwa ifyo ine nkaya kulya!
Tu-kalaenda mumaba-la mubu cindami ifwe!
Tukaba pamo na Bangeli na Yes'u akaba kulya.

title: 186 - MFUMU TWALONGANA
content:
186 - MFUMU TWALONGANA

LORD WE HAVE MET

1. Mfumu twalo-ngana, Mung'a-nda ye-nwiyi;
Ise-ni Mfu-mu mwi-kale pamo-fye na-ifwe.

2. Imi-tima-yesu ile-mufwa-isha;
Ne mi-pashi yesu nayo, Ile-muli-lila.

3. Umu-pashi wesu, Leke-ni u-twalwe,
Uku-mfwa ma-shiwi yesu, Twika-le na-imwe,

4. Tufu-mishe-nipo ifya-bipa-fyonse.
Kuti ngamwa-isa Mfumu, Mutu-sende kwenu.

title: 187 - ULWIMBO LWESU ULWAKULEKANA
content:
187 - ULWIMBO LWESU ULWAKULEKANA

OUR PARTING HYMN

1. Mu-pusushi wesu, tuleimba,
Ulwimbo ulu lwakulekana;
I’ule fwaisha kupalwa nemwe,
Shiwi lya mutende tupeleni.

2. Tupenyu mutende lyo tuleya,
Lyo twashibuka 'lyo twasendama;
Milomo yesu isoso bubi,
IIyo tuli mu ng'anda yenwi yi.

3. Tusungeni lyo tuli pa calo,
Muma cusho na mumesho yonse;
Ilya macusho yonse yakapwa!
Mfumu twiteni twise tutushe.

title: 188 - NDI MUBI NOKUCILA
content:
188 - NDI MUBI NOKUCILA

CHIEF OF SINNER

1. Ndi mubi nokucila, Yesu amfwile me;
Kupela mweo wa pe. No kumpela cifulo;
Nomba ndi wakwe wa pe, E' kala mu mutima.

2. Temwa kwakwe kwacila, Temwa kwakwe penape;
Fyonse fimbi ifya fye, Myulu yacepesha fye;
Alinsangile ine, Lintu nali mu mfimfi.

3. Ndi Mubi nokucila, Yesu fyonse kuli 'ne;
Aleshiba ndefwaya, Asendele macusho;
Ndekala no mutende, Pantu angafwa ine.

title: 189 - TATUKWETE NG'ANDA KUNO
content:
189 - TATUKWETE NG'ANDA KUNO

NO ABIDING CITY HERE

1. Tatukwete ng'anda kuno,
Tulefwaye, calo cilya;
Tatukwete ubulanda,
Icalo cesu e cilya,
Icalo cesu e cilya.

2. Tatukwete ng'anda kuno,
Calo cesu cileisa;
Ni Zion, Mfumu ilya,
Yabengeshima bwino pe,
Yabengeshima bwino pe

3. Mwe calo candi cawama.
Basuma batusha cilya;
Nga nimgaba na mapindo,
Ine nkaya no kutusha,
Ine nkaya no kutusha.

4. Talala mutima wandi,
Inshita yakwe isuma;
Ndecita bufwayo bwake,
Akampele cifulo 'ko,
Akampele cifulo 'ko,

title: 190 - ISHINA LISUMA
content:
190 - ISHINA LISUMA

PRECIOUS NAME

1. Bule shina lyakwa Yesu,
we mwana wa bulanda,
Li ka kupelo buseko,
nakonse kuntu kaya.


CHORUS:
Ishina -- lisuma --
lya cetekelwa muno;
Ishina -- lisuma --
lishina lya katula.

2. Bule shina lyakwe lyonse,
Libe cishangu cobe;
Lintu waba no kweshiwa,
Lilumbule upepe.

3. Yesu eshina lisuma!
Liletupo buseko!
Lintwa katupokelela,
Nyimbo tukamwimbila.

4. Tota peshina lya Yesu,
Muwe pa nkasa shakwe;
Tuka mupele citebo,
Ngolwendo lwesu lwapwa.

title: 191 - CACINE CINE YESU W ANDI
content:
191 - CACINE CINE YESU W ANDI

BLESSED ASSURANCE

1. Cacine cine Yesu wandi,
Kuwama kwakwe kwa lulumbi!
Ndi mpyani nali-shitwa nankwe,
Kufyalwa ku Mupashi wakwe.


CHORUS:
Elyashi lyandi, lwimbo lwandi,
ndetasha Yesu Mfumu yandi,
Elyashi lyandi, lwimbo lwandi,
Ndetesha Yesu Mfumu yandi.

2. Kumfwila Yesu e buseko,
Cimonwa ca-kutemwa kwakwe,
Abangeli e bandetela,
Uluse lwakwe lwa kutemwa

3. Mutima wandi watalala,
Ine mu Mfumu nde sekela,
Ndelolela nde-lindilila,
Bucetekelo bwa kutemwa,

title: 192 - ALl MFWlLILE PALUPANDA
content:
192 - ALl MFWlLILE PALUPANDA

GLORY TO HIS NAME

1. Ali mfwilile pa lupanda,
epo nsamba ifibi fyandi.
Mumulopa wakwe ndebuta,
Lumbeni Yesu.


CHORUS:
Lumbeni Yesu, Lumbeni Yesu,
mu mulopa wakwe ndebuta,
Lumbeni Yesu.

2. Napusuka cine mufibi.
Yesu aikala muntu ndi,
Palupanda ambulile 'ne,
Lumbeni Yesu.

3. Kafukauka wapapisha;
Nasekela pakuingila,
Nokusamba mwansamba bwino,
Lumbeni Yesu.

4. Iseni ku kafukauka,
Ipele we mwine kwa Yesu,
Isa nomba akakuposha,
Lumbeni Yesu.

title: 193 - CINSHI USHINGEKALILA
content:
193 - CINSHI USHINGEKALILA

HIS WAY WITH THEE

1. Cinshi ushingekalila ngo mweo wakwe?
Nokwenda nankwe munshila yacepa?
Cinshi shinga muleka sende icisendo?
Sumina ifya fwaya.


CHORUS:
Ube muntungwa kumaka yakwe;
Umulopa wakwe ukusambe;
Elyo kaba mu kutemwa kwakwe,
Nga wacita iwe ifya fwaya.

2. Teti musuminishe kucite muntungwa?
Busho lefwaya umutende wakwe?
Busho lefwaya kuti Yeswa kupusushe?
Sumina ifya fwaya.

3. Bushe muli cifulo cobe mu bufumu?
Washininkinsha ukwesha kwa cine?
Wakulamubombela kwabula kunaka?
Sumina ifya fwaya.

title: 194 - MULAWAMA MU NG'ANDA
content:
194 - MULAWAMA MU NG'ANDA

LOVE AT HOME

1. Mulawama mu ng'anda nga mwatemwana;
Nokusekela konse nga mwatemwana.
Ngo mutende wafula nokusekela konse,
Nshita taikokola ilapwa bwino.


CHORUS:
Mu ng'anda, Mu ng'anda,
Nshita taikokola
Nga mwatemwana.

2. Mu ng'anda mulyu kwanga, nga mwatemwana;
Takuli kusulana nga mwatemwana:
Nshila mwaba maluba, ilawama fye lyonse,
Ilamusansamusha nga mwatemwana.

3. Mu mulu muli nsansa, nga twatemwana,
No kutemwa mu calo, nga twatemwana.
Kamana kalapoma, kasuba kalabala,
Ne Mfumu ilatemwa, nga twatemwana.

4. Yesu muncite wenu no kutemwana,
Ilambo lyobe lyandi, Nokutemwana;
Takuli cinga ncusha nangu fye fya mucalo,
Nokupalwa fye nobe nokutemwana.

title: 195 - NDEUFWAYA  ULYA MULILO
content:
195 - NDEUFWAYA ULYA MULILO

O FOR THAT FLAME

1. Ndeufwaya ulya m‘lilo wabamushilo bakale;
Wabalangililyo mulu, waba fwile mumacusho.

2. Ulikwi Mfumu Mupashi wafundishe nshila yobe;
Uwaya fwile Esaya Dabid abo wamushilo.

3. Ulikwi Mfumu Mupashi, uwali muli Abramu,
Uwayafwile Paulo. kusanga maka ya mulu.

4. Bushe takuli Mupashi, Ulya wakwete Eliya;
Wabengeshimye Mosesi, Yobo ayansha matunko.

5. Mfumu pamo fye nga kale kosheni mulimo wenu,
Mitima yesu kuli‘mwe, bikeni Mupashi wenu.

title: 196 - MULYA MAKA MU MULOPA
content:
196 - MULYA MAKA MU MULOPA

THERE IS POWER IN THE BLOOD

1. Busho lefwaya kwelelwo bubi,
mwaliba maka mumulopa,
Taulefwaya ukwansho bubi?
Muli maka mu mulopa.


CHORUS:
Mulya maka yakupapisha,
Mum‘lopa wampanga,
Amaka ayakupapisha,
Mu m'lopa wakwa Yesu.

2. Busho lefwayo cimfye cilumba?
Mwaliba maka mu mulopa,
Iso sangululwe pa Kalvali,
muli maka mu mulopa.

3. Bushe tetyu bombe ncito yakwe?
Mwaliba maka mu mulopa,
Bubi bonse kuti bwafumiwa,
muli maka mu mulopa.

4. Busho lefwayo bute nge mpemba?
Mwaliba maka mu mulopa,
Shani tetyu fwayo ku mwimbila?
Muli maka mu mulopa.

title: 197 - TAPALl KWICUSHA
content:
197 - TAPALl KWICUSHA

THERE’LL BE NO DARK VALLEY

1. Tapali kwicusha ilya isa;
tapati kwicusha ilya isa;
Tapali kwicusha ilya isa;
kusenda bantu bakwe.


CHORUS:
Kusenda bantu bakwe:
kusenda bantu bakwe;
Tapali kwicusha ilya isa,
kusenda bantu bakwe.

2. Tapali bulanda ilya isa:
Tapali bulanda ilya isa;
Tapali bulanda ilya isa;
kusenda bantu bakwe.

3. Tapali minsoshi ilya isa;
tapali minsoshi ilya isa;
Tapali minsoshi ilya:
kusenda bantu bakwe.

4. Tukemba ulwimbo ilya isa;
tukemba ulwimbo ilya isa;
Tukemba ulwimbo ilya isa;
kusenda bantu bakwe.

title: 198 - UKUBA YESU E CIBUSA
content:
198 - UKUBA YESU E CIBUSA

THE BEST FRIEND IS JESUS

1. Ukuba yesu e cibusa;
Ilyo macusho yafulisha,
Aposha umutima, alapela, amaka;
Cibusa wacine ni Yesu.


CHORUS:
Yesu e cibusa wesu (Yesu wine)
cibusa wesu wacine (Yesu wesu)
Kulakwafwa nga wawa, nokukumfwa nga waita,
cibusa wacine Yesu.

2. Ninsanga cibusa ni Yesu;
ulensansamusho mutima,
Mumaboko ayakwe nshakatine akantu;
cibusa wacine ni Yesu.

3. Nangu fye mpite mumalanda.
nangu mabimbi yacimana,
Ine nshakatineko nelyo kuba nomwenso,
cibusa wacine ni Yesu.

4. Ilyo nkafika kumwesuko,
tukaba naba tangilako,
Tuka lamwimbila fye nyimbo ukwapenape,
Cibusa wacine ni Yesu.

title: 199 - NATOTELWE LESA
content:
199 - NATOTELWE LESA

TO GOD BE THE GLORY

1. Natotelwe Lesa, pafint' a cita;
Atemenwe calo apele mwane;
Uwa tufwilile elambo lyesu,
Atwiswilyo mulu 'fwe twingile mo.


CHORUS:
Imbileni Mfumu, calo cumfwe naco,
Imbileni Mfumu bantu basekele;
Isa kuli Tata, mu mwana wakwe;
Tumupyo lulumbi, pafint' acita.

2. Ubwe bulubulo bwa mumulopa!
Ebulayo bwine ku wa sumina
No muntu wabipa nga a sumina,
lilya fye lapila ena elelwa.

3. Fikulwa citile fya tufundisha,
Nefwe twasekela mu mwana wakwe;
Lelo tukacila muku sekela ilyo
Yeswa kesa kwisa tusenda

title: 200 - ULI WA MUSHILO
content:
200 - ULI WA MUSHILO

HOLY, HOLY, HOLY

1. Uli wa mushilo, Lesa wa maka!
Ulucelo celo twakulamwimbila;
Uli wa mushilo, Wa luse Mfumu!
Mwine wa fyonse, Uwa pe na pe.

2. Uli wa mushilo, Pano pa calo;
Bangeli bawila pa makasa yenu,
Bonse ba kumulu ba la mupepa;
Niwe fye weka uwa pe na pe.

3. Nangu wingafimbwa ne mfifi 'kulu,
Ne linso lya muntu teti limumone,
Uli wa mushilo, Umbi takuli;
Wa luse wa ma-ka, Wa mushilo.

title: 201 - AMFUMISHE MO
content:
201 - AMFUMISHE MO

HE BROUGHT ME OUT

1. Muti-ma wandi wabifya ku Mfumu;
Mpulu-mushi sha-ntwele mu cilindi;
Ali-mpuswishe ukufuma ku-mfwa,
Nali-lile ku Mfumu ku-mfumya mo.

2. Ambi-kile pepi nankwe pa libwe;
Naku-laika-la na Wene lyonse;
Teti-ngwile mu fibi 'lyo ndi nankwe,
Mulu-se lwakwe nkakwate cite-bo

3. Ampe-le lwimbo lupya lwa-malumbo;
Naku-lamulu-mbanya i-ne lyonse;
Mulyu buseko mu muti-ma wandi,
Noku-lalumba Mupusushi wandi.

4. Naku-laimba 'fya luse kuli 'we;
Naku-lamwimbi-la bonse bamone;
Naku-laimba fya lupu-sukilo,
Bengi bomfwe shiwi bamusumine.

title: 202 - YESU MUNGABUSHE 'NE
content:
202 - YESU MUNGABUSHE 'NE

JESUS SAVIOUR PILOT ME

1. Yesu mu-ngabushe 'ne,
Kwishilya lya cimana
Ndetina amabimbi,
Amabwe yaluluma
Mwalishi-ba inshila
Yesu mu-ngabushe 'ne.

2. Nge fyo nyi-na no mwana,
Alamu-talalika
Amabi-mbi yaumfwa,
Nga mwaya-talalika
Mwe Mfumu ya cimana
Yesu mu-ngabushe 'ne

3. Ilyo nka-ba pa-calo,
Mabimbi yakantinya;
Nkasanga ukutusha,
Nkafuka-tilwa ne mwe;
Ngumfwe mu lenjeba 'ti
Witina ndekwabusha.

title: 203 - MUPASHI NAISA
content:
203 - MUPASHI NAISA

THE COMFORTER HAS COME

1. Bile-ni imbila, konse kulyu muntu,
Uku-li mitima ya cula cibi,
Bena Kristu bonse, Bile-ni no kwanga,
Mupa-shi na-isa.


CHORUS:
Mupa-shi Naisa, Mupa-shi Naisa,
Kufu-ma kumulu, Kuli Tala wesu,
Bile-ni imbila konse kulyu muntu;
Mupa-shi Na-isa.

2. Bushi-ku nabupwa, Ka-suba kaisa,
Kale-sha mabimbi ne nku-ta ikali
Nkapi-ta pa mpili, Nkala-pita bwangu;
Mupa-shi Na-isa.

3. Mfumu ya shamfumu, Onda-pe mitima;
Yaba-fungwa bonse, No ku bapususha;
Bonse 'balubulwa, Bale imbo lwimbo,
Mupa-shi Na-isa.

4. Kute-mwa kwa cine, Nkakulande shani,
Nolu-limi lwandi, ku bantu baluba;
Mu ci-kuku cakwe, Na-ngu ndi wabipa;
Mupa-shi Na-isa.

5. Natu-mfwike konse 'lyo tu-lemwimbila,
Na 'ba-shila bonse, Twimbi-le ca pamo;
Lwimbo lwa kutemwa, Ulo lushakapwe:
Mupa-shi Na-isa.

title: 204 - BWELA WE WA LUBA
content:
204 - BWELA WE WA LUBA

WELCOME WANDERER WELCOME

1. Mu-mpanga ya bwe-ni mo walubila
Ukomfwe shiwi, "We mwana wandi."


CHORUS:
Bwela wewalubile, Bwela ku mushi!
Waliye chiyeyeye, We bwela! Bwela!

2. U-mo muli nsa-la, No kutembuka
'Sa kubuseko, we mwana wandi.

3. Fu-ma ku fika-nsa, No kushumfwana;
Mutima wacu-la mwana wandi.

4. Ci -bi nacisu-lwa, U-cili wandi;
Ndekulolela, we mwana wandi.

5. Ku-tali 'ko wa-ya, Na nombo leya?
Nalikwelela, Bwela we mwana wandi

6. Mo-na ifya ku-lya, Ni-mpekanisha;
'So ipakishe, we mwana wandi.

7. Fi-busa tapa-li, Ng'anda ne ncito;
Nalikutemwa, We mwana wandi.

title: 205 - ILYO YESU ALEKWITA
content:
205 - ILYO YESU ALEKWITA

WHILE JESUS WHISPERS

1. I-lyo Yesu alekwita, I-sa- mubi,
Tu-le-kupa-pati-la, I -sa- mubi.
No-mba nshita isu-ma, l-sa- mubi,
No-mba nshita yakwi-sa, l-sa mubi

2. U-le-pita cafi-na, l-sa- mubi,
Ye-su 'kase-nda co-be, l-sa- mubi,
Ilyo Yes' a-kute-mwa, I -sa- mubi,
E-u-katu-la i-we, l-sa- mubi

3. U-mfwa ishi-wi lya-kwe, l-sa- mubi,
I-so poke mapa-lo, I-sa- mubi
l-lyo Yesu a-lekwi-ta, I-sa- mubi,
Tu-le kupa-pati-la, I-sa- mubi.

title: 206 - CINTU NSHI WANCITILA?
content:
206 - CINTU NSHI WANCITILA?

WHAT HAST THOU DONE FOR ME?

1. Nafwi-lile iwe wine, Wala-nciti-la nshi?
Kuti ulu-buke, Uku-fuma ku mfwa,
N'ine naku-fwili-le 'we, Wala-nciti-la nshi?
Nafwi-lile iwe wine, Wala-nciti-la nshi?

2. Ng'anda yakwa Tata, No lu-lumbi lwandi;
Nai-shile panshi, Uku-ti ‘ne ncule,
Fyonse fine nafi-shile, Bushe finshi washa?
Fyonse fi na-lifi-shile, Bushe finshi washa?

3. Nali kucu-lile, Ifyo nshinga-landa,
Uku-cula konse, Kuti upu-suke,
Naku-sende-le fi fyonse, Finshi wala-senda?
Naku-sendele fi fyonse, Finshi wala-senda?

title: 207 - ALINJELELA
content:
207 - ALINJELELA

SEALS MY PARDON

1. Namu-mwene pa lu-panda, Mulo-pa 'le-suma
Ando-leke-sha no luse-, Pepi no lu-panda


2. Nshaka-labe kulo-lesha, Kufi-ka no kufwa-.
Ali kwati ale-njeba-, Fya mfwa 'lyo ndo-lesha.

3. Kundo-lesha kwa ci-bili, Ati, Nawe-lelwa-.
Mulo-pa ci-lambu cobe-, Kuti 'be no mweo.

4. Bubi bwandi bwale-ngele, Kuti Iwe ufya-,
lwe wafu-lisho luse, Wanje-lelo bubi.

title: 208 - ENDENI BWINO
content:
208 - ENDENI BWINO

TREAD SOFTLY

1. Tondolo, Tondolo, Umfweni shiwi;
Talaleni mumfwe kutikisheni.


CHORUS:
Endeni bwino Shikulu 'li pano,
Mwende bwino bwino aletufwaya

2. Tondolo, Tondolo, Mwa mushilo 'mu;
Mashiwi yafuma 'pa ya cikuku.

3. Tondolo, Tufukame. Tuicefye;
Natukwata busuma bwa Edeni.

4. Tondolo, Tondolo, Musange luse;
Tondolo, Tondolo, Muloleleni.

title: 209 - APEPI NANKWE
content:
209 - APEPI NANKWE

O FOR A CLOSER WALK

1. Ukwenda pepi na Lesa,
E nshila ya ku mu-lu;
Lubuto lubushe nshila-,
Yakuya ku Mfumu.

2. Bwela Mupa-shi Wa-shila,
We ntu-mi i-ya ci-ne;
Nali pato bubi pantu-,
Bufumya ku-li 'Mwe

3. Kwali nshita shamu-tende,
Ndatemwe lyo njibu-sha;
Shali-ya nsha-kashi-sange,
Muli cino calo.

4. Aka-lubi nate-mwisha,
Nangu kabe shani-,
Ngafwa kafu-me ku-li 'ne-,
Nshale fye na Imwe.

title: 210 - YESU WA KUPAPA
content:
210 - YESU WA KUPAPA

WHAT A WONDERFUL SAVIOUR

1. Kristu e watufwilile Yesu Wakupapisha
Twashitilwe no mutengo Yesu Wakupapisha.


CHORUS:
Yesu Wakupapisha Mupusushi wandi;
Yesu Wakupapisha e Mfumu yandi.

2. Ansambile no mulopa Yesu Wakupapisha;
Ambweseshe kuli Lesa Yesu Wakupapisha.

3. Abutisho mweo wandi Yesu Wakupapisha;
Akulateka muli 'ne Yesu Wakupapisha.

4. Alenda pepi na ine Yesu Wakupapisha;
No kunsunge nshiku shonse Yesu Wakupapisha

5. Ampela maka yakwansha Wakupapisha Yesu,
Ndeyansha na mu kweshiwa Wakupapisha Yesu.

6. Namupo mutima wandi Wakupapisha Yesu;
Nasula fyonse fya calo Wakupapisha Yesu.

title: 211 - MFULA YE PALO
content:
211 - MFULA YE PALO

SHOWERS OF BLESSING

1. Kukabe mfula ye pa-lo, Bulayo bwa kutemwa;
Nshita isuma ike-sa, Kufuma kuli Yesu.


CHORUS:
Mfula ye palo Eyo tulekabila;
Mu luse lwenu twalomba, Imfula ya bupalo

2. Kukabe mfula ye pa-lo, Yakutubukulula;
Mu mpili na mu miko-nko, Monse mukabe mfula

3. Kukabe mfula ye pa-lo, Ikafuma ku mulu:
Ikapelwa yakutwa-fwa, Kusose shiwi Lyakwe.

4. Kukabe mfula ye pa-lo, Yalaisa fye bwangu:
Tulapile kuli Lesa, No kwita pali Yesu.

title: 212 - MUTENDE USUMA
content:
212 - MUTENDE USUMA

SWEET PEACE

1. Mu mutima muli lwimbo, Natemwa kulubwekesha;
Ndemba libili libili-, Mutende wa kutemwa.


CHORUS:
U-mu-te-nde. E bupe bwa ku mulu;
Mutende wakupapisha, E bupe bwakwa Lesa.

2. Umutende pa lupanda, Imisha yandi yapelwe;
Takuli mufula umbi-, Kano fye umutende.

3. Yesu Mfumu asamikwe, Muli 'ne mwali mutende;
Nasangilemo bupalo-. Mutende wa kutemwa.

4. Muli Yesu ndeikala, No kwenda mupepi nankwe;
Takuli cimo cacila-. Mutende wa kutemwa

title: 213 - LWIMBO LWANDI
content:
213 - LWIMBO LWANDI

MY SONG

1. Yesu we Mu-pusu-shi, Niwe lwimbo-lwandi;
We ka-lubu-la wa-ndi, Ilyo nape-lelwa.


CHORUS:
We Mu-pusu-shi wa-ndi, Naku-lakwi-mbila;
Niwe Cibu-sa wa-ndi, Yesu ndeku-temwa

2. Niwe buce-teke-lo, Bwandi myaka-yonse;
'Lyo nsa-ngwa mu-macu-sho, Ndepo-nye fi-lamba.

3. Niwe nace-teke-la, Cibu-sa wa-cine;
Mutemwikwa kuli 'ine, Uku-cila fyonse

4. Yesu e lwi-mbo lwandi, 'Lyo ndi muno-calo;
Aka-ba lwi-mbo lwa-ndi, 'Lyo nka-ba ku-mulu.

title: 214 - BUSHE YESU KUTI ANSUNGA?
content:
214 - BUSHE YESU KUTI ANSUNGA?

DOES JESUS CARE?

1. Bushe Yesu kuti ansunga, Ilyo ndi mu macusho?
'Lyo nafininwa ne fya mu calo, Fyalenge nshilo kulepa


CHORUS:
Ala-nsunga, Ninji-shiba, Tatemwa ilyo ncula,
Inshiku nasho shanasha, Mupusushi wandi alansunga.

2. Bushe Yesu kuti ansunga, Nge nshila yafitisha?
Kasuba kawa, yaise mfifi, Bushe kuti aba pepe?

3. Bushe Yesu kuti ansunga, Nga nawa mumatunko?
Ilyo na cula, nshili no bwafwo, Nalila bushiku bonse.

4. Bushe Yesu kuti ansunga, Nga nasha 'ba mu calo?
Nangu mutima wandi wa cula, Bushe tekuti amone?

title: 215 - LOLELA WILAILISHANYA
content:
215 - LOLELA WILAILISHANYA

WAIT AND MURMUR NOT

1. Ku mushu 'ko tabaluka, macusho yonse takwaba;
E mushi uwawamisha, Eko 'fwe tukayatusha.


CHORUS:
Lole-la wilailishanya, Lole-la wilailishanya; Shilo-lela wilailishanya

2. Nangu cisendo cafina. Mona cafuma ku mulu;
Wafuluka kuba kulya, Lolela wi ilishanya.

3. Munshila nga mwabe myunga, Ibukisha uwaifwele;
Ngo mutima wanashiwa, Ibukisho wa mushilo.

4. Nangu cule cabipisha, wilabako ukupepa;
Bushiku nabupalama, Lolela wi ilishanya.

title: 216 - NSHILI NEKA
content:
216 - NSHILI NEKA

NEVER ALONE

1. Nshili no mwenso ine nga Yesu ali pepi;
Ukubapo kwakwe kulansansamusha lyonse,
Nangu nshili na Cibusa Yesu Cibusa;
Ndaluka, Ena lantemwisha lyonse ukwa pe na pe.


CHORUS:
Takanshe neka, kunsha neka, nkaba nankwe;
Alindaya takanshe neka, Akulaba na Ine.

2. Teti nake ilyo Yesu ali na Ine,
Mutima wandi wacetekela ubutusho;
Nshakwata maka lelo nshintilila uko ali,
Mu maboko yakwemo nakula sungwe nshiku pe.

3. Nakulalolela pantu efyo anjeba,
Nshishibe cinshi Mfumu yandi yacelwo kwisa,
Ndi no buseko ubushingalondololwa;
Bucetekelo bwandi bwa cine bwaba muli Yesu.

title: 217 - CIMO NINGAPELA YESU
content:
217 - CIMO NINGAPELA YESU

SOMETHING FOR JESUS

1. We Mfumu kutemwa ku-lya wampele-,
Teti mise kantu kufumo ko li
Nakulato-tela nci-te fyo na-laya;
Naleta u-bupe ku-li Imwe.

2. Ku cipuna cenu mumpapatila-,
Mu-kunaka kwandi njise ku-li 'Mwe,
Nse-nde ulu-panda, Na-nde uku-temwa;
Nyimbe ulwimbo mpepe ku-li Imwe

3. Mpe-ni umu-tima waba nga Imwe-,
U-kuti mbe wenu Inshita shonse.
Ncite fya kutemwa, Pamo ne fya luse,
Ukuti nkonke mo mu-li Imwe

4. Fyonse fyo nakwata ni Mwe mwampele-,
Mu-nsansa, malanda, Fyonse kuli Mwe;
Ilyo nkamumona elyo nkalubuka,
U-kwa muyayaya, Ku-li Imwe.

title: 218 - MUFULA UMO
content:
218 - MUFULA UMO

ONE FOUNDATION

1. Chilonganino ca-ba pali Yesu Kristu;
Cili cilengo ci-pya ce shiwi na menshi,
Aishilecifwa-ya ukuba nabwinga;
Cashitwa no mulo-pa alicifwilile.

2. Bafuma ku misho-bo lelo bali umo,
Bucetekelo bumo ne Mfumu imo fye
Batashe shina li-mo, Ne cilyo cimo fye,
No busubilo bu-mo ebo cakwatisha.

3. Cibe mu macusho, nangu ni mu malanda,
Nangula Satana nao aletulwisha
Abashila bai-mba Isa bwangu Mfumu,
Ukulila kuka-pwa Inyimbo tukemba.

4. Pakati ka macu-sho, pakati ka bulwi;
Ichilonganino chilolelyo mutende;
Ukusuka bonse bakamone Imfumu,
Ninshi naci cimfya, cikaba pa kutusha.

title: 219 - MUNTUNGULULE YEHOVA
content:
219 - MUNTUNGULULE YEHOVA

GUIDE ME O THOU GREAT JEHOVA

1. Muntungulule Yehova, Ndi mweni muno calo
Nanaka muli na maka, Mundame mumaboko
U mukate wa ku mulu, Ndisheni ninkabila,
Ndisheni ni-nkabila

2. Isule-ni i-cishima, Nwemo amenshi ya mweo;
Muntungulule mu lwendo, Mweba maka yakwansha
Mwe ba maka Mwe ba maka, Mu-be cishangu candi
Mube ci-shangu candi.

3. Ilyo nkafika Jodani, Umwenso wandi wapwa
Munga-bushe i-cimana, Munfishe ku Kenani
Nkamwimbila, nkamwimbila. Nkalamulumbanya pee ..
Nka-lamu-lumba-nya pee.

title: 220 - KU MWESU
content:
220 - KU MWESU

THE HOME LAND

1. Ku mwesu! 'ye ku mwesu! Mpanga ya mutende!
No bushiku takwaba! Kasuba takawa;
Ndefwaisha kwesu, Ndefulukisha kwesu;
Kukalipwa takwaba, Ku mwesu uko ndeya;
Kukalipwa takwaba, Ku mwesu uko ndeya.

2. Mfumu ili mu mushi, Ili na bangeli;
Mpulumushi takwaba, Matunko tamwaba;
Nyimbo sha ku mwesu ndemfwa iciunda,
'Lyo ntontonkanya ku mwesu ndaponya filamba;
'Lyo ntontonkanya ku mwesu, ndaponya ifilamba.

3. Bantu bekala mulya, Bafwaya nje kulya,
Uko imfwa, bulanda, awe tafisangwa;
We calo natemwa calo ca mutende,
Kristu tusendeni ku mushi wabapusuka,
Kristu tusendeni ku mushi wabapusuka

title: 221 - GALILE
content:
221 - GALILE

GALILEE

1. Kalelila ... Koni kakwe ... Icungulo ... Icapalwa ...
Cilelanga ... Bumushilo .... Ndefuluka ... Ku Galile ...


CHORUS:
O Galile, Waliwama, uko Yesu Atemenwe,
O Galile. Waliwama, Imba ulwimbo kuli 'ne.

2. Mu mukonko ... wa maluba .. Emo fyuni ... Fimbe nyimbo ...
Ulucelo ... Fileimba ... Kulumbanya ... O Galile ...

3. Lyombelenga ... shiwi lyakwe ... , Fyaendele ... Pa cimana ...
Ndefwaisha ... Ukwishiba ... Kumukonka ... Ku Galile ...

title: 222 - MUMABOKO Y AKWA YESU
content:
222 - MUMABOKO Y AKWA YESU

SAFE THE ARMS OF JESUS

1. Nindamwa bwino mwandi mumaboko yakwe;
Na mukutemwa kwakwe nakulatusha mo,
Bangeli baleimba ciunda ndeumfwa
Mu mabala yasuma kwishilya Iya bemba-.


CHORUS:
Njikale muli Yesu mumaboko yakwe;
Na mukutemwa kwakwe nakulatushamo.

2. Nindamwa bwino mwandi teti nsakamane;
Kufuma kumatunko, Teti mbe no bubi
Mpokololwe ku bubi pamo na ku mwenso,
Matunko ya nono nokulila konse.

3. Yesu e cubo candi, wene amfwilile,
Pa libwe lya kaele, ndecetekela pe
Nakulalolela, ukusuka buce
Nsuke nkamumone pa cabu ca Golide.

title: 223 - KU MUKONKA KONSE
content:
223 - KU MUKONKA KONSE

FOLLOW ALL THE WAY

1. Ndeumfwa Yesu 'lenjita, Noluse Wen' alanjita;
Ndeumfwa shiwi lileti, 'Sa unkonke lyonse, unkonke.


CHORUS:
Nakula sendo lupanda, no kukonko Mupusushi;
Uko konse ntungulula, Ku mukonka konse fye.

2. Nangu nshila yafitisha, Makasa nayo yanaka;
Lelo umutima wandi wena kumukonka lyonse.

3. Yes' ali kuntanshi yandi, Lubuto munshila yandi;
Nga nanaka alampa amaka, Nakulamukonka lyonse.

4. Mu mikonko alansunga, lyonse alampelo kulya;
Ndamukabila fye lyonse, Nakulamukonka lyonse.

5. Walintemwa Mfumu yandi, Nsungwe mumaboko yenu;
Mucikuku cobe nsungwe, Nakulamukonka lyonse.

title: 224 - NYALI SHIBENGESHIME
content:
224 - NYALI SHIBENGESHIME

LET THE LOWER LIGHT BE BURNING

1. Uluse lwakwa Shikulu, Lulabeka nshiku pe;
Atupa kasunge nyali pa cabu ca cimana.


CHORUS:
Inyali shibengeshime, Bashimone pe bimbi,
Ku balecula mu fibi, Ukuti bapusuke.

2. Ububi bwafishe calo, Na mabimbi yaima;
Bambi bali mu cimana, Balefwayo lubuto.

3. Ashe nyali we munyina, tupusushe balefwa;
Kuti bafike ku cabu, Mumfifi bengaluba.

title: 225 - IMININA NGO WAMAKA
content:
225 - IMININA NGO WAMAKA

STAND LIKE THE BRAVE

1. Mu Kristu ima! Shikulu akwita;
Fwala ku mutwe, Lupanga ku minwe;
Ulwishe Satana, Kwabulo mwenso;
Ima nge cita ulwishe mulwani.


CHORUS:
Wilatina, Wilatina, Wilatina; ulwishe mulwani

2. Na mubusanso cenjela, Lolesha wifutatuka,
Nkwela tailiko; Mabumba yababi ngawayacimfya,
Ima nge cita ulwishe mulwani.

3. Mulimo wakwe wiulekelesha usunge bwino,
Ube wa cishinka; Ulwishe na maka ukufike mpela,
Ima namaka ulwishe umulwani.

4. Wilatwishika kabiye kuntanshi
Ape cikuku nokusansamusha ~
Kutemwa kwakwe kwaba fye nga menshi,
Ima nge cita ulwishe mulwani

title: 226 - APEPI NO KUSUMINA
content:
226 - APEPI NO KUSUMINA

ALMOST PERSUADED

1. Ndi-fye ape-pi ku-su mina;
Kuti nsumi-ne Kristu wandi;
Mu-lwani a-sosa ka-biye Mupashi,
U-kabwele limbi 'kasu-mina

2. Shi-wi lile-ti I-sa lelo,
Li-le papa-ta, Wi-bwe-lela;
Yesu ale-kwita, Bange-li ba-lipo,
U-mfwa amapepo Bwe-la iwe.

3. Nati nsumine, Nshi-ta yapwa,
Na-ti sumi-ne, nomba kufwa;
U-kushintauka Te-kuti ku-ngafwe,
U-kushintauka Ku-lete mfwa.

title: 227 - PALUPANDA
content:
227 - PALUPANDA

AT THE CROSS

1. Mupu-sushi andu-bwile no mulopa wakwe;
Acu-lile pali ine kuti nsange mweo.


CHORUS:
Palya pa lupanda namwene-lubuto;
Cisendo ca mutima casendwa .....
Mu busu-mi-no napelwa menso,
No-mba nakulasekela pe

2. Bu-she bwali bu-bi bwandi eco aculile?
Awe kwali ukutemwa Uko nshinga landa.

3. Na-ngu ndile teti mpwishe imisha nakwata;
Ta-kuli co ninga-cita Kano kuipela

title: 228 - MULUMBANYENI
content:
228 - MULUMBANYENI

PRAISE HIM PRAISE HIM

1. Lumbanyeni Yesu uwatulubula;
Mwimbe bonse ukutemwa kwakwe;
Cindikeni umungeli mukalamba,
E wamaka natumucindike


CHORUS:
Mulumbeni! Lumbuleni ubukulu;
Mulumbeni! Mu lwimbo no kwanga.

2. Lumbanyeni Yesu watulubula,
Fibi fyesu efyo aculile;
Wene libwe lyesu ilyabupususho,
Mulumbeni Yesu watanikwe.

3. Lumbanyeni Yesu uwatulubwile;
Mwimbileni bonse bakumulu;
Yesu Mfumu aleteko muyayaya,
Asamikwe shimapepo Mfumu;

title: 229 - NANI ALl KU MFUMU
content:
229 - NANI ALl KU MFUMU

WHO IS ON THE LORD’S SIDE?

1. N'ani uwasala Imfumu,
Bubi no busu-ma salapo.


CHORUS:
Sa-la, le-lo, Busuma no bubi salapo.

2. Abengi nabasalo bubi,
Ta ili inshila isuma.

3. Isa ku lubali lwa Mfumu,
Pantu e kuli shuko lyobe.

title: 230 - INE NSHILA
content:
230 - INE NSHILA

I AM THE WAY

1. Pamo nge mpanga shaluba, twaye ciye yeye-,
Kufuma mwicinka lyakwe, Tusange shani nshila.


CHORUS:
I-ne nshila ne cine no mweo; Teti wise kwa Tala kano muli 'ne

2. Twenda na masakamano, munshila mutende,
Ilyo 'bengi balelila, Tusange shani nshila.

3. Twenda na masakamano, munshila mutende,
Ilyo 'bengi balelila, Tusange shani nshila.

title: 231 - NJEBO MULUMBE WAKALE
content:
231 - NJEBO MULUMBE WAKALE

LET JESUS COME INTO YOUR HEART

1. Nga wafininwa ne mpulumushi, Yesu leka'be mu mweo;
Ngo lefwayo be no mweo upya, Yesu leka'be mu mweo.


CHORUS:
Le-ko kulengulula, wi-mutamfya kabili;
Shi-mwi-swile 'mutima Yesu engile mu mweo.

2. Ngo lefwayo kut'ubutishiwe, Yesu leka'be mu mweo:
Utufukauka tuli pepi, Yesu leka 'be mu mweo

3. Ngo li na macusho 'shingacimfya, Yesu leka'be mu mweo,
Nokusango kwafwiwa mu calo. Yesu leka'be mu mweo.

4. Nge fibusa fyafuma kuli 'we, Yesu leka'be mu mweo;
Wene nicibusa wa cishinka, Yesu leka 'be mu mweo.

5. Ngo lefwaisha ukumwishiba, Yesu leka'be mu mweo;
Ngo lefwaya kuba mumasano, Yesu leka'be mu mweo.

title: 232 - NSHAKAKUSHE
content:
232 - NSHAKAKUSHE

I WILL NEVER LEAVE THEE

1. Nshakakushe nkaba nobe, Nshakabale nkutamfya;
Nkalakwensha, nkakusunga. Pamulandu wa luse;
Wi latina, wilatina, We konke shiwi lyandi

2. Nge fipupu fyakushinga. Ulenjita mwipepo;
Nakula kufukatila, Nokusungwa kwa cine;
Mumesho nakula kwafwa, Nkabushe nshila yobe.

3. Ngo lwelele lwabutisha, Na'po ‘li palebeka;
Kusekela ngo mumana, Wamona 'ti fyawama;
Nakulaba na iwe pe, Nkasungo kwenda kobe.

4. Ilyo mweo wabipisha, Mwaba nokutwishika;
Matunko nga yafulisha, Ndetuma ulubuto;
No luunga lwakutemwa, muli ne ukacimfya

title: 233 - NJEBO MULUMBE WAKALE
content:
233 - NJEBO MULUMBE WAKALE

TELL ME THE OLD, OLD STORY

1. Njeba umulumbe wakale wa fya kwa Yesuu no lulumbi,
Nokutemwa kwaakwe;
Loondoolola mulumbe, kwati-nikumwana nalikana,
Wama cusho, uwabuula maaka.


CHORUS:
Unjebe umulu-mbe, umulumbe wakale,
Unjebe umulumbe, Yesu nokutemwa.

2. Njebe umulumbe ukuti njishibishe,
Ine ndi waa mpuulumushi, untu aafwilile;
Njeebo mulumbe lyoonse nokuunjeebe cine,
Mushita iishaa macusho, ukusansamusha.

3. Njeba umulumbe, lintu waba no mweenso,
Pamulanduu waacalweci, Naifiifyabaamo,
Ee, lulumbi lwacaalo, lulii kuumutima
Njeba muulumbe, wakale, Yeswaleekupoosha.

title: 234 - YESU LUBUTO LWA CALO
content:
234 - YESU LUBUTO LWA CALO

JESUS THE LIGHT OF THE WORLD

1. Bangeli baleimba, Yesu, Lubuto lwesu,
Lulumbi kuli Yesu, E lubuto lwa calo.


CHORUS:
Twakulaenda, mulubuto. seni uko luse lulebeka:
Lubeka kasuba nobushiku, Yesu lubuto lwesu.

2. Angeni mwemitundu, Yesu lubuto lwesu,
Imbeni naba ngeli, E lubuto lwa calo.

3. Kristu tumucindike, Elubuto lwa calo,
Ni-Mfumwi yape-nape, E lubuto lwacalo

4. A-cindikwe Mwanangwa, E lubuto Iwa calo,
E-bulu-ngami bwesu, E lubuto Iwa calo.

title: 235 - KABILI UBUSHIKU BWAFIKA
content:
235 - KABILI UBUSHIKU BWAFIKA

AGAIN THE DAY RETURNS

1. Bushiku bwa muushilo bwafika,
Bwalipaliilwee kubutendeko;
Fwe bana bakwe tatu bombamo,
Mubushiku bwakwa Jehova.

2. Natusunge bushiku bwashila;
Tuusambilile bufwayo bwakwe;
Aleumfwa kuu pepa kwa cine;
Muma pepo pamo namunyimbo.

3. Mfumu yesu umfwo kwita kwesu,
Uumfwa ukwiitaa kwa bana bobe,
Bulayo bwenu be nge mpili,
Tupeni ci-kuku fwe baluba.

4. Tata muli mwee twacetekela,
Muumaka Yee nuu twacetekela.
Wakulaba ciibusa kasunga
Lulumbi lu-be nenu pe nape.

title: 236 - UKUTEMWA KWAKWE
content:
236 - UKUTEMWA KWAKWE

HIS LOVING KINDNESS

1. We mutima shibuka, mwimbile kabumba obe
Ima ne nseko no kuya kukwimba nokutotela.


CHORUS:
Ima ne nseko no kuya kukwimba nokutotela.

2. Alimwene lyo nawile, antemenwe'lyo nali lyo,
Ampuswishe mukuluba, luse elyo ne cikuku.

3. Nangu fita fyafulisha nangu calo cilendufya
Antungulula mu mweo, luse elyo ne cikuku.

4. Lyo macusho yafulisha, nga makumbi yafitisha
Lyonse eminina pepi, luse elyo ne cikuku

title: 237 - MWIMININENI YESU
content:
237 - MWIMININENI YESU

STAND UP FOR JESUS

1. Mwiminineni Yesu mwe fita fyakwe mwe,
Imyeni imwe uluunga lwikanshiwa;
A letutungulula mukwansha no kwansha,
Limbi kuti bamushika bakwe bayanshya

2. Mwiminineni Yesu Umfwileni penga,
Alemutuma ilelo muyemulwila,
Ilelo imwe bonse muye mubombela,
Muba abakoseshiwa mube na maka.

3. Mwiminineni Yesu mu maka yakwe fye,
Imwe bene tekuti muicetekele,
Fwaleni fye inkwela ye landwe lisuma;
Kabiyeni konse konse nangu kwayafya.

4. Mwiminineni Yesu inshita ilepwa,
Ilelo fye ekulwa mailo mutende;
Ilyo wayansha akapelwa icitebo,
Wene akalaba ne Mfumu inshiku pe.

title: 238 - NI BA 'NI ABA?
content:
238 - NI BA 'NI ABA?

WHO WHO ARE THESE?

1. Bushe nibani 'ba bayabuka Bapusuka ukufuma kumfwa
Yesu abapususha basambwa mumulopa


CHORUS:
Bengile fipata mu Jerusalemu
Basambwa mumulopa wakwe
Bengile fipata mu Jerusalemu
Basambwa mu mulopa.

2. Aba mano mubwaice bwabo Basalile nshila shakwa Yesu
Basangile cikulu, Basambwa mu mulopa.

3. Aba ebo bali mu macusho Bali na Yesu baleseketa
Ne mitima yabuta, basambwa mumulopa

4. Aba ebo bali mumatunko Bayanshishe maka ya mulilo
Nomba Yesu abeta, basambwa mumulopa.

5. Nabapusuka bali pa cabu Bubi misongo ne mfwa takuli
Balesekela lyonse basambwa mumulopa.

title: 239 - BUSHE WANAKA?
content:
239 - BUSHE WANAKA?

ART THOU WEARY?

1. Bushe iwe naunaka, naupelelwa?
Yesu ati, Isa kuno 'sotushe.

2. Bushe nakwate tilaso 'kuti mwishibe?
Ee mu mbafu namu mimwe ne nkasa.

3. Bushe afwele citebo pa mutwe wakwe?
Ee citebo alifwele ca myunga.

4. Nga nakonka namusanga akampela nshi?
Amalanda no kucula fikapwa.

5. Nga namukonka mupepi cinshi akampela?
Ubulanda nokucula fikapwa.

6. Nga namulomba ukumbula, engankana?
Tetyakane; mulu, calo tipite.

7. Kusango kukonka kulya bushe ampale?
Bakasesema bashila bati Ee.

title: 240 - MONA UMUPUSUSHI ALI PA MWINSHI
content:
240 - MONA UMUPUSUSHI ALI PA MWINSHI

BEHOLD THE SAVIOUR AT THE DOOR

1. Umupusushi pa mwinshi, Kale 'shile, akonkonsha;
Acili a-lelolela, Wikana ukumwiswila.

2. Aleti, shita Golide, No mwingila wabutisha;
Ku mensa su-ba mafuta, Elyo ulemona bwino.

3. Umfwe shiwi lilekwita, Lyafuma ku-wacishinka;
Walikaba, Watalala, Esha ukupilibuka

4. Mulimo wakwe walapwa, Alaleka kupapata;
Wa fiko a-be wa fiko, Wa mushilo n'ifyo fine.

5. Icibi calaisalwa. Ala wice-lwa mwiswile;
Ima wisu-le ku cibi, Alaya takulolele.

6. Musuminishe engile, Alekupelo butusho;
Akulae-nda na iwe, Akula lya nobe lyonse.

title: 241 - NAFIKE CALO CISUMA
content:
241 - NAFIKE CALO CISUMA

BEULAH LAND

1. Nafike calo cisuma, Ne fyuma fyonse 'ne fyandi;
Kasuba kabalika pe, Pantu bushiku nabupwa.


CHORUS:
Icalo ici Keneni, Lintu nafiko lupili,
Kwishilya kwa mumana 'ko namone ng'anda shisuma;
Icalo ici cawama nkekala uko pe na pe.

2. Yesu aenda na ine, Tulesosa bwino bwino.
Antungulula kuboko, Pantu nafika mu pepi.

3. Cena kuno cawamisha, Cafuma ku calo cilya,
Ku mimana ya bumi pe, Maluba yasuma sana.

4. Natontonkanya ndeumfwa, Nyimbo sha bangeli kulya.
Baleimba 'lwimbo nsuma, Lwimbo lwa lupusukilo.

title: 242 - WALISHUKA UMWANDO
content:
242 - WALISHUKA UMWANDO

BLEST BE THE TIE

1. Washu-ka u-mwando, Waka-ke mi-tima;
Ukwa-mpana-, 'Kuba-pamo-,
Kwaba-nga ku-mulu.

2. Ku ci-puna-cenu, Twape-la ma-pepo;
Mwenso-kufwa-ya ne-nsansa,
Fyonse-fili-pamo.

3. Tweshe-ukwa-fwana, Mu ma-landa-yonse;
Tuse-ndesha-nye fi-sendo-,
Tule-ba ne-nkumbu.

4. Ilyo-twale-kana, Tatu-seke-lela;
Tuli-no bucete-kelo-,
Tuka-ya ku-mana.

title: 243 - BUKA WE MUTIMA WANDI
content:
243 - BUKA WE MUTIMA WANDI

ARISE MY SOUL, ARISE

1. Shi-buka we muti-ma Wiba na mwenso,
I-lambo lya cine lyamfumishe ku mfwa;
Ku cipuna ndesumina, Ku cipuna ndesumina;
Shina lyandi lyalilembwa.

2. Ekala ku mulu, Alepapatila,
Alepapatila no mulopa wakwe,
Twalubwilwe no mulopa, Twalubwilwe no mulopa:
Uwatwelwe ku cipuna.

3. A-li ne filaso, Ifya pa Kalvari,
A-mpepeleleko, Anandile bwino,
Mweleleni 'fya sosele, Mweleleni 'fya sosele;
Aicefya teti afwe.

4. Ta-ta alaumfwa nga apepa Yesu.
U-musubwa wakwe, Tekuti amushe,
Mupashi wakwe waita, Mupashi wakwe waita;
'Ne nimfwalwa kuli Lesa.

title: 244 - KONKA YESU
content:
244 - KONKA YESU

COME TO JESUS

1. Konka Yesu, Konka Yesu;
Konka Yesu nomba;
Nomba konka Yesu,
Konka Yesu nomba.

2. Mwite Yesu, Mwite Yesu
Mwite Yesu nomba
Nomba Mwite Yesu.
Mwite Yesu nomba

3. Ulemumfwa Yesu, Ulemumfwa Yesu.
Ulemumfwa Yesu nomba
Nomba Ulemumfwa Yesu
Ulemumfwa Yesu nomba

4. Akulinda Yesu, Akulinda Yesu
Akulinda Yesu nomba
Nomba akulinda Yesu
Akulinda Yesu nomba

5. Akutemwa Yesu, Akutemwa Yesu
Akutemwa Yesu Nomba
Nomba Akutemwa Yesu
Akutemwa Yesu nomba

6. wamaka Yesu, wamaka Yesu
wamaka Yesu nomba
Nomba wamaka Yesu
wamaka Yesu nomba

7. Cetekela Yesu, Cetekela Yesu
Cetekela Yesu nomba
nomba Cetekela nomba
Cetekela Yesu nomba

title: 245 - TAKULI ISHINA LIMBI
content:
245 - TAKULI ISHINA LIMBI

NO OTHER NAME

1. Takuli Ishina limbi ilyo ifwe twatemwa,
Lilasekesha bangeli na baKristu pano nse.


CHORUS:
Yesu ... Yesu ... Takuli Ishina limbi.
Yesu ... Yesu ... Takuli Ishina limbi.

2. Takuli Ishina limbi lyakutusekelesha;
Takuli Ishina limbi, Kuti twasekelela.

3. Ninjishiba nkamumona, Lintu akamoneka;
No kumfwa, "Wacita bwino," Nkaba no kusekela

4. Nga afwaya nalabomba, Mwi bala lyakwe muno;
Ndeti mumpalile fyonse, Mashiwi ne milimo.

title: 246 - ISHIWI LIMO FYE ILYA KWA YESU
content:
246 - ISHIWI LIMO FYE ILYA KWA YESU

NOW JUST A WORD FOR JESUS

1. Natumfwe shiwi lya Yesu Cibusa obe,
Bwela iwe utwebeko 'Co akwitila.


CHORUS:
Tumfwe kuli Yes'i-shiwi. Litwafwe mu nshila;
Shiwi lyakwa Yesu limo, Imba upepe.

2. Tumfwe Shiwi lya Yesu, Ne fyo akwelela;
Mu cikuku tulesha kufika ku mulu.

3. Tumfwe Shiwi lya Yesu, Uwatufwilile,
Natemwa Umupusushi uwamfwilile.

4. Tumfwe Shiwi lya Yesu, Twilapose nshita,
Umutima wabipa, Uleto bulanda.

5. Tumfwe Shiwi lya Yesu, Kusho busumino.
Fuma mu kunaka, Fyonse pela ku Mfumu.

title: 247 - LISHENI NDIBU
content:
247 - LISHENI NDIBU

RING THE BELLS OF HEAVEN

1. Lisheni indibu kulyu buseko, Pa muntu wafuma ku bubi;
Wishi alemukumanya mu nshila, Amusengela walubile.


CHORUS:
Lulu-mbi baimba bangeli, Lulu-mbi lisheni amasese:
Abalubulwa baleimbo lwimbo, Baleimba lwa kulubulwa

2. Lisheni indibu kuli buseko, Walubile nomba nabwela;
Apusushiwa kufuma ku bubi, Wene afyalwa cipya cipya.

3. Lisheni Indibu ku mutebeto, Bangeli baleimbo bwansho;
Twaleni ilyashi liye kutali, Watemwikwa nafyalwa lelo.

title: 248 - YESU WAKU NAZARETI ALEPITA
content:
248 - YESU WAKU NAZARETI ALEPITA

JESUS OF NAZARETH PASSETH BY

1. Cinshi bumba lilekonka? Nia-ni untulilekonka,
Kuli congo cikalamba, Bushe kupepa, balepepa?
Mubukali-i balyaswike, Alani Yeswalepita,
Mubukali balyaswike, Ala ni Yesu alepita.

2. Ninani Yesu winioyu? 'Walenga bantu bamukonke,
Mweni ewalenga-abantu, Kuci-taifyo alefwaya;
Mashiwi yabo yaleta, Alani Yesu alepita.
Mashiwi yabo yaleti. Ala ni Yesu alepita.

3. Uyu Yesu taliwafye, Afumishe kucula kwesu,
Bonse bali ne fyafina, Alibakakulwile bonse;
Impofu yasekelo kumfwa, Ala ni Yesu alepita;
Mpofu yasekelo kumfwa, Alani Yesu alepita.

4. Elo tule-enda mu-makasa aendele,
Aletupembela lyonse, ukutupa ukusekela,
Natubilikishe bonse, Alani Yesu alepita;
Natubilikishe bonse, Alani Yesu alepita.

5. Mwebafininwa iseni, Alemwelela bonse fibi,
Mwebafuma kuli Lesa, Bweleni mwelelwe.
Mwe baletunkwa iseni. Ala ni Yesu alepita,
Mwebaletunkwa Iseni, Alani Yesu alepita.

6. Nga mwakana kwita kwakwe, Noluse pamo nokutemwa,
Akafuma kuli Imwe, Takatalya mwita kabili.
Ngamwacelwa Imwe mukomfwa, Alani Yesu alepita,
Nga mwacelwa Imwe mukomfwa, Alani Yesu alepita.

title: 249 - MAKUMI PABULA NA PABULA
content:
249 - MAKUMI PABULA NA PABULA

THE NINETY AND NINE

1. Makumi pabula 'lyo na pabula, Shali mwi-ci-nka mulya,
Imo tayalimo, yali pampili, kutali kufuma kwi cinka,
Yalubile yali mu mpanga yeka, Tayali mumaboko ya mucemi;
Tayali mumaboko yamu Cemi.

2. Makumi pabula lyo na pabula, Bushe ta'shili sha-linga,
Kacema atile, "Imo pa-li shi, na iya kufuma kuli'ne
Nangwi nshila yabipa mulya mabwe,
Ndeya fwaye mpanga mu matololo,
Ndeya fwaye mpanga mu matololo."

3. hilye shapuswike tashaishibe, Amenshi fyo ya shikile,
Nemfimfi fyo yali umo aile, Asangile mpange yaluba.
Aumfwa yalila mumatololo, Yali yalwala pepi nokufwa,
Yali yalwala pepi nokufwa.

title: 250 - UKUFUMA KU MESHO
content:
250 - UKUFUMA KU MESHO

YIELD NOT TO TEMPTATION

1. Su-la matunko-ya-twa-la ku bubi,
Nga 'we wayaci-mfya 'ka-leta bambi,
Lwi-sha fye nama-ka ka-nisho bubi,
U-mwipushe Yesu- E-na lekwafwa.


CHORUS:
Mwi-pushe Yesu E-ka Ma-ka alekupe-la
A-Ii Uwaipe-Ia U-kukwafwa iwe.

2. Fu-ma kububi na- ‘ba-sose nsele,
Shi-nailya Mfumu -- wi- bula 'pa fye,
Ba-uwa cine-we Ba' -walekanya,
U-mwipushe Ye-su E-na 'ukwafwa.


3. Kulyu-yo wansha 'kapelwe citebo,
No-lucetekelo, A-we tukansha,
Mupusushi Ena, Emaka yesu,
U-mwipushe Yesu, E-na ‘lekwafwa.

title: 251 - NANGU NDILE UKULILA TETI KUMPUSUSHE
content:
251 - NANGU NDILE UKULILA TETI KUMPUSUSHE

WEEPING WILL NOT SAVE ME

1. Nangu ndile sha-ni Tekuti cimpusushe,
Nangu kufumyo ‘mwenso,
Takwingafumya bubi, Teti kumpusu-she.


CHORUS:
Yesu e wamfwilile, Aculile pa muti,
E winga nkakula, E winga mpusu-sha.

2. Nangu mombe shani, No bololoke bwandi
No kuyumfwa ndi bwino,
Mweo teti ube upya, Teti fimpusu-she

3. Nangu kulole-la Tekuti kumpusushe,
Nangu naba no luse,
Nga nati, kandolele, Kulolela nimfwa

4. Muli Yesu mweka Emwakupusukila,
Pa mulimo acita,
Eko ndebutukila. Kuti napusuka

title: 252 - MUCETEKELE  EKAFYE
content:
252 - MUCETEKELE EKAFYE

ONLY TRUST HIM

1. Isa we wa mpulumushi kuluse lwa Mfumu,
Alekupa ukutusha, nga wamusumina.


CHORUS:
Ceteke-ela, cetekela, Mucetekele;
Upusu-uke, Upusuke, 'Lakupususha.

2. Aitile umulopa wakwe palupanda,
Itumpike mumulopa wakwe walabuta.

3. Yesu enshila ya cine, Iya ku butusho,
Musumine walacelwa, ukapoka amapalo.

4. Isa nomba wilundanye, Kwibumba lya Mfumu,
Ukekale mumpange yo mulyukusekela

title: 253 - MONA KAKUMBA MUSUMA
content:
253 - MONA KAKUMBA MUSUMA

SEE, ISREAL’S GENTLE SHEPHARD

1. Mo-na Kakumba Aima, Kakumba musuma;
A-leite-Mpanga shakwe, Ukuyakuntwali.

2. Le-ka shise kuli ine, Imfumwileita,
Kuti shikwatyo bupalo, Eco Aishile.

3. Twa-baleta ku-li Imwe, Mu-maboko yenu,
Twasekela tuli benu benu fye penape.

title: 254 - LUMBANYENI SHINA LYAKWA JEHOVA
content:
254 - LUMBANYENI SHINA LYAKWA JEHOVA

PRAISE YE JEHOV’S NAME

1. Lumbanyeni shina ilyakwa Jehova, lumbanyeni
Imeni mumwimbile mweba ku mulu,
Ni Leso waluse, lumbanyeni.

2. Natwimbile Mfumu Mapenga yomfwike konse konse,
Natumucindike mu nyimbo shisuma,
Lumbuleni shina tumwimbile.

3. Lyo mulemwimbila kusheni ciunda, mwimbileni,
Mwebalemwimbila cindikeni Mfumu,
Natumucindike, tumwimbile.

title: 255 - NDEKUKABILA YESU
content:
255 - NDEKUKABILA YESU

I NEED THEE PRECIOUS JESUS

1. Ndekukabila Ye-su pantu ndi mupina,
Ndi mwe-ni u-mule-ndo, Nshakwata fya calo,
Kute-mwa kwa kwa Ye-su, Kula-nsansa-mu-sha.
Ku-tungulu-le nshi-la mubulendo bwandi

2. Ndefwaya umuti-ma, Uwa-Mfumu Yesu,
Waku-ngafwa mu-me-sho, Pamo mu-malanda.
Ndefwa-ya Umupa-shi Waku-nsambi -li -sha,
U-nange fya kwa Ye-su, Umwana wa-mpanga.

3. Ndekukabila Y e-su Kumu-mona bwangu,
Nkafi-mbwe no bu-ka-ta Nka-mo-ne cipuna
Pamo-naba lubu-lwa Tuka-lasekela,
Tu-kembo lwimbo pe-fye, Tukamone Mfumu

title: 256 - MWE LESA KAFWA
content:
256 - MWE LESA KAFWA

O GOD OUR HELP

1. Mwe Lesa kafwa wakale, Ne nshita shikesa;
Cubo cesu ku cipupu, We ng'anda yesu pe

2. Mwe cinshingwa ca cipuna, Twakulasungwa pe.
Kuboko kwenu kwamaka Kwakulatucinga

3. Lintu mpili tashaliko, Pamo ne ci calo;
Nshita shonse uli Lesa, kufika ne mpela.

4. Imyaka ikana limo, yaba nge cungulo;
Nshiku shesu nasho bwipi, shaba ngo lucelo.

title: 257 - TASUNKANISHIWA
content:
257 - TASUNKANISHIWA

UNSHAKEN AS THE SACRED HILLS

1. Twisunkanishiwa tube nge mpili sha mushilo,
Takaseshiwe nakalya, Uwamusumina

2. Te fibumba nangu impili ifinga tusunga;
Kano mumaboko yakwe, Emo twinga sungwa.

3. Ubasunge, Bakutemwa mu mitima yabo:
Abacetekela cine, Ta basule funde.

title: 258 - BUCETEKELO BUMO
content:
258 - BUCETEKELO BUMO

ONE LIVING FAITH

1. Funde lya Mfumu lifwaya bucetekelo bwa cine;
Bufwayo bwakwe ni ubu, bonse bacite cishinka.

2. Mfumu tubelele luse pa fintu fyonse twabifya;
Funde lyenu lya mushilo, lelo talisungwa bwino.

3. Tatucite fyo mufwaya, Mwe Mfumu mutubutishe,
Pa mulandu wakwa Yesu, kuti tulesunge funde.

title: 259 - BUSHE TUKAYA KUMANA
content:
259 - BUSHE TUKAYA KUMANA

SHALL WE MEET?

1. Bushe tukaya kumana nga amacusho yapwa
Kukaba ukusekela, Malanda takwakabe.


CHORUS:
Tukaya - Kumana, Kwishilya ilya ci-mana;
Nga twaku-mana kwishilya, Pa cabu caku mulu.

2. Tukaku-mana pa cabu ngo lwendo lwesu lwapwa-;
Tukemi-nike cibwato, Pa cabu ca ku mulu.

3. Tukaku-mana mu mushi, 'Mo maya-nda yabeka-;
Fibumba ifyabekesha, Uwakulwa no Mwine.

4. Tukaku-mana na Kristu, 'Ly' akesa-senda bakwe
Tukeshi-bo luse lwakwe, Tukeka-la na Wene.

title: 260 - ILUNGU LYA WAMA
content:
260 - ILUNGU LYA WAMA

VALE OF BEULAH

1. Ndepita mwilungu ili baletila libi.
Lelo nasanga mu nshila muli fye amaluba;
Ilungu lya wama ninshila isuma,
Mupusushi nyende nankwe inshita fye shonse


CHORUS:
We lungu lya wama Walicindamisha;
We mpanga we yabulayo Nakumona kulya

2. Tekuti kube cinshingwa cakulishe nshila,
Lulumbi lwa Mupusushi lubutishe nsnila;
Abangeli baleimba inyimbo shisuma,
Shawamisha, shansekesha ilyo ndeya mu nshila

3. Awe ndi u-wacimwemwe, Ndeya ku musumba,
Nakulasekela lyonse lyo nshila yabuta;
Ndi apepi no kumona fibi fyaisulwa,
Pantu iyi e nshila i-yalola ku mulu.

title: 261 - ILUNGU LISUMA ILYA EDENI
content:
261 - ILUNGU LISUMA ILYA EDENI

BEAUTIFUL VALEY OF EDEN

1. Mpanga isuma ya Edeni, Yabe yawamisha;
Ku mitima ya banaka, Yaba yawamisha.


CHORUS:
Mpanga yawama ya Eden, Mushi wa bapalwa;
Nangu ningaba mu macusho, Ndota kutusha kulya.

2. Umutima uleloosha, Ukayasekela,
Kumfwe nyimbo sha bangeli kufuma kutali

3. Ku musumba wakwa Yesu, kuli abafusuka
Pa mapili ya lulumbi, Nyimbo shilomfwika.

title: 262 - KRISTU NANGU BARABBA
content:
262 - KRISTU NANGU BARABBA

CHRIST OF BARABBAS

1. Ncite nshi na-Yesu 'Yu imwe mwande-tela,
Nafwalo mwi-ngilo yu-, Ne myunga ku mutwe.


CHORUS:
Ndemwipusha imwe, Muletila shani?
Bushe nta-nike Yesu yu, Ndeke Barabba- 'ye?

2. Bushe mupe mpupu-, Umubi wa fi-lumba?
Uwa bipa na Yesu-, N'ani mule-fwaya?

3. Lipusho 'li kwena-, Likulu lyaku-papa!
Bushe ndeci-ta shani-, Cape-seshe amano

4. Bushe ncite shani-, Bushe nka-ne-i-calo?
Babiliki-she 'bati-, Awe, Ata-nikwe.

5. Te ku mubi eka-, Lipusho 'Ii lya-isa,
Na imwe be-na Kristu-, Muli mu kwe-shiwa.

title: 263 - LETENI IMWE ICEKUMI CONSE
content:
263 - LETENI IMWE ICEKUMI CONSE

BRING YE ALL THE TITHES

1. Umfweni mashiwi ayalembelwe-, Leteni icekumi mu ng'anda:
Peleni ne Mitima yenu yonse-, Mukapelwa a-ma-pa-lo


CHORUS:
Leteni imwe bonse ceku-mi, Lesa 'leti elyo munje-she,
Nga- nsha-kamupele mapa-lo, Tamwaka-kwate nce-nde paku-bi-ka.

2. Mulefwaya kwishiba maka yakwe-, Leteni icekumi mu ng'anda;
Ikaleni nankwe mu nshita shonse-, ely'alemupa ma-pa-lo

3. Mulandu nshi 'we ukwete ku Mfumu-? Leteni icekumi mu ng 'anda;
Nga mwafilwa kuleta tamwapalwe-, Leteni mupo-ke Pa-Io.

4. Mitima yenu icindike Mfumu-, 'Lyo mwalete cekumi mu nganda:
Sumineni malayo mulumbanye-, Pela Imfumu mu-ti--ma.

5. Imbeni nyimbo shisuma ku Mfumu-, 'Lyo mwalete cekumi mu nganda;
Twimbe Aleluya bonse ku Mfumu-, Pantu wene a-tu-pa--la

title: 264 - KASUBA KAKWA YEHOFA
content:
264 - KASUBA KAKWA YEHOFA

HOLY DAY JEHOVAH’S REST

1. Kasuba ka Yehofa kapabutendekelo,
Akasalile ‘mwine lintwa pwile milimo.


CHORUS:
Tusekele, Tusekele, Tusekele, Tusekele,
Kwingila mu butusho, Bwa bushiku bwa Mfumu

2. Abombele milimo mu nshiku mutanda fye,
Ubwa cinelubali ebwabutishe bweka.

3. Bantu bapilibwile kutusha pali cimo,
Moneni mu Chipingo tacilesosa ifyo.

4. Abacine basosa: Muntu apilibwile,
Ishiwi lyakwa Lesa lyena lya muyayaya.

5. Ilyo nafwailishe no kusange Sabata,
Natendeke kukonka, E calinga kucita.

title: 265 - UMUTENDE USUMA
content:
265 - UMUTENDE USUMA

PEACE PERFECT PEACE

1. U-mutende mu calo ca bipa?
Mulo-pa wakwa Yesu mu-tende,

2. U-mutende mu kumubombela?
Kuci-te fya Mfumu e bu-tu-sho,

3. 3 U-mutende naculishe cibi?
Kuli Ye-su nasango bu-tu-sho.

4. U-mutende ne fibusa kulya,
Muli Ye-su bonse tule-su-ngwa.

5. U-mutende nangu tatwishiba,
Twai-shiba Ali pa cipuna.

title: 266 - YESU NDEKONKA IMWE
content:
266 - YESU NDEKONKA IMWE

JESUS I WILL FOLLOW THEE

1. Yesu ndekonka Imwe, Pantu mwaita ine,
Temwa shonse naisa, kukonka ku ng'anda.


CHORUS:
Ndeko-nka Imwe, Ndeko-nka Imwe,
Ndeko-nka Imwe, Shonse muntangila

2. Menso yandi yaluba, Nshila ku nkasa shandi,
Nalimo nalinaka, Lelo mwalikosa.

3. Kubipa no kunaka, Ifi balwani bandi,
Lelo ndeposa shonse pantu ndemukonka

title: 267 - TANDE MBUTO SHA LUSE
content:
267 - TANDE MBUTO SHA LUSE

SCATTER SEEDS OF KINDNESS

1. Tukolonganike mbuto Lyo tuleya mu nshila,
Isha ngano na maluba, Tufumyemo fisoso.
Natusange kusekela mu mapalo ya lelo;
No kuboko kwatekanya Kufumyemo kalolo.


CHORUS:
Tande mbuto sha fuse, Tande mbuto sha luse;
Tande mbuto sha luse, Kuti tukasombole.

2. Tatusakamane nyimbo utoni tuleimba;
Tatulemona maluba kufike lyo yauma,
Tatusakamana ku ma-kumbi yalya ya mfula;
Ukusuka amakumbi, Ayamfula yapita.

3. Nga mwabika utuminwe twa mwana 'patalala,
Kuti tonse twaumina, Teti tusakamane;
Bushe Mupusushi wesu engatulekelesha?
Ifilembo fya tuminwe, Bushe filetucusha?

4. Tulya tu minwe tunono, Tulatwibukisha lyonse,
Ku mashiwi yabipa, Tulebukisha lyonse;
Tulatwibukisha tuli mu mfula ya talala,
Tekulatanda imyunga, Tukasepa maluba.

title: 268 - MFUMU CIPUPU CAPUNGA
content:
268 - MFUMU CIPUPU CAPUNGA

MASTER THE TEMPEST IS RAGING

1. Mfumu cipupu capu-nga, Mabimbi yafu-lisha;
Kumulu kwafita fiti-ti, Umwa kuba mwa-bula;
Mfumu moneni twala-fwa Mwasendama-shani!
Ubwato bwesu bwalabu-nda, Shibukeni mutwafwe.


CHORUS:
"Umwela ulomfwe shiwi lyandi, Ta ... lala ... Mutende, Tondolo
Nangu mabimbi ya cambeshi, Fibanda, bantu nangu fi-ntu nshi!
Amenshi teti yabunsho bwato, Umulyu mwine wa fintu fyonse;
Fyonse filomfwe shiwi lyandi; Mutende, Tondolo,
Fyonse filomfwe shiwi lyandi; Umu-tende."

2. Mfumu mutima wana-ka, Ku mabimbi ya calo,
Mutima waculishe ci-bi, Shibukeni mungafwe;
Masakamano ya bu-bi, yanasho mu-tima;
Nalafwa Mfumu yandi nala-fwa, Endesheni mu ntule.

3. Mfumu amacusho ya-pwa, Nomba kwaba to-ndolo,
Kasuba nomba kabali-ka, Na ku mulu kwa buta;
Mwinsha neka Mupusu-shi, Ba pepi na-ine,
No buseko palya nkamwimbi-la, 'Lyo nkafika pa cabu.

title: 269 - UMUPUSUSHI WA KUPAPA
content:
269 - UMUPUSUSHI WA KUPAPA

A WONDERFUL SAVIOUR

1. Mupusushi wandi ni Yesu Mfumu, Wa kupapisha kuli'ne,
Afisa umweo wandi mu libwe, Ukwaba menshi yasuma.


CHORUS:
Afisa umweo wandi mu Cilibwe, Cimfule mu chiswebebe
Afiso mweo mu kutemwa kwakwe, Alemfimba no kuboko
Alemfimba no kuboko.

2. Mupusushi wandi ni Yesu Mfumu, Antule cisendo candi;
Mu maboko yakwe lyonse ndasungwa, Awe 'ne nshakaseshiwe.

3. Ndasamikwa na mapalo ayengi, Anjisusha na Mupashi;
Ndeimba lwimbo lwa kumulumbanya, Pa kutuma Mupusushi.

4. Ilyo nkafwikwa lulumbi nkasendwa, Nkamusanga mulwelele;
Kupususha kwakwe kwa kupapisha, Ne minshipendwa tukemba.

title: 270 - UMUPUSUSHI WESU
content:
270 - UMUPUSUSHI WESU

OUR BLEST REDEEMER

1. Lintu Yesu ‘shalikepo abasambi bakwe;
Umupashi atupela kuba nefwe.

2. Aishiletusangula tube ba cikuku;
Afwaya fwaye mitima mwa kwikala.

3. Tuleumfwe shiwi lyakwe liletepelesha:
Lyaleshe fibi lyatweba ifya ku mulu.

4. Cikuku ico twakwata kwanshya kwesu konse:
Matontonkanyo yashila yali yakwe.

5. We Mupashi wa mushilo utumfwile luse:
Mitima yesu ibe cifulo cobe.

title: 271 - NANGU FYE SHAKASHIKA
content:
271 - NANGU FYE SHAKASHIKA

THOUGH YOUR SINS BE AS SCARLET

1. Nangu fye sha-kashika shikabuta nge mpemba,
Nangu fye sha-kashika shikabuta nge mpemba
Nangu shaka., shiki-sha Shikabutisha;
Nangu fye sha-kashika, Nangu fye sha-kashika,
Shikabuta nge mpemba, Shikabuta nge mpemba

2. lshiwi li-lekwita. Bwelela kuli Yesu,
Ishiwi li-lekwita, Bwelela kuli Yesu;
Alikwati sho lu-se no kute-mwisha:
Ishiwi li-lekwita, Ishiwi li-lekwita,
Bwelela kuli Lesa, Bwelela kuli Lesa

3. 'Kakwele-la-ububi. Takabwibukisheko,
'Kakwele-la-ububi, Takabwibukisheko;
Lolesheni .. kul i - 'ne, Asosa Lesa,
'Kakwele-la-ububi . kakwele-la-ububi;
Takabwi-bukisheko, Takabwi bukisheko

title: 272 - POSA UMWANDO WA MWEO
content:
272 - POSA UMWANDO WA MWEO

THROW OUT THE LIFE LINE

1. Poso mwando obe pa mabimbi, Epali umo wingapususha:
Nan'engafwaya ku nupususha? Kuti a-pusuke kufuma kumfwa.


CHORUS:
Poso umwando, posa umwando, Umo asendwa na menshi,
Paso umwando, posa umwando, Umo asendwa na menshi.

2. Paso mwando obe fye na maka, Wikokola, wilashima shima;
Mona anwena aleya panshi, Iwe po-sa mwando umupusushe.

3. Paso Mwando obe ku baluba, Abali uko ushingafika;
Myela ya matunko yabasenda, No kuse-ndwa na menshi ya mu calo.

4. Nshita ya kupususha yalapwa, Balaswa baye ku muyayaya;
Kanshi endesha fye we munyina, Iwe po-so mwando ubapusushe.

title: 273 - SHINTILILA MU MABOKO
content:
273 - SHINTILILA MU MABOKO

LEAN ON HIS ARMS

1. Shinti-lila we pali Ye-su, A-kula kwafwa Kula kwafwa;
Nga wa-cetekela kute-mwa, Uke-mba ulwimbo.


CHORUS:
Shinti-lila, Mucetekele; Shinti-lila. Mu luse lwakwe;
Shinti-Iila, Mona ku mulu, Ba, muma-boko yakwe

2. Shinti-lila we pali Ye-su, A-kabu-tishe-, Nshila yobe;
Konka uko alekutwa-la; Umfwe shiwi lyakwe.

3. Shinti-lila we pali Ye-su, Mu-shile fyonse-, Shile lyonse:
Aba no kutemwa no lu-se, Ala-mona fyonse

title: 274 - NALIBA NO MU PUSUSHI
content:
274 - NALIBA NO MU PUSUSHI

I HAVE A SAVIOUR

1. Ninkwato Mu-pusushi-anjita, Aliba no luse e Cibusa candi;
Ala-mpepula no kute-mwa kwakwe, Ni Katula wandi e Katula obe


CHORUS:
Ndeku-lombela we ndeku-lombela;
Ndekupe-pelela ko-. Ndeku-pepe-, la.

2. Ni nkwata Ta-ta ena alimpela; Ubuce-tekelo ubwa mu-yayaya;
Bwangu alanjinjita ku mulu ku mwakwe, Akansu-minisha kuti nka-ye nobe.

3. Ni-nkwata mwingila u-wabuta, Nakula-linda nka-fwale 'ly'a-kabwela;
Nkafwa-lo mwingi-la uwa-bekesha, Nobe we cibusa ukakwa-te umo.

4. A-mpo mute-nde 'pita nga menshi, Untu fi-busa fya calo ta-fyakwata;
Kristu e mwine e upe-la fyonse. Nobe u mutende kuti a-kupa.

5. Nga-wamusa-nga kebe-ko bambi, Mupusu-shi wandi. Mupusushi obe.
Pepa Mupusu-shi kuba-pususha, Akasu-ke pepo lyayasu-kwa kale.

title: 275 - UMUYAYAYA NI KWI?
content:
275 - UMUYAYAYA NI KWI?

ETERNITY WHERE?

1. Umuyayaya bushe ni kwi waba? Tekutl ucumfwe lelo e-ko waba;
Lipu-sho likalamba: Muyayaya? Lipu-sho likalamba: Waba kwisa?

2. Umuyayaya bushe ni kwi waba? Niku balubulwa nangu ku baluba;
Cirno pali fibili: Muyayaya, Cimo pali fibili: Waba kwisa?

3. Umuyayaya bushe ni kwi waba? Salo bu-suma bwa calo no bwa mulu:
Cisu-ma ukusala Muyayaya, Cisu-ma ukusala: Waba kwisa?

4. Umuyayaya bushe ni kwi waba? Ubupi-ngulo bwa Mfumu buli pepi:
Ile-lo ulesala: Muyayaya, Ile-lo ulesala: Waba kwisa?

5. Umuyayaya bushe ni kwi waba? Cibusa wilatemwa ifya mu calo;
Asu-ka ilipusho Muyayaya, Asu-ka ilipusho Waba kwisa?

title: 276 - UKUFWAYA INE
content:
276 - UKUFWAYA INE

SEEKING FOR ME

1. Yesu Imfumu mu Betelemu, 'Fyalilwe mwi cinka ngo mupina;
Awe mwandi! Cali ca kupapa, Kwisa fwaya ine.

2. Yesu Mupusushi pa lupanda, Andubwile no mulopa wakwe;
Awe mwandi! Cali ca kupapa, Ukufwila ine.

3. Yesu Mupusushi umo wine. Na lilya naile ciyeyeye:
Alepapatilo mweo wandi, Aleita ine.

4. Yes' akesa kufuma ku mulu, Bulayo busuma kuli ifwe;
Nkamumona ‘lefuma ku mulu, Akeshila ine.

title: 277 - NTUNGULULA LUBUTO NILUBA
content:
277 - NTUNGULULA LUBUTO NILUBA

LEAD KINDLY LIGHT

1. Ntungulula Lubuto ni luba-, Ntungululwe;
Mfifi yafulisha ndyu kutali-, Ntungu-lulwe-;
Munsunge ine epali na-lu-ba, Mulame amakasa-yandi-

2. Naikele kwabulo kwipusha-. Ukuntangilila;
Nasalile nshila nalefwaya-. Ntungu-lulwe-;
Natemenwe kwenda mu fya-bi-pa, Nshali bwino labenyu-bubi-

3. Nge fyo nimpalwa na maka yenu-. Ntungululwe;
Kupita mu macusho ya calo-, naya-pita-;
Mu lucelo nkamona ba-nge-li, Balemposha nabatemwa-kale-.

title: 278 - NSHILA YOBE WE MFUMU
content:
278 - NSHILA YOBE WE MFUMU

NOT MY WAY

1. Nshila - yobe-, Mfumu, Nangu - yafi-, tisha; Ntungu-lula-, Mfumu, Unsa-, lile - nshila. Teti-, njisa-Iile, Awe-, teti-ncite. Nsali-la we-, Mfumu, Nkenda-, mwalu-ngama.

2. Bufu-mu bo-. mfwayo; Bobe - ne nshi-le yi; Yale-la ku-, Mfumu; Epa-, Ii na-luba, Uli, bumi-bwandi, 'Lyo ncu-, la no-bumi; Nsali-la we-, mwine Ici-, kuwa-mina

3. Nsali-la fi-, busa: Malwe - leno-, bumi, Nama-saka-, mano; Bupi-na ne-, fyuma: Teku-, sala - kwandi; Munsa-, lile - Imwe; Nimwe - Ntungu-, lushi, We ntu-, lo ya - fyonse.

title: 279 - ISENI KULI INE
content:
279 - ISENI KULI INE

COME UNTO ME

1. We wa-ba no bulanda, Menso tawakwata,
Kusu-mina mu Mfumu E mwa-ba buseko.


CHORUS:
Se ... ni kuli 'ne- ... mweba- ... bomba,
Mwe-ba fininwa, Ndemupa ubutusho,
Se ... ndeni koli ... ilyandi- ... lyapepu ... ka.

2. Fyonse ifya mu calo tafi-belelela;
Lelo kutemwa kwakwe eku-belela pe.

3. Ubu-mi bwa Mupashi, Bupe-lwa na Kristu,
Bushe nausenukwa, Is'obe no mweo.

4. Mute-nde ngo mumana, Kute-mwa ngo lwimbo,
Iko-Ii lyapepuka, Talya-fina iyo.

title: 280 - INYIMBO E SHISUMA
content:
280 - INYIMBO E SHISUMA

OUR KING

1. Inyimbo e shisu-ma twimba ku-li 'Mwe;
Tumutasha Katu-Ia Inshila ya - mwe.


CHORUS:
Tule ... tasha E Katula - wesu (tasha)
Tule… imba Ubufumu - bwakwe.

2. Atemenwe aba-na lintu ali - pano;
Nomba ali ku mu-lu Atutemwi-sha pe

3. Tutemwa ukuta-sha no kumfwe mi-lumbe:
Ilintu ali pa-nshi Epo ku Ga-lile.

4. Mwe Katula washu-ka Twaisa ku-Ii 'Mwe;
Tulelomba mutwa-fwe Kumupala-mina.

title: 281 - ULUTANDA LUSUMA
content:
281 - ULUTANDA LUSUMA

A BEAUTIFUL STAR

1. Kwalyu lutanda ubu-shiku, Lwabeka na ma-ka ya-mulu:
Lwatungul wi Ie aba-mano, Kwafya-lilwe, Mupu-sushi.


CHORUS:
Lule-beka. Lule-beka, Mu ma-lungu na pa-mpili,
Lule-beka, Lule-beka, Lupusukilo lwa kwa - Lesa.

2. Amalembo a-yaci-shinka, E yabalangi-le lu-tanda;
Balukonkele apa-tali, Lwali - luta-nda Iwa - Yesu

3. Natulukonke nga ba-kale, Nyali ya calo yaso-belwe;
Twakulakonka ulu buto, Kufi-ka tu-tushe-kwesu

title: 282 - AMAKANA MAKUMI YAMASASE
content:
282 - AMAKANA MAKUMI YAMASASE

TEN THOUSAND HARPS

1. Mu masese na mashiwi Balelumbanye Mfumu;
Ni Yesu e uleteka, Myulu na isekele.
Nipaci ... puna Yesu, Ateke ... calo eka,
Aleluya, Aleluya, Aleluya, Amen .

2. Teka Mfumu ya lulumbi, Teka umuyayaya,
Bonse bakalasekela abo wakomenena;
Ni pacipuna Yesu-, ... Ateke calo eka-,
Aleluya, Aleluya, Aleluya, Amen

3. 'Seni bwangu Mupusushi. Bwise bushiku bwenu;
Nga bwapwa ubupingulo. Mulu calo fikapwa;
Bakasekela nobe, Kumone cinso cobe,
Aleluya, Aleluya, Aleluya, Amen.

title: 283 - BUSHE NI'WE BUSHE NI'NE?
content:
283 - BUSHE NI'WE BUSHE NI'NE?

SHALL YOU? SHALL I

1. limo 'kengila pa cipata, No-mba fye, no-mba fye:
No kuba mu lulumbi lulya, Bushe ni'we? Bushe ni'ine?
Akenda mu misebo ilya, Akalamona ifisuma,
No kulya filya twaebelwe; Bushe ni 'we? Bushe ni 'ne?

2. Umo akatulo lupanda, No-mba fye, No-mba fye;
Bakamufwika icitebo, Bushe ni 'we? Bushe ni 'ne?
Umo akalamone Mfumu, Macusho ya calo yakapwa,
Akalasekelela nankwe; Bushe ni 'we? Bushe ni 'ne?

3. Umo akakunta pa cibi, No-mba fye, No-mba fye;
Akomfwe shiwi, "Nshikwishibe,' Bushe ni 'we? Bushe ni 'ne?
Aketa tabakarnwasuke, Pantu icibi cikesalwa,
Tabakamupele cilambu; Bushe ni 'we? Bushe ni 'ne?

4. Umo akemba ulwa bwansho, No-mba fye, No-mba fye:
Kwimba pamo na bapusuka, Bushe ni 'we? Bushe ni 'ne?
Kuposhanya palya pa cabu, Na batemwikwa ba pa calo,
Akaba mu lulumbi lwa pe, Bushe ni 'we? Bushe ni 'ne?

title: 284 - ILYO INSHIKU SHILEYA
content:
284 - ILYO INSHIKU SHILEYA

WHILE THE DAYS ARE GOING BY

1. Kulya bantu balecula, Ilyo nshiku shileya;
Kuli bambi abalefwa, Ilyo nshiku shileya:
'Fwe tubakoseleshe. Bonse bali mu nshila,
Tulecite fisuma, Ilyo nshiku shileya.


CHORUS:
Shileya (shileya), Shileya (shileya), Shileya (shileya),
Shileya (shileya), Tulecite fisuma ilyo nshiku shileya

2. Te nshita iyakwikala, Ilyo nshiku shileya;
Mpumi yobe ibekeshe, Ilyo nshiku shileya:
Icalo ca malanda, Macusho no kulila,
Twafwe bonse balewa, Ilyo nshiku shileya.

3. Imyando ya kutemwana, Ilyo nshiku shileya,
Tatuleisakamana, Ilyo nshiku shileya;
Lelo mbuto shisuma Isho ifwe twabyele,
Shiletusansamusha. Ilyo nshiku shileya.

title: 285 - KU CIFULO CATALALA
content:
285 - KU CIFULO CATALALA

THERE IS A PLACE OF QUIET REST

1. Ku cifulo catalala, Mupepi na Lesa,
Ububi tabukowesha, Mupepi na Lesa.


CHORUS:
O Yesu Mupusushi, Atumwa na Lesa;
Twikate fwe balinda, Mupepi na Lesa.

2. Ku cifulo icansansa, Mupepi na Lesa,
Eko tukumanye Mfumu, Mupepi na Lesa.

3. Ku cifulo ca kutusha, Mupepi na Lesa,
Kwabe nsansa no mutende, Mupepi na Lesa.

title: 286 - NSENDENI
content:
286 - NSENDENI

BEAR ME ON

1. Ndebu-fulu-ka bu-shiku, Ilya-balu-bulwa
Bake-ngila-mu Zi-yoni, Mushi wa mu-shilo


CHORUS:
O nse-ndeni, nsendeni; Ku Zi--yo-ni.
Nsende-ni ku mushi wa kutemwa: Mushi wa mu-shilo.

2. Baka-lai-mb' Ale-luyah, 'Bumba lika-lamba
Nkemba nabo- ulu lwimbo, Ulwa bupu-susho

3. Seke-leni bwapa-lama, Twale-bufu-luka-;
