Buka-kumu-ne fi-lamba, Bushi-ku bwa kwanga

title: 287 - MU NSHITA YA MESHO
content:
287 - MU NSHITA YA MESHO

IN THE HOUR OF TRAIL

1. Mu nshita ya me-sho- Yesu mungafwe,
Ukuti ni tu-nkwa, Mfume kuli 'Mwe;
Nga nabo wana-ka, Mwindekelesha
Munjikatili-le Ukuti niwa.

2. Fintu fya mu ca-lo fingansekesha,
Tafyawama fyo-na-ula Mupashi;
Ibala lya Get-se-mani njibushe;
Nangu mbe mwisa-mba ilya Kalvari.

3. Busho luse lwi-nga leta malanda,
Nangu kukali-pwa, Muno mu calo;
Nsuminisheni-fye, Mbe mu maboko
Amasakama-no, Mbike pali 'Mwe.

title: 288 - BALETELE  FYA  DUPE  KULI YESU
content:
288 - BALETELE FYA DUPE KULI YESU

THEY BROUGHT THEIR GIFTS TO JESUS

1. Baletele- fya bu-pe fyabo kuli- Yesu,
Pa kumute-mwa Yesu bamupele bupe,
Imilimo- ya luse, No kwafwa ba-pina;
Na fyonse fyo- bapele, Fyalipokelelwe


CHORUS:
Bushe teti- ulete bupe ate-mwisha,
Tila, Napo- mutima Pa makasa yenu.

2. Na bambi e-po ba-li bapele fya-bupe,
Umupina- ape-le, Yesu atashishe;
Umupina-Twai-she Kupela ko-nse fye.
Takwete ne-lyo ka-me Kakupele Mfumu.

3. Alilile ati-le, We wa-ba no luse,
Bula fyonse- ndi na-fyo, Mutima wabipa;
Elyo Yesu ‘mwaswike, Witila ka-cepa,
Bonse buli-fye bwino, Iwe bwacilapo.

title: 289 - MUMBULE FYO NDI
content:
289 - MUMBULE FYO NDI

TAKE ME AS I AM

1. Yesu ni 'Mwe ndelilila, Nga tamwangafwe nalafwa;
Leteni ubupu-susho, Mumbule nge fyo ndi.


CHORUS:
Mumbule- fyo ndi, Mumbule- fyo ndi,
Leteni ubupu-susho, Mumbule nge fyo ndi.

2. Nshikwete ma-ka ndi mubi, Lelo ni'Mwe mwamfwilile;
Mumpange ngefyo mu-fwaya, Mumbule ngc fyo ndi

3. Teti njiteyani-shishe, Pantu ndi muntu wabipa;
Mwi Shina lyenu mpusuke, Mumbule nge fyo ndi.

4. Nafukama ku ci-puna, Moneni nawa pa nkasa;
Mulimo wenu u-suma, Mumbule nge fyo ndi

5. Mulefwayo kuu-mombe, Mbutisheni umutima:
Beni muli ine-mombe, Mumbule nge fyo ndi.

6. Ilyo mulimo u-kapwa, Ubulwi bwapwa nacimfya:
Ukwita kwandi ku-kaba-Mumbule nge fyo ndi.

title: 290 - BOMBELA IMFUMU
content:
290 - BOMBELA IMFUMU

TOILING FOR JESUS

1. Temwa temwa bombela Imfumu Twafuma bonse ne mitima;
Kubombela conse atulanga. No busumino tukacita.


CHORUS:
Bo-mbela Yesu. Tuleya ifwe tuleimbila.
Bo-mbela Yesu, Muno mwibala lyakwe.

2. Kwanga kwanga tusose ilandwe. Muno calo ku bantu bonse:
Kristu ulubuto lwakwa Tata, Wene aletupala nomba.

3. Fuka fuka konke Mfumu Yesu. Mu fyonse Wene aendele;
Nkatangilile bambi ku Mfumu. Bamonemo Mwana wa Mpanga

title: 291 - EWALINGA FYE EKA
content:
291 - EWALINGA FYE EKA

WORTHY, WORTHY IS THE LAMB

1. Yesu Mwana wa Mpanga. E walinga fye eka,
Yesu Mwana wa Mpanga; Wa--fwi--Ie.


CHORUS:
Lu-lumbi ku Mfu-mu, Mwimbe Haleluyah,
Lu-lumbi ku Mfu-mu, Ku-mwa-na.

2. Leteni ubufumu, Bwise pwisha macusho
Leteni myake kana, Wa--shi--la.

3. Kanshi 'fwe nshita shonse, Tubombe tumutashe.
Tusuke tumumone, Ku--Zi--yon',

title: 292 - UTUBOKO TUBILI
content:
292 - UTUBOKO TUBILI

TWO LITTLE HANDS

1. Ndi no tuboko twakubomba na ka lulimi kamutashe,
Tu matwi nato twakumfwila, Ka shiwi kamulumbanye.


CHORUS:
Twaisa. Twaisa, Fwe bana bobe twaisa,
Twaisa, Twaisa, Twishibe Imwe.

2. Ndi no tukasa twakwendela, Ukulaya ku mulu kulya,
Tu menso nato twakumona 'Pali amashiwi yakwe.

3. Na ka mutima mpele Yesu, Na ka mupashi kapusuke;
Na ka mweo kamubombele, Ine kuti naba wakwe.

title: 293 - KUNTA, KUNTA
content:
293 - KUNTA, KUNTA

KNOCKING, KNOCKING

1. Kunta, Kunia niw'ani-? Linda linda cawama,
Mulendo mweni ni Mfu-mu, Tatwatala tumumo--na
Wapapa umutima. Bushe teti wisule-?
Bushe teti wisule.

2. Kunta, Kunta ep'ali-, Linda. Linda cawama-,
Lelo cibi naciko-sa Nseku shakosha ici-bi
Mishimba naifula, Cibi cakakatila-.
Nacikano kwisuka.

3. Kunta, Kunta ep'ali-, Linda, Linda cawama-,
Walashilwe ‘li pa mwi-nshi, Ku mutwe afwele myu--nga
Menso yalolekesha, Alepembela iwe-,
Bushe teti wisule.

title: 294 - KUFIMBWA NO MWEO WAKWE
content:
294 - KUFIMBWA NO MWEO WAKWE

COVER WITH HIS LIFE

1. Lolesha Ye-su, Wakaele-, Tata abi-ka pali ine
Umweo wa-kwe; Ne wabipa-, Kuti nsafi-we Mbute tutu


CHORUS:
Mfimbeni e-lyo mbute tutu-, Nkeshiba bwi-no mwco wenu-,
Umweo wa-ndi walibipa-, Unsambe ine mbute tutu

2. Ububi bwa-ndi nabufula-, Ndetina uku-kulolesha-,
Isa we Mfu-mu wise 'nsenda- Mfume mu bu-bi bwa chalo 'ci.

3. Ndatemwisha kwe-lela kobe-, Walindamina umwingila-,
Uwabuti-sha; Namulomba-. Munsambe i-ne mbute tutu.

4. Alimfwili-Ie kumpususha-, E wasambi-le bubi bwandi-,
Kwi shiwi lye-be ndeumfwila-, Nkabe mu lu-lu-mbi na Iwe.

title: 295 - LISHENI PENGA LYA BULWI
content:
295 - LISHENI PENGA LYA BULWI

SOUND THE BATTLE CRY

1. Lisheni penga, mona mulwani, Imyeni ulu-unga lwakwe;
Buleni ifilwilo, mukose, Mwi shiwi lyakwe lya mushilo


CHORUS:
Akuyeni mwe bashilikale, Teyanyeni shiwi lipita;
Akuyeni no kwimba Hosana! Chilongoshi ‘mwine ni Kristu.

2. Tukose bonse twanshe mulwani, Tuye kuntanshi, tucimfye.
Inkwela yesu e shiwi lyakwe, Tukamucimfya umulwani

3. Lesa wa bonse tukutikeni, Lyo tulekwita wa luse;
Ngo bulwi bwapwa, bonse twacimfya, Twafwikwe citebo ca bwansho.

title: 296 - NTUNGULULENI MWE MUPUSUSHI
content:
296 - NTUNGULULENI MWE MUPUSUSHI

LEAD ME, SAVIOUR

1. Ye-su nyensha niluba (niluba)
Nye-nsha bwino mu nshila (mu nshila)
Ndi bwino nga ulipo (ulipo)
Ku-temwa kobe mbepo (be mbepo)


CHORUS:
Nye-nshya, Nye-nshya, Ye ... su nyensha niluba;
Nye ... nshya bwino mu nshila, Munsunge nshita shonse

2. U-li cubo kuli ‘ne (kuli 'ne),
Ilyo kwaba macusho (macusho);
Ndi-bwino ngo li pepi (apepi),
Nce-tekela muli 'We (muli 'we).

3. Nsu-ngwe kufike mpela (impela),
'Lyo cipupu capita (capita);
Nsu-ke mfike kwi shilya (kwishilya),
Nkakumune filamba (filamba).

title: 297 - EKO ALl UWATEMENWE
content:
297 - EKO ALl UWATEMENWE

THERE WAS ONE WHO WAS WILLING

1. Eko a-li uwate-me-nwe kumfwila. Ukuti ine mbe no mweo;
Alisu-minishe kuya palupanda, Ukuti 'ne nsange umweo.


CHORUS:
Epo shapopelwe palya pa lupanda, Wene a-shisende-le shonse,
No kucu-la konse, Yesu pa lupanda, Asende-le ubu-bi bwandi.

2. Wa ciku-ku, kutemwa uwa tekanya, Pa kusa-mba muti-ma wandi,
Nshili no mulandu nomba ndi muntungwa, Nashipopelwa pa lupanda.

3. Nakula-ba Iyonse fye no Mupusushi Nshakata-le mfuma kunt'ali;
No lwimbo pamilomo na mu mutima, Pantu ni-njelelwa ububi

title: 298 - TE FYA INE, FYA IMWE
content:
298 - TE FYA INE, FYA IMWE

NONE OF SELF AND ALL OF THEE

1. Kuilumbanya mu cabi-pa kwali muli ine,
Nalemwasuka Yesu a-ti, awe fyonse fyandi,
Fyonse fi awe fyandi; Tapali fintu fyobe;
Efyo mwaswike Ye-su, Te fyobe fyonse fyandi.

2. Alinsangile 'ne Ye-su Namumwene pa muti.
Mutima wandi wati-le, Awe 'fi fyonse fyobe;
Watile umutima, Watile umutima;
Mutima wandi wati-le, Awe 'fi fyonse fyobe.

3. Luse lwakwe lulapo-sha, No kutwafwa nshiku pe,
Lulenenga kuti na-nde, 'Ne ncepe Yesu akule;
Kanjitwale fye panshi; Yesu abe pa mulu,
Lulenenga kuti na-nde, Yesu abe pa mulu.

4. Uluse ulwa kwa Ye-su, Lwacila myulu yonse,
Luse lobe nalunga-fwa, Takuli cili candi;
Takuli cili candi, Nomba fyonse fye fyobe
Luse lobe nalunga-fwa. Fyonse i-fyandi fyobe.

title: 299 - LYONSE UWA KUSEKELA
content:
299 - LYONSE UWA KUSEKELA

ALWAYS CHEERFUL

1. Mitima iseke-lele, Te kula-i-Iishanya, Ilyo Lesa atulenga Ukuba bantu bakwe.


CHORUS:
Tuleseke-Iela Iyonse. Ulubu-to lwaisa, Tulesekelela mu milimo, Lyonse, Twakulasekelela

2. Atusunga mu ma-boko, Bubi ta-bwa-ka cimfye, Alitulaya ku-twafwa, E bulayo bwa cine.

3. Ilyo twafilwa ku-bomba, Tulomfwa u-bukali, Icinshingwa catu-fimba, Twafilwa kwimba lwimbo.

4. Basuma bali ne nsansa, Mu nshita ya-lungama, Tumfwe fya cine tu-konke, Tuleke bubi bwesu.

title: 300 - BACULA BAKATUSHA
content:
300 - BACULA BAKATUSHA

REST FOR THE WEARY

1. Umushi wa mwina Kristu, Waba mu-Mpanga ilya,
Mupusushi atangila, Kuyanteyani-shi-, sha.


CHORUS:
Bacula ba-katusha. Bacula ba-katusha;
Kulya kwi-shi-lya ilya Yordani, Kulya;
Bacula ba-katusha, Bacula ba-katusha,
Bakalalya mwi-bala lya Edeni, Mulya

2. Alenteyanishe ng'anda, Ikeka-la pe nape;
Nkekala kulya pe nape. Mu mpanga ya mu-ishi-, lo

3. Kulwala no kukalipwa, Takwaka-tale kuba,
Icikonko no bulanda, Tafyakasangwe-, ku-, lya.

4. lmfwa tayakasangwemo, No lubo-la lwa iko,
Imbeni no kusekela, Imbeni nomba-, bwacha

5. Imbeni mwe mpyani shakwe, No bwansho 'lyo muleya,
Fipata fya mu Zioni, Fili no kumwi-, swi-, lwa.

title: 301 - MUNYINA SUMINA
content:
301 - MUNYINA SUMINA

O BROTHER BE FAITHFUL

1. Munyina sumina Yeswa laisa, Untu twalolela nga nshi,
Twalaba mumusumbo wa lulumbi, Nokwimbo Iwimbo lwa Bwansho,
Munyina cinshi twingakaninoku-sumina uwatutemwa,
Uwatulango kutemwo kwa cine, Uwa tulubwile ifwe.

2. Kwalibo musumbo wacindamisha, Uwabasuma bapalwa,
Ulebalolela kubasengela, nokusanga ubutusho,
Kanshi we munyina fye cetekela, tacabule nshite ntali,
Ukwikala mu mfifi nokucula, bwalaca fye nomba line.

3. Sumina munyina nomba laisa, Kabumba Mfumwi ya maka,
Kwisa neminshipendwa yabangeli, mu maka yakwa ya bwansho,
Munyina walaumfwe shiwi lyakwe, ilyo akasoka kati;
"Wacita bwino we musha musuma, ba mubuseko bwa Mfumu."

4. Munyina teti umfwikishe lelo, Kano fye mu muyayaya,
Ilyo kamone cinso cakwa Yesu, elyo kafwikwe citebo,
Munyina sumino bulayo bwakwe, bulelolela bacine,
Bakapyana pamo nabalubulwa, no kwikala na Yesu pe.

title: 302 - TULI BANA BA MFUMU
content:
302 - TULI BANA BA MFUMU

WE ARE CHILDREN OF A KING

1. Tuli bana ba Mfumu, ba Mfumu, ba Mfumu,
Tuli bana ba Mfumu, tuleimba nomba;
Tulekonka Yesu pe, nomba tatuletina,
Tulekonka mupepi, tuleimba pe pe

2. Tule-enda kumwesu, kumwesu, kumwesu,
Tule-enda kumwesu, tuleimba nomba;
Ku ng'anda yakwa Tala, mfifi takuli kulya,
Yes' elubuto kulya, tuleimba pe pe.

3. Sekela tule-enda, kumwesu, kumulu,
Sekela tule-enda, tuleimba nomba;
Tuleimba nshiku pe, bakosa baleimba,
Palwendo tuleimba, tuleimba pe pe.

title: 303 - UKUKUTA KULEUMFWIKWA KONSE
content:
303 - UKUKUTA KULEUMFWIKWA KONSE

SEND THE LIGHT

1. Ukukuta kuleumfwikwa konse, "Tupeni ulubuto."
Bantu balelila lupusukilo, Bapeni ulubuto.


CHORUS:
Tumeni ilandwe lyabuta, Libutishishe konse,
Tumeni ilandwe lyabuta, Libutishishe konse.

2. Twabomfwa baleita konse konse, "Tupeni ulubuto."
Twaleto bupe bwesu no buseko, Bapeni ulubuto

3. Cikuku ca Yesu cibakumane, Bapeni ulubuto.
Tuleba no mupashi wakwa Yesu, Bapeni ulubuto.

title: 304 - LINTU WASAKAMIKWA
content:
304 - LINTU WASAKAMIKWA

COUNT YOUR BLESSINGS

1. Lintu wasakamikwa na macusho,
Lintu wanashiwa mulwendo lobe,
Penda mapalo yobe limo limo,
Fikakupapishe fyacite Mfumu.


CHORUS:
Penda mapalo limo limo Yantu Lesa akucitila;
Penda mapalo limo limo Umone ci kakucitile Lesa.

2. Bushe wanashiwa we ne cisendo?
Bushe naufininwa no lupanda,
Penda mapalo yobe limo limo,
Elyo ukembo mwaye nshiku shonse.

3. Lint'wa mona 'bukankala bwa bambi,
Tontonkanye fyuma fyobe ku mulu,
Na mapalo yobe ya shinga shitwa,
Namalipilo yobe yaku mulu.

title: 305 - BUSHE NDI MUSHILIKALE?
content:
305 - BUSHE NDI MUSHILIKALE?

A SOLDIER OF THE CROSS

1. Bushe ndi mushilikale, Kakonka wa Mpanga?
Bushe nkatina munshila no kuba ne nsoni?


CHORUS:
Ishina, ilya wama, Wene amfwilile,
Mucikuku nkapokela icitebo candi.

2. Bushe nje mumulu mulya, Mushili macusho,
Ilyo bambi balecula mu fimana monse

3. Bushe balwani balipo? Bushe nkalwe nabo?
Bushe calo ni cibusa cinsukile m‘mulu

4. Kulwa kwandi kwiba kwa fye, Unkoseshe Mfumu,
Nkashipikisha macusho mu mashiwi yenu.

title: 306 - SEKELENI
content:
306 - SEKELENI

IF GOD BE FOR US

1. Sekeleni mu cikuku cakwe co,
Pantu aletukakula,
No umulopa cinshi tuletina,
Pantu Yesu ni wesu ‘fwe.


CHORUS:
Bushe nga Lesa ali na ifwe nga kuli nani akatuansha 'fwe,
Na, ni, Ko? ... Nani akatuansha ifwe.

2. Kosa mu Mfumu pantu e wamaka;
'Kala wakumfwile shiwi,
Namumacusho kosesha mu cine,
Nokwikalililamo pe.

3. Kosa kwishiwi lyamalayo yakwe,
Aya cine muli Kristu,
Wacine ici casoswa kabili,
Cine cine tayakapwe.

4. Kala mu Mfumu namaka yakwe 'yo,
Muli mweo wakutapwa,
Ukuponako mumaboko yakwe,
Nshakafume kabili 'yo.

title: 307 - ABANTU BAKWA YESU
content:
307 - ABANTU BAKWA YESU

PEOPLE OF GOD

1. Abantu bakwa Yesu balesekela nomba;
Abantu bakwa Yesu balesekela nomba;
Yesu Mfumu yabo alebwela ku calo,
Aleisa bwangu.


CHORUS:
Ululumbi Aleluya, Ululumbi Aleluya;
Ululumbi Aleluya, Aleisa bwangu.

2. Abantu bakwa yesu balepembela nomba;
Abantu bakwa Yesu balepembela nomba;
Katula alebapela mweo pe na pe,
Aleisa bwangu.

3. Mweo wa Yesu eka wawamisha ifwe;
Mweo wa Yesu eka wawamisha ifwe;
Nomba ali no kusenda abantu bakwe,
Aleisa bwangu.

4. Abantu bakwa Yesu tabati-na iyo;
Abantu bakwa Yesu tabati-na iyo;
Lintu Yesu akabwela fyonse fikapwa;
Aleisa bwangu.

title: 308 - YESU MFUMU UMFWA KULI 'NE
content:
308 - YESU MFUMU UMFWA KULI 'NE

BLESS THY LITTLE LAMB TONIGHT

1. Yesu Mfumu umfwa kuli 'ne, Upale mwana obe;
Mu Mfufi 'kala mupepi, Ukufiko lucelo.

2. Kasuba naunondola, Nedkutasha kuli 'ci
Wampele ifintu fyonse, Ufwa ipepo lyandi.

3. Welele fyabipa fyandi, 'Pale banandi bonse;
Ukesa senda 'fwe bonse, Ku kwikala na iwe.

title: 309 - YESU WESU AFYELWE
content:
309 - YESU WESU AFYELWE

THE BIRTH OF JESUS

1. Yesu wesu afyelwe, Mu Betelemu;
Asendeme mu fyani, Fya mu mukondo

2. O, Yesu uleshiba, Ifinti kuno;
Washo bufumu bobe, Kututula 'fwe.

3. O, Cibusa ca bana, Ndetota Iwe;
Pantu washile kale, Ing'anda iyobe.

4. Ndemukabila Yesu, Ukwafwa ine;
Ndemukonke nshiku pe, Ndemunakila.

5. Ndepalamina Iwe, Cibusa wandi;
Ndetemwa ukuleka, Fyabipa fyandi.

title: 310 - NAPUSUKA
content:
310 - NAPUSUKA

I AM SAVED

1. Napusuka 'ne mu fibi, Napusuka kuma lwele;
Naingila mu lubuto, Nausanga umutende


CHORUS:
Napusuka, Ndeimbila, Nshita shonse, Kwa pe na pe
Bapusuka, Baimbila, Nshita shonse, Kristu Mfumu.

2. Mabimbi mu calo yafula, lelo kwimba kuleumfwika;
Kutemwa kobe we Mfumu, Kwapususha calo conse.

3. Bapusuka basekela, Muli Mfumu ya shamfumu;
Abapusuka baleimba, Matotelo kulumbanya.

title: 311 - NSHITA YAPWA
content:
311 - NSHITA YAPWA

'TIS ALMOST TIME FOR THE LORD TO COME

1. Nshita yapwa Mfumu yalaisa, Ndeumfwa bantu baleti;
Ntanda ku mulu nasho shashima, Ubushiku bulu 'pepi no kuca.


CHORUS:
Bu-shiku bwandi nomba bwalaca, Bu-shiku bwandi nomba bwalaca-,
Inshita naipwa Mfumu yalaisa; Teyanishisheni 'kwisa kwakwe.

2. Filangililo, mweshi, kasuba; Mu calo namu lwelele,
Mashiwi yafiko yatusoka; Filetwebe Mfumu ili mupepi.

3. Iy'e nshita yacilonganino, Icilelolela Yesu;
Cifume ku misango yabipa, Citeyanishishe ku kwisa kwakwe.

4. Kabiyeni bonse mu tushila, Pamofye na mu misebo;
Mubalete bonse nefilema; Baiteyanishisho kwisa kwakwe.
